1b1(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/ trai lo kya badz+ri s+yo mo hA ka la po byed skad du// 'jig rten gsum
1b2(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po// dpal rdo rje sem sa dpa' lA lag 'tshal la/ 
1b3(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtswa mo nA/ rdo rje dang nor bu rin po
1b4(rgyud): rkye myo'i khyung pa brtsegs pa na/ byang chub skams dpa' bya ba phrag d+ha ma dang / lha da k+ku dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
2a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa rnams dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
2a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phag 'tshal nas
2a3(rgyud): ldan 'das lo lon gsum bskor ba byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lha chen po la sogs
2a4(rgyud): pa sems can ma rangs pa de dag tshig 'dzin du stsal par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas
2b1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshig bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pas gsan nas/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs
2b2(rgyud): so gnod sbyin khyod shin du khengs pa shin du khro ba/ shin tu 'thur ba de ltar de khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/ de nas
2b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag ni rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di skad ces gsol to// de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can ma
2b4(rgyud): rungs pa 'dul bar bgyid do// gong gi phyir zhe na/ bdag gis 'dod pa'i bde ba can rnams dbang du bgyi ba la sogs pas btul nas/ bla na med pa'i bde ba
2b5(rgyud): la dgod par 'tshal lo// sems can ma rungs pa rnams gsad pa la stsogs pas sbyangs te/ zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
2b6(rgyud): phyog na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la lags so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje legs so lagaso// 'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang phan pa'i phyir dang
3a1(rgyud): bde ba'i phyir snying po 'di smros shig/ de nas phyag ni rdo rje byang chub sems dpas/ lha thams cad nas mi thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan
3a2(rgyud): pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' bstsal pa/ grogs po dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng shig/ nga'i bka'i rjes su skyongs shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'dra
3a3(rgyud): kyis zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// // oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ 
3a4(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum thams cad g.yos/ rab tu
3a5(rgyud): g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 'gul kun tu rab tu 'gul to// 'phar rab tu 'phar/ kun tu rab tu 'phar to// de nas lha thams cad la sogs
3a6(rgyud): pa sems can thams cad 'dar yang yod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bor lhags te/ kho ra khor yug dang / kho ra khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshun
3b1(rgyud): chad kyi gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyis gang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'tshogs pa'i dkyil
3b2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad la gzigs nas 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skabs su 'gro bar khas long shig/ nga'i bka' yang rjes su skyongs shig/ de nas 'dus
3b3(rgyud): pa'i 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes skrag ste/ 'dar yid yid nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das lha chen po'i
3b4(rgyud): dang / mthu'i che dang / tshangs pa rnams kyis 'di sbya gsol to// bcom ny+dzu 'dug 'di zla'i sems can 'di san rdzu 'phrul rgyug/  spyir byin tshe nang ba ga drug sa 'argyas pa 'di su lags/ 
3b5(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di glengs te gasl-i sa so// sems can kun lnga phan pa'i mi// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// kun du bza'
3b6(rgyud): gyi bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad nyid skos 'di// phyag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin tshe// ma rungs 'chos la dab ba ste// gang gI mdze brjod pa oMs na// sangs rgyas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag
3b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsungs pa/ kye kye lha dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su deng la/ nga'i maka' bzhin du yang gyis shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'dis/ khyod
4a1(rgyud): brtan bsregs par gyur te/ de nas lha chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod ni gnod skyon drod ni lho byas na/ nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjes su skyong ba
4a2(rgyud): mi nus so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de thos nas khros te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar drang
4a3(rgyud): bskur te bskos so// de bas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' bstsal na/ lha chen po 'di 'dul bar 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la 'di skad gsungs so// 
4a4(rgyud): sems can chen po khas long shig/ 'dis khyod gsad ta re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po la sogs pa/ 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po lha rnams kyis 'di skad gsol to// 
4a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di'i bka' bzhin du byed pa bdagra cag ma lags so// de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
4a6(rgyud): phyag ni rdo rje la 'di skad smras so// kye gnod sbyin nga ni thams cad kyi dbang po byed pa po// 'jom pa po skye gu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o// rtogs 'dod do// dbang phyug chen po'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
4a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas 'di skad gsungs so// khyod ni lus srul po'o// mi shi za ba/ mo rungs pa/ dwag shul gyi las byed pas na/ gtum po ste/ sha za ba'i lus srel ba na tI
4a8(rgyud): lhor rmongs bya dang / gtogs 'dod dang / dbang phyug chen po yin/ tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o// gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni thar pa'o// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi/ 
4b1(rgyud): dbang po ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po deng yin pas 'dul nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po lnga chen po khros nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jigs su rung
4b2(rgyud): ba chen po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gad mos bgad nas/ 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/ 'bar ba chen po gtong ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtha' med pa/ gzugs sna tshogs su
4b3(rgyud): byas/ 'bar ba chen po'i grub pa mi mtshungs pa/ rdo rje dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang sha ka ti dang / be con dang mi mtshungs pa'i mtshon tshwa 'bro bas shing gtong ba ma mo rnams kyi tshogs
4b4(rgyud): / dang / 'byung po'i tshigs rnams dang bcas par kun bstan to// bdud dang bgegs byed pa dang / mtha' dang mu med pa'i gzugs sna tshogs su sprul/ khro bo rab tu mi zad pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs
4b5(rgyud): chen po dang ldan gcig tu rab tu 'thub cung shin du 'gyed / khyid byazhi'i 'jig rten gyi khyim+b+has m+b+hargyun myo'i mun+da nAg tu b+h+yas/ rAb+hUr+ya bya rkyen blo'i phung byos glongs tit+ta rab tu snang byer byas so// da n+ya
4b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po cung zad mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa/ smin mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi brlabs bskyod pa/ mig g.yon pa cher bgrad do// rdo rje'i bIlba byA khro bA dang bcas pa/ 
4b7(rgyud): zab mo'i tshig gis shigs pa/ snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum lAs rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so// hU~M te na hUM zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi spyod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
4b8(rgyud): khams kun sgra des gang nas/ g.yos rab tu g.yos kun tu g.yos so// 'khrol rab tu 'khrol kun tu rab tu 'khrol lo// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad bco ldan
5a1(rgyud): 'das skyab du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bsgrub tu gsol/ zhes nus bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs
5a2(rgyud): gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyed rab tu mi 'grungs so// de nas phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgya
5a3(rgyud): ba 'di gsungs so// / oM sum b+hi ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na ha~M/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hU~M/ b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lho'i bdag po thams
5a4(rgyud): cad 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gang na ba der mgo rkang bzlog ste/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bcud nas brlams par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag
5a5(rgyud): na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yon pas mnan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'a
5a6(rgyud): 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed pa legs so legs so// de bas na thul la dbugs phyung shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi
5a7(rgyud): phyir rdo rjes bcings pa 'di gsungs so// hU~M badz+ra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sarba na swA hA/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsamo gyis/ lha chen po la sogs pa'i lha de dag thams cad dran pa rnyed
5a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad gsungs so// grogs po ngag sems can chen po 'di'i bka' bzhin du bya bar khas long shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag
5b1(rgyud): thams cad mgrin gcig tu bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal lo zhes gsol to// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// hU~M Tak+ki ho/ 
5b2(rgyud): nas 'ad brjod pa tsam gyis lnga la sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/ bcom ldan 'das phag na rdo rdul phyag pas nas/ mchim blags te nga ro bton nas skabs su dong ste/ bcom
5b3(rgyud): 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bdag cag khyod kyi bka' nyan na ji ltar bgyi ba bka' bstsol du gastsol// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa/ grogs pa/ 
5b4(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems dang sdom pa gzung por khyis long shigabacom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing / byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed par
5b5(rgyud): 'otsha la lo// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' snyoms dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du btsud nas/ sdom pa 'dzin du btsug sde/ byang chub sems ni brtsa
5b6(rgyud): byas pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba stsol// phyag na rdo rje bdag chen dang // 'dod pa smod par mi bya'o// 'di ni gsang ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sdom pa 'dzin du bcug na/ 
5b7(rgyud): daum tshig byin pa ni/ hU~M badz+ra sa ma ya/ a b+hi shiny+tsaum bi rA go ya sar+b+ba k+Sha mA nAM hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'di ni bdad kyis smras pas na/ bdag cag mi nyan to// de nas bcoMm ldan
5b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la me brnyas shig/ ces gsungs pa dang / de dag gis gsol pa/ ji ltar 'dod tshigs dang bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub po zhes
6a1(rgyud): / bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' bstsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ ke gogs po dag nga ni ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du byed pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te/ ji ltar ba
6a2(rgyud): ba la mi chags pa dang / sdug bsngal la 'dod chags pa ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i chos/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de/ de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin
6a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpas ca nas 'dod chags dang bral bar ma byed cig ces bka' bskul to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sau ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa
6a4(rgyud): mI bi rA ga ya sarba kA mA nAM hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das gis bka' bstsal pa bzhin no zhes gsol to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rje dbang bskur ba
6a5(rgyud): 'di byin no// oM badz+ra a bI Shany+tsa sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha ro d+he Sha badz+ra pA Ni hi ha ha ha ha/ de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rigs sngags mchog go/ mthu bo che ni rdo rje
6a6(rgyud): sgyu mo'o// tshangs pa ni rdo rje mi smra'o// sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o// dbang po ni rdo rje 'thab cha ste/ de la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po thams cad rig pa'i blon po chen por dbang bskur ro// de nas ba
6a7(rgyud): snong la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje mang gis dbang bskur ba byin pa 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni rdo rje 'khyil pa'o// zla ba ni rdo rje 'od do// be con rtse mo ni rdo rje becon skya slong ni rdo rje skye slong ste/ de rnams ni
6a8(rgyud): rdo rje khro bor dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ chang gi myos pa ni rdo rjes zin pa'o// tshang byed ni rdo rje phreng ba'o// rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo // 
6b1(rgyud): rgyal ba skyes pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal bya ste/ de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro// de nas sa steng na gnas pa rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ mdzod skyong ni rdo rje glu shing ngo // 
6b2(rgyud): rlung ni rdo rje rlung ngo // me ni rdo rje mo'o// ku ba ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pas ste/ dri la sogs pa ni pho nyid dbang bskur ro// de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin
6b3(rgyud): pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje kye bya'o// glu shin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o// sa'i spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dren no// bA ru Na nI rdo rje klu ste// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran du dbyung bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag
6b4(rgyud): rnams kyi lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu rdo rje byin te/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskor ba byin pa ni 'di lnga ste/ nyon mongs pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i me'o// nor can ni rdo rje gsor ma'o// tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba'o// dug myo ni rdo
6b5(rgyud): gzhon nu ma'o// dbang mo ni rdo rje khu tshur te/ re la sogs pa ni rig sngags kyi blon mo chen mo dbang bskur ro// de nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje ma
6b6(rgyud): 'khrung mo ni rdo rje stu gu ma'o// be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be con rtse'o// skye 'phrog ni rdo rje skad bcings te/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba
6b7(rgyud): byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje gsod ma'o// za ba mo ni rdo rje za ba ma'o// gos ni rdo rje bgro ma'o// dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje tshogs ma mor dbang bskur ro// de nas saM la rgyu
6b8(rgyud): kho ma rnams dbang bskur ba ni 'di lta ste/ zhi ba mo ni rdo rje pho nya ma'o// rlung ma ni rdo rje 'gyogs ma'o// me ni rdo rje 'bar ma'o// ku be ra ni rdo rje thag thug ma ste// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas
7a1(rgyud): sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma thams cad dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ phag mo ni rdo rje gdong ngo // mgo lpags ma ni rdo rje nag mo'o// sna chang ma ni rdo rje myags ma'o// klu mo ni rdo rje na srin
7a2(rgyud): ma ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas phyag ni rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos btsud pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje dam tshig byin pa/ oM
7a3(rgyud): ba li tong ba li ta badz+ra A kar Sha ya hU~M dzaHlha rnams dgug pa'o// hUM badz+ra a gr-i bi T+Ta ya ma ya hU~M/ bar snang rgyo ba rnams kyi'o// hU~M badz+ra mA lA gra laM/ phreng ba 'chang rnams kyi'o// hUM badz+rA ban d+ha rbaM/ 
7a4(rgyud): sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// hU~M badz+ra pA tA laM b+hany+dza b+hAny+dza hUM phaT/ 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// hU~M he ru ka badz+ra/ sa mA ya sarba duSh+TAM sa ma ya mung+ga pra ban+d+ha tsakra hUM phaT/ ma rnams thams cad kyi'o// de nas
7a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni sems can 'dul ba logs na/ bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i sems can gyi
7a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de dag ji ltar bgyi bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ gang gis sems can thams cad la phan pa byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
7a7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'di la tshud cig/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das na mo mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon 'di dag la
7a8(rgyud): nan tan bgyi/ rims la sogs pa'i ji ltar bgyi/ dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du chug shig
7b1(rgyud): do nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ki dkyil 'khor chen por bcad nas/ rdo rje'i dkyil
7b2(rgyud): 'khor du chud cig rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du btsud nas/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du chud cig/ dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du btsud nas/ las kyi dkyil 'khor du chud cig/ de nas phyag ni rdo rje byang chub sas
7b3(rgyud): dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yid rangs te/ tshigs su brgyad pa 'di smras so// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te// grub pa thams cad
7b4(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas yang dag rab bshad po// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul 'dra bar// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig grang
7b5(rgyud): proHdri la srud bu bri bo'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste// gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang // tshad ma bzarje pho srad bu yis// shes rab can gyis srad bri ba// 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo // de yi dpung du
7b6(rgyud): gdab pa ni// seng ldeng phur pa brtan par ro// de la srang bu bri gsungs pa// srad bu nyis lngab kyis byas te// bcu drug cha ru bgo bar bya// thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog/ kho ra khor yug ri dge
7b7(rgyud): kyang / phur bu yis ni de bzhin no// de yi nang du bya ba ni// srad bu rim bdun ldan pa ste// tshon ser dri zhim ldan pa yis// thig rnams kyang ni dgang bar bya// de yi dbus su bzhag pa ni// shin du bkrab
7b8(rgyud): pa'i nas phul bzhi'o// de yi steng du mgron po ste// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas thad kor thams cad du// byang chub brgyad ni rim bzhin par// bri 'am ya bzhag par bya// 
8a1(rgyud): tshon sna lnga mchog rnams kyis so// sangs rgyas spyan sA de ru ni// phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no// bri 'am bzhag par bya ba ni// rdo rje hUM zhes 'dus pa'o// de yi zhabs ni g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug
8a2(rgyud): chen po mnan par bya'o// g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis btsir nas ni// nyon mongs mi yi lha mo'o// 'dod drug spyod pa'i lha rnams dag/ srad bu rim bdun par dag tu// bri 'am yang na bzhag par bya// rdo rje
8a3(rgyud): shugs kyis 'gongs nas su// phyi rol byung nas de ru yang // gling rnams bzhi yang bri bar bya// dbyibs dang cho ga ji bzhin du// grA yi ri mo logs par gdod// gling rnams dbus ni thams cad du// 'jig
8a4(rgyud): rten ji bzhin bsogs par bya'o// tshangs pa la sogs bzhi yi rnams// de ru 'jig rten dbang po br-i// kho ra khor yug pa yi ri// gling rnams kyi yang bar dag tu// phyi yi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi// dkyil
8a5(rgyud): 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// sgo bsrungs bri bar bya ba yang // rdo rje sgo bzhi de dag tu// rdo rje kyo ba zhags pa dang // sgrog dang dril bu de bzhin no// kho ra khor yug ri yi ni// phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnams// 
8a6(rgyud): gnas dral dang ni nad dag dang // mkha' 'gro mo dang gdon drag rnams// bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya// chos min can ni gzhig phyir ro// de yi phyir rol du dgod pa// gtor ma sna tshogs mchog rnam so// 
8a7(rgyud): de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung ste/ de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal te/ 'jug pa ni gtsang ma gos gtsang ma bgos la/ se
8a8(rgyud): ral the gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/ de'i steng du dri zhim po'i me tog bzhag nas/ snying po 'di brjod la zhugs shig/ hUM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha maM ha ha ha ha hi/ de nas pus mo g.yas
8b1(rgyud): pA'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ du ru ka'i bdug pa'am/ ci bdog pas gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i 'dzub mo gnyis kyo ba stang du byas la/ snying po ni 'di brjod do// hUM u ru ga gA bi ri Ni bi ri Ni/ badz+ra saM ma ya hi/ b+hi
8b2(rgyud): da ya swA hA/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni/ ba spu g.yo ba la sogs pa sa g.yo ba 'am/ dri zhim po'am/ 'od zer mthong ba'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor me tog gtor cig/ de nas
8b3(rgyud): slob ma gzhug ste/ de la thog ma nyid du bkrus nas slob ma gos gtsang ma skon te/ gsum la skabs su btang ba dang / bslab pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa so sor gnas par byas nas/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed
8b4(rgyud): cig/ de nas gdong ras kyis g.yogs/ mgo gtsug tor byas te/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug shig/ bcug nas me tog gtor te/ de nas gang la bab pa ni de'i lha'o// de nas gdong bcings
8b5(rgyud): pa bkrol nas/ rang gi rig pa'i lha ston la/ de la mchod cing slob dpon la yang tso 'dod pa'i yon phul nas/ de rang gi rig pa'am sngags bzlas te phyag rgya'ang bcing ngo // 'jig rten gsum las
8b6(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i phreng ba mnye ldan pas// rdo rje
8b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtag par bya'o// 'jug par bya ba de bzhin to// las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas su// de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bzlas
8b8(rgyud): nas// rdo rje mchog ni sgrub par bya// de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni// lag po gnyis kyi rdo rje'i phyog rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje bzung la/ ji srid na 'gul pa de bzlas so// ngo phyin chad rdo rje las thams cad byed do// rdo rje'i
9a1(rgyud): dkyil la 'o// danas dum tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'thu ste/ la 'khor chen po kun bris nas/ mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya// 'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang // rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas/ 
9a2(rgyud): de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni 'dri yin no// rdo rje 'dzin ma kun byas nas// rdo rjer kun tu brtag bya ba// g.yas par bzhag nas g.yon pa yis// dril bla byasil zhing 'jug par bya// bcug nas su ni dril ba
9a3(rgyud): de/ mnyam par gzhog pas bsil bar bya// slob dpon gyir cig dam tshig kyang // rtag tu bsrungs shing brjod par ba// ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni// de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs// de ltar khyod la rdo rje chen po
9a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'dis// nges par bsreg par gyur pa ni// de ste rdo rje 'dzin dang dang // skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te// de ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams// khyod kyis 'di tshe spangs gyur na'o// de la
9a5(rgyud): 'di dam tshig sngags so// oM ha na sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rdo rje'i chu 'di glud do// de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga bzhin du bya'o// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas
9a6(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste// de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris nas su// cha lugs mang po bzhag par bya// btsud nas las rnams thams cad kyang // slob dpon gyis ni de bzhin bslab// de la las kyi
9a7(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba 'di'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar thub gru bzhir byas la// mngar po'i yam shing gos bus la// mngar po'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams sbrang rtsi dang mar las spags te/ bla gos
9a8(rgyud): g.yas su gzur la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug s+ho/ rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i zhi ba'i las rnams la/ lag pa g.yon pas bdag gi phyag rgyas bcings
9b1(rgyud): taM/ g.yas pas bsregs na de dag grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyub tu thab gru gsum du khro bo'i tsher ma rnon po'i yam shing dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / yul ga'i rtse mo dang sdong bu dang 'bras
9b2(rgyud): bu'ang de 'dra ba rang gi khrag gis bskus nas stan drang po la 'dug ste/ blo gos g.yon du gzar la khros pa'i tshig bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na// dgug pa dang bzhug pa dang bcings pa dang
9b3(rgyud): rgyas gdab pa dang / gzhom pa dang / btsir ba dang / bsnyal pa dang / myos par bya ba dang / brtan 'pho ba la sogs pa'i las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
9b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams cad kyi las ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yas su rtsa 'jam po bting ba
9b5(rgyud): lA 'dug nas skyod ga yogs sgyur ma lda bgos te/ ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas shing / 'khor lo lta bu'i thub tu du ba med pa'i mngag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g.yas g.yos kyis
9b6(rgyud): bsreg+sa go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis g.yon du rdo rje lta bu'i tho ba byas la stong g.yogs kyi yan lag kun bcing ste/ rlong stan 'jam po la 'dug nas/ yam shing thams cad kyi 'bar ba'i phreng ba la
9b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i me la lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas/ lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bus bzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te/ rdo rje tshig
9b8(rgyud): gis zlos shing tshe thams cad bsregs na/ rje rje 'dzin pa dmug pa dang / gtsug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba lasogs pa dam pa'i grub pa'i sbyin bsreg gi chog bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las
10a1(rgyud): rnam dur rgyal ba'i jog pa chen po'i rdul po las dkyil 'khor rnams cad kyi chog la/ de nas mo byung bshang bar bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs pa/ dkyil 'khor
10a2(rgyud): cho ga thams cad mthong bar gyur nas bsgrub mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khon du ni ma zhugs sam/ dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni// phyag na rdo rje mi 'grub pa// gsang ba yang dag ma shes pas// bcom
10a3(rgyud): ldan sems dpa' 'dod pa'o// chags dang rdo rje de nyid to// de la chags par ma gyur na// phyog ni rdo rje mi 'grub po// de bas yang dag ma mthong bas// dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs// yang dag ma mthong grub
10a4(rgyud): pa ni/ the tsom can gyis mi 'thob po// rab tu 'jigs pa rnyed nas su// nad kyis kyang ni 'jig par byed// gdon yang de la brtson par 'gyur// shi nas du 'bong du ltung ngo // de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad
10a5(rgyud): du chug la nad dang gdon la sogs pa ston cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog ras la bri bar bya ste/ de'i thad kor na kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ 
10a6(rgyud): g.yas phyogs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / 'jam dpal dang sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// g.yon phyogs su ni rdo rje khu tshur dang / byams pa dang nam
10a7(rgyud): mkha'i mdzod do// steng du ni nam mkho'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa lag pa gnyis kyis bcing ngo // lag pa gnyis po gzhan
10a8(rgyud): la g.yas pas ni rdo rje gsor/ g.yon pas ni me tog gi gzhu dang / mda' lnga bsnams pa sku mdog ni ud pa la sngon po lta bu/ yid 'dzum pa mche ba cung zad rtsigs pa/ khro ba dang bcas pas/ 
10b1(rgyud): gzhung pa'i zhal/ phyir brkyang bskum du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon pas lha chen po'i ldan pa g.yon par munan/ zhabs g.yas sbrum pas u ma'i nu mar btsir te/ stong g.yos
10b2(rgyud): khra bos yan lag g.yogs pas/ ki shon gyi spyod g.yogs can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbu rgyan du thogs pa'o// de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ tshes bcwo ltar ram/ zla bar ram/ 
10b3(rgyud): lo'i bar du nyin re zhing brgyad stong bzlas te/ gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te/ bdag gi khyim du gnas shing zas gtsang ma yid bzhin du zos te bzlas na/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / zla ba
10b4(rgyud): dang pos nI hUM zhes bya bas phyi rol gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnyis kyis ni las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gsum gyis ni bcom ldan 'das rmi lam du ston cing / 'das pa
10b5(rgyud): dUng ma 'ongs s+ya thams cad ston to// bzhis ni sems can thams cang dgrags pa dang / dbang du bya bar nus so// zla ba lngas ni yid bzhin du snang ba dang / ma snang thar 'gyur ro// zla ba drug gis
10b6(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro// zla ba bdun gyis ni bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyag na rdo rjer ston cing / cho 'phrul thams cad kyang ston to// zla ba brgyad
10b7(rgyud): gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhog pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byed cing las su bsko'o// zla ba dgus ni byang chub sems da
10b8(rgyud): rnams thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byed do// zla ba bcus ni sa bcu thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba bcu gcig gis ni sa bcu gcig pa sangs rgyas kyi sa thob bo// 
11a1(rgyud): zla ba bcu gnyis kyis ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes pa de bzhin du bris la/ de'i thad kor thams cad du mthu chen po la sogs pa nas
11a2(rgyud): klu ba ru Na'i mtha'i bar du bcom ldan 'das la sgong zhing pus mo btsugs pa bris la/ de nas de bzhin du bzlas pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya grags par bzlas te/ zla ba'i mthe'i bar du chos nyi shu dgu'i
11a3(rgyud): mtshan thal byung du bzlas na nang par thams cad 'ong ngo // 'ongs nas kyang dbang du 'gyur te/ thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed do// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris nas
11a4(rgyud): gser mdangs kyi lha mo la sogs pa thams cad rang rang gi phyag rgya bsgreng nas/ gar byed cing mi sdug pa'i gzugs su bri'o// de nas de bzhin du zla ba gcig gis mtha'i mtshan thal byung zlos shig/ 
11a5(rgyud): de nas nang par kun lhags te/ de bzhin du gar dag gis slob pa po mchod do// 'di ni rtog pa 'dir bris pa de bzhin no// snyam du bsams nas nges mi 'jigs par bya'o// de nas dbang du 'gyur te/ rtag tu
11a6(rgyud): las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur ro// de nas cho ga gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bris la/ de nas de bzhin du brgyad stong du bzlas na/ nub tha ma la rdo rje 'dzin pa 'thob ste/ 
11a7(rgyud): ci 'dod pa grub pa'i mchog kyang 'thob po// gzhan yang bsgrub pa phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum zlos shig/ de nas dgos pa kun bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar ci 'dod par
11a8(rgyud): yam shing thams cad kyis sbyin bsreg gis lo gcig bar du bsregs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa bris le de'i spyan sngar lo gcig gi mtha'i pa du grangs med par
11b1(rgyud): zlos shig/ de nas tha mar bcom ldan 'das rang gis ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyagaHbcings la/ de bzhin gshegs
11b2(rgyud): pa 'gul gyi bar du zlos shig/ de nas phyag rgya grub par 'gyur ro// grub pa des na dgug pa dbang du bya ba dang / gzhug pa dang drang ba dang / lhung ba dang dbab pa dang / gtan 'pho ba la sogs pa las
11b3(rgyud): phran tshogs kyi rnams bcings pas hU~M zhes pas mdzad do// de nas cho ga gzhan te/ rig pas dbang bskur bar bya bar 'dod na/ bri ba 'am jim pa las phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs byas la phyag gnyis
11b4(rgyud): brkyang ste/ rdo rje 'dzin to// de zla ba yar gyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ de nas bcwo lnga'i bar du mar bzhi sde brgyad stong gis khrus shig/ de nas tha mar mtshan thol byung bzlas so// de nas nang por gzugs
11b5(rgyud): gzugs de bzhad do// de nas rig pa thams cad kyis bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi cha lugs bri ba'am/ 'jim pa la de bzhin du phyag
11b6(rgyud): brkyang ba rdo rje 'dzin par byas la/ de zhigs kyi bar du smos chus bkrus na/ de phyin ched yod bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje
11b7(rgyud): phyag bzhi par byas nas/ de'i phyag g.yas par brad mo/ g.yon par rdo rje/ g.yas par rdo rje hUM zhes pa g.yon par mnga' dang gzhu'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i 'jug tu zhag gas
11b8(rgyud): srung ste/ mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de'i nang par de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ bskal par gnas shing mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / thams cad 'gro ba 'gyur/ 
12a1(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas lci ba gsum gyi khrus pas dus gsum du gos rjes la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ brgyad stong dus gas
12a2(rgyud): du nyin bdun bzlas nas/ de nas phyag na rdo rje slob dpon gyi gzugs su byas nas rmi lam du thams cad du sla'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthong
12a3(rgyud): bas zla ba gcig gi bar du de dus gsum du khrus byas nas dus gsum du gos rjes/ dus gsum du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/ rno lcags kyi mtshon chas der bris la/ de la ji lta
12a4(rgyud): zhing rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings/ brgyad brgya bzlas na zla ba gcig bzlas na/ zla ba gcig gis mtha' bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // de nas rdo rje bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje ras sam rtsig pa'am shing leb
12a5(rgyud): la bris nas/ de la mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la lo gcig tshun chad rdo rje de nam 'bar ba'i bar du zlos shig/ 'bar ba des na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus
12a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje mtshungs pa'i gzugs dang stobs dang mdog tu 'gyur te/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// tshe yang lo stong phrag
12a7(rgyud): brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri sgrub pa 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gyis ral gri bzung la lo gcig gi bar du bzlas na/ rig 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor la
12a8(rgyud): bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ 'khor lo dkyil 'khor bris la/ lcags kyi 'khor lo thogs nas nam rdo rjer gyur cing / slar yang 'khor lor gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas de thogs pas na rig 'dzin
12b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas kyo ba btang bsgrub par 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar gser gyi ko ba btang byas te/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung la grub pa rnams
12b2(rgyud): gsum du gyur gyi bar du bzlas te/ dros pa tsam gyis thams cad 'gug nus par 'gyur ro// dud pa byung ba tsam gyis thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro// 'bar bas ni thams cad dgug pa dang / 
12b3(rgyud): dpung du bya nus shing rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// de nas lha la sogs pa dgug pa 'byung ste/  lha chen po la sogs pa lha rnams gang yang rung ba'i chu lugs rkang pa g.yon pas mnan
12b4(rgyud): la/ rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings te sdigs shing zla ba gcig gi mtha'i bArA du bA zlos na lha thams cad lhags te/ las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ 
12b5(rgyud): / klu'i mtsher lte ba man chod chu'i nang du btsug la/ khro gcig tshun chad klu thams cad rang gi gzugs su ston cing / las thams cad byed pa'i g.yog tu gyur pa'i bar du bzlas so// gnod sbyin dbang
12b6(rgyud): bya bar 'dod pas/ gnod sbyin ga la gnas pa'i gnas der rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcing la/ gnod sbyin de dag la lhags te/ bka' ci stsal ces smra ba'i bar bzlas so// de phan chad bka' thams
12b7(rgyud): cad byed pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// de nas ma rnams thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod pas mi'i gnas su song nas/ khra ma'i gnas su sang nas/ khro mo'i snying khar rdog pas mnan lo zla ba gcig lon gyi
12b8(rgyud): bar du bzlas na/ tshes nyi shu dag la 'jigs su rung pa rnon po'i sgra 'byin par byed te/ des na dbang da gyur nas bka' bzhin byed pa'i g.yog mor 'gyur te/ 'phrag pa la khyer nas mtho ris su khrid de/ sla
13a1(rgyud): khrid cing 'ongs nas tshogs kyi bdag por bcug cing de dag gis mchod de/ sngon ma byung ba'i don thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang na chungs thams cad dgug go// 'di lta bu'i rnal 'byor yang ste
13a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor gang gis khro bo'i 'jig rten du yang 'gro zhing phyir yang ngo // de la sus cung zad byed mi nus so// de nas dpal chen mo bsgrub par 'dod pa des phyag na rdo rje'i skyon sngar bzlas pa ni/ phyag na rdo rje'i sku la
13a3(rgyud): lha mo'i lus mthong gi bar du ste/ de las ma 'gul cig ces sgo/ de phyin chad don thams cad ster bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa'ang ster ba'i bar du'o// de nas mtsho dbyangs ma dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ des phyag na
13a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i spyan sngar yi ge'i 'phreng bar byas la/ phreng ba'i yi ge bkod cing mthar phyin gyi bar du bklags te/ nyin re zhing dus gsum du las byAHsaM la/ de nas brgyad stong bzlas ma zla ba gcig lon pa dang mtsho
13a5(rgyud): dbyangs ma mthong ngo // de phyin chad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten po dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi gtsug lag thams cad dang / bshes gnyen du byas thams cad
13a6(rgyud): dang bzo thams cad kyang ma bslabs par de ltar rab tu shes so// de nas lig pu mig dang gur gum dang ldong ros dang / bab bla rnams la bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ lig pu myig blangs 'jom pa'i steng du bzhag nas/ 
13a7(rgyud): lag pas mnan te grub pa rnam gsum 'byung gi bar bzlas so// gcig gis ni mi snang byar 'gyur ro// gnyis pas ni gzugs mang por 'gyur ro// gsum pas ni nam ga n+da gong mar mdzeg pa na nam mkha' la
13a8(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gur gum la sogs bzung ste/ 'jom pa'i bu gar bcug la rdo rje 'dzini ma'i phyag rgyas mnan nas nam 'bar ga par du bzlas so// de nas thig le byas nas 'dod ma thams cad kyi bdag
13b1(rgyud): po dang / rig 'dzin dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / che lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// de nas sa la b+han dzi ka sgrub pa 'byung ste/ gnas ga la sa la b+han dzi ka ri mo bris pa'am/ gzugasu byas pa de'i 'jom sor mo bzhag ste/ zla
13b2(rgyud): ba gcig tu zlos shig/ de nas zla ba gcig gi mthar mtshan thog thag zlos shig/ de nas nad par rang gi gzugs su bstan nas/ 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa'i chung mar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin mo sgrub par 'dod
13b3(rgyud): pas gnod sbyin mo gang na 'dug pa'i gnas der 'dug la/ rang gi gzugs su 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas na/ de la 'dod pa thams cad ster ba'i bran mor 'gyur ro// de nas sha za mo sgrub par 'dod pas/ phyag dar phu
13b4(rgyud): po'i me btang ste/ lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mtshan de bzung la g.yas pas gzegaso ma bsregs pa ni phyag dar gyi phung po de las ji tsam na sha za mo gdong mangs gzugs mi sdig pa 'ongs te/ ras gis
13b5(rgyud): gzugs su gnas so// de yang de bzhin du bran mor 'gyur ro// de nas ci bgyi ba sgrub par 'dod pas nyin zhag gcig sbyang bar byas la/ tshes nyi shu dgu la brgya stong bzlas te/ de nas zla ba gcig slongs mo la
13b6(rgyud): gnas shing grangs med par bzlas te/ zla gcig lon pa drang nub gsum sbyang ba byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas so// dri nas nang par ci bgyi 'ongs na des mi 'jigs par byas te/ de nas de rangs nas 'grub po/ 
13b7(rgyud): de phyi cheng 'dod pa thams cad 'brel ba'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/ mtho ris kyi lha mo yang 'gug cing 'bul lo// de yang skyel zhing slar yang dgug go// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi thams cad kyang skye'o// 
13b8(rgyud): gzhan gyi nor thams cad kyang phrogs nas 'bul lo// de nas rig pa'i brtul shugs bya bar 'dod pas dngos grub med pa grang yin pa des/ zla ba drug gi ban du nyin zhag bcu zhing spyad bya snga ma rjes la/ spangs
14a1(rgyud): @/ mo'i kha zas la sogs pa nas rlung bza' bar du'o// de nas 'jug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ nang par sangs rgyas pa'am/ sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas nyin re zhing bco brgyad kyi bar du sngon gyi spyad pa rnams
14a2(rgyud): byas la/ de'i 'jug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ hU~M zhes thang cig brjod pas kyang ngo // de nas ro langs sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smad ma nyams pa'i mi ro langs la
14a3(rgyud): legs par bkrus nas byug pas legs par byugs te/ me tog gi phreng bas btags nas/ rlung g.yon pas dbugs byung gi bar du bzlas na de ldang ste/ langs pa dang ngo zhon nas thams cad du 'gro zhing tsho
14a4(rgyud): yang lo stong phrag brgyar 'gyur ro// de nas ro langs kyi grub pa mchog bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ ma smas ma nyams pa'i mi ro blangs nas/ de bzhin du rab tu brgyan la zhon te langs shing yang 'gyel gyi bar du bzlas
14a5(rgyud): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur 'gyur ro// de phrag pa la khyer na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srel pa'i rig 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang tshe yang bskal
14a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor mthong ba nyid kyis las su 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ thang cig brjod pas ni bdag dang gzhan dang grong
14a7(rgyud): dang grong khyer dang / rgyal po la sogs po bsrung bar 'gyur ro// mtshams bcad pa la sogs pa ni brtan par lta bas mtshams bcad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mi 'da' na gzhan lta ci smos
14a8(rgyud): sa'i dkyil 'khor dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs bcing ba'ang lta ba des so// dbab pa ni reg pa dang / ma reg pa dang ma reg pas ral gri dang me long dang / snod dang mthe bo dang / shing ljon dang bris pa dang / 
14b1(rgyud): chu lugs dang / gzhungang mnga' dang / rdo rje la sogs pa dang / rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya gos kyi g.yogs bcings/ gu sbrul gyi bdug pas dbab bo// gdon zhi bar bya ba ni/ hU~M zhes pas so// rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag
14b2(rgyud): rgyas ni sems can thams cad 'gums par byed do// rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgyas ni byad ma'i gdon las thar par byed do// he ru ka rdo rje'i phyag rgya bstan pa ni byad mo gsad pa las slar gso bar bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag
14b3(rgyud): rgyu bzung bas sku la bzung ste spang bas ni/ dug mnan pa dang dug spang ba dang / dug zhi bar bya ba dang / dug spro ba dang / dug gzhig par bya ba dang / dug gis shrI ba las gso bar bya ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa gcig gis
14b4(rgyud): so// gter dbyung ba ni zangs kyis ril ba chus bkang la/ rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i 'dzub mo gu gul gyis bdug pa byas te/ bzlas na gal te gter yod na ni chu sdud do// de ste med na ni 'khyil lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum la
14b5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i hU~M zhes pa bzlas te blang ngo // snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing gi me bus te/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar gyis rA dzA kau shi ka'i me tog la bskus nas stong phrag brgya bsregs na snang ba
14b6(rgyud): thob po// 'og gi gnas su ni rdo rje 'og gi phyag rgyas 'khrul 'khor thams cad bcom nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas te zhugs na de la sus kyang gtso bar mi nus so// gtogs 'dod kyi 'khor los kyang ci yang byed
14b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje 'am/ nor bu marga ti 'am/ pad ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig gam/ gser ram/ dbyig gam/ gzhan ci yang rung bya'am/ skyes pa'am bud med dmo/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
14b8(rgyud): la lo gcig gi bar du dus gsum du brgya brgyar bzlas nas// de nas lo gcig yon pan/ brgya 'gyung du 'gyur ro// de snyeng du brgyar bzlas na de snyed kyi phyir 'gyur ro// de nas stong du bzlas na yung spyon nu 'gyur du 'argyu
15a1(rgyud): 'od spyong drug pani stong phrag brgyur bzlas so// dgug pa ni dz+haiM btang gi phyug rgyas thu ba b+hU ga zhugs so// byung du bya ba ni tshur gyi ma tshig ga phyag rgyas so// sems can rnamam
15a2(rgyud): cad gtan 'pho ba ni rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgyas bcing ste/ stong phrag brgyar bzlas na sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o// chu mnan pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bcings la chu'i snang
15a3(rgyud): du 'gror rung ba'i bar du zlas so// me mnan pa ni thang cig bzlas so// me tog srung ba ni rdo rje lta bas te/ de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / bye ba la sogs pa yang 'da' bar mi
15a4(rgyud): byed do// rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te/ gang du blta sa der 'pho'o// bza' ba dang btung ba dang / thams cad spo ba ni 'bar ba'i lta bas na rang gi snod du 'pho'o// sdig pa dang sbrul thams cad med par bya ba
15a5(rgyud): ni thang cig brjod pas so// gcan srin thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur ro// rkun po thams cad 'phung ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur bcas pas so// dmag les sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas
15a6(rgyud): so// gzhu dang mda' dang mdung dang rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas te/ de thogs ni dmag thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zhal che la ni thang cig brjod pas brtsod pa'i lan thebs par
15a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ni ba thams cad ni til gyi sbyin bsreg gis so// rgyus pa thams cad ni srungs dkar gyi sbyin bsreg gis so// gso ba thams cad ni dur ba'i lo ma'i sbyin bsreg gis so// tsho ba dang gnas ngal
15a8(rgyud): dang rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhil pa ni/ til dang 'bras kyi sbyin bsreg gis so// gzhom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes pas so// dgong du gzhug pa dang myos par bya ba thams cad phaT ces bya bas so// 
15b1(rgyud): mas cung gnyid log tu gzhug pa ni bsnams la mig btsums te/ brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid log par byas pa yin no// sems can thams cad rgyas btab pa ni/ rdo rje khro bo'i lha byas pa ltas margya
15b2(rgyud): btab par 'gyur te/ nyin bdun las lhag par mi gnon no// ngag 'phrog pa ni rang lce sos bzung nas hUM zhes pa'i bar du sbyor ba bya'o// snying drang ba ni rdo rje sor mor mo'i phyag rgyas dpung pa stsol te/ rang gi
15b3(rgyud): mchan khung du klong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun chad 'pho byar 'gyur ro// snying bcud pa ni rdo rje blangs te bcad par bya'o// snying dbye ba ni rdo rje lcags kyis btab ste meng nas smos shing gzugs so// 
15b4(rgyud): snying sgo ba ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje blangs te/ mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'phros par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar par bya ba bshad de/ de rgyas 'debs pa la ni khu tshur dam pos so// 
15b5(rgyud): ngag 'phrogs ni rdo rje ngag bzlas pa'o// snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag snying khar dgrol lo// bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'o mas khrus shig/ phye ba la ni phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris bskus
15b6(rgyud): shig/ snying po la ni rdo rje snying pos thar bar bya'o// de bzhin du byang mo'i phyag rgya yang sro bar bya'o// snying sgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying khar blta zhing lan gcig bzlas nA de'i snying khu nas sgra thos par 'argyu
15b7(rgyud): skyes pa'i snying khar yang de bzhin du byas te/ snying kha thams cad du yang de ltar ro// de nas pha rol gyi sems shes pa bsgrub par 'dod pas ni// rdo rje hU~M zhes pa brgyad bzlas na pha rol gyi sems shes so// sngon gyi
15b8(rgyud): gnas shes par bya ba ni/ rdo rje hU~M zhes pa bzlas pas so// rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hU~M zhes pa la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas shing bdag pas ka paM tsis bdags te gnyid log no/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
16a1(rgyud): kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi shes pa ston to// tshig bsgrub par 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ rdo rje tshig gis rang gis lces smras pa/ thams cad bangon par
16a2(rgyud): 'gyur te/ ci spangs pa de rtsol to// cho 'phrul ston pa ni bzlas pa'i rdo rje'i tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na/ rang gi lus la cho 'phrul du 'gyur ba ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
16a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to// rang gi gzugs ci dga' bar bsgyur bar byed 'dod pas/ rdo rje tshig gis rdo rje bzlas
16a4(rgyud): pa stong phrag bzlas na gzugs gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang / bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su yang byed par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la/ rdo rje bzung bas mi snang ba/ 
16a5(rgyud): gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas so// btang bas ni dgrol lo// khye'u la 'dug nas rdo rje blangs te nam 'bar gyi bar du bzlas so// gdon gyis 'dzin du gzhug na hUM zhes pas so// gdon gar bying du gzhug pa
16a6(rgyud): ni hi zhes byas so// gdon bskyod pa ni hag ces pas so// gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces so// gcer bar bya ba ni mi'i sgra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa bcings na/ gnyer bar 'gyur te gos rje bar 'gyur ro// sngang
16a7(rgyud): bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi ngom tshig gi phyag rgya ngal bas so// bskrang ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phang ngo // dgos pa bskyeng po ni mtshan thog thag sha chen po rang gi khrag gis bskus te bsreg go// gnan gyi drung
16a8(rgyud): med dgug pa mi rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam/ yang na thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes pas thams cad bya'o// bud med byams cad dang dga' bar spyod pa ni/ rang gartags rdo rje bcings pa
16b1(rgyud): bzung la nyin bdun du dus gsum du langs kyi bar du bzlas so// de nas 'jug tu nam phyed kyi bar bzlas na/ rtag tu ldang la mi sdom zhing bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por 'gyur ro// bu mo spyod pa ni rdo
16b2(rgyud): bzung nas thams cad du khyad par hU~M zhes bya ba byas nas spyod do// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni/ rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// 
16b3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje spyan sngar spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje/ 
16b4(rgyud): tshor gyi bcings pas rdo rje bzung la nam mgul gyi bar du bzlas so// snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ rdo rje blangs te rang gis spyi bor bzhag la rdo rje spyi bor brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas snang ba'i
16b5(rgyud): na du 'dug des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to// nor bu dgug pa ni rin po che gtso bo'i phye mas sbyin bsreg byas pas so// tshwaru dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlas pas so// char cad pa ni rjeH/ 
16b6(rgyud): pas so// ser pa bcud pa ni rdo rje mdor phyag rgyas so// gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid kyis so// sprin dag pa ni rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba brgya bzlas pas so// gas lta ba la ni rdo rje zhes pa ldan brgyar bzlas so// 
16b7(rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gzhag nas me tog dang bdug pas mchod de rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas mnan te/ rdo rje langs kyi bar du bzlas so// de thogs nas bskor na ci 'dod pa bzhin du sgyu ma'i las rnams
16b8(rgyud): ston to// rdo rje bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang me tog mthong ngo // nam mkha' la me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni/ dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na chags so// 
17a1(rgyud): / cha lugs gzhang par bya ba ni/ rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// gar byed par bya ba na rdo rje 'dzin mas so// smra bar bya ba na hU~M zhes pas so// rgyug par bya ba na rdo rje dgug pa phyag rgyas so// smin ma 'gul ba
17a2(rgyud): bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas/ rdo rje thogs la rang gi smini mtshams bskul bas so// sa g.yo bar bya na rkang pa g.yon pa brdabs so// khyim bskul bA ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyas so// khang pa dgug
17a3(rgyud): ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo ba tang gi phyag rgyas bcings pas so// sprin med par char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas so// skad cig tu sprin 'du zhing ston pa ni rdo rje bskor bas so// zla ba dang nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni
17a4(rgyud): rdo rje brdabs pas so// nyi ma dang zla ba mang po bstan na rdo rje bzhi nam mkha' la gtor bas so// dmag rnams bzhi bstan na rdo rje bskor bas so// mtshan mo nyin par du byas na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so// 
17a5(rgyud): mtshan mo nyin par du byas na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bas so// nyin mo mtshan par bya ba na mig btsums la rdo rje bskor cing / thams cad nas rdo rje bstan na brgya bzlas te rdo rje bskor bas so// thams cad nas byang
17a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' bstan na/ stong bzlas te rdo rje bskor/ phyag na rdo rje thams cad pa la bstan na stong phrag brgya bzlas te/ bskor bas so// thams cad nas sangs rgyas bstan na/ rdo rje la bye ba bzlas pas so// 
17a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17a8(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so// ngas kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ gang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir
17b1(rgyud): brtson par 'gyur ba la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di sbyin no// de nas phag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ cog tsog por 'dug ste mnos pa/ oM badz+ra bid swA hA/ de nas
17b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos so// sems can thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas phyag 'tshal zhing dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub
17b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rdo rje rig pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/ de'i dbus
17b4(rgyud): su nas phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/ de'i spyan sngar phyog na rdo rje yid kyis kyang tsog tsog por bzhag go// de nas de bzhin du bzhug go// zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
17b5(rgyud): do/ de ste dad na de byashad do zhes bsgos shig des smras pa/ gsungs shig ces pa dang / de nas khyed dang phan chad de bzhin gshegs par gyur to zhes smros shig/ des smras pa ci'i phyir dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i
17b6(rgyud): phyir ro// zhes des smros shig/ gang dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du lta ste/ des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam/ pha rol la thob par 'gyur zhes smras nas phyag rgya slobs
17b7(rgyud): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug la rdo rje sgrub pa bslab po// lhag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje bzung
17b8(rgyud): nas rang gi phyag rgya sgom mo// rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin snying po sgom pa ste/ rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin gshegs pa'ang tshe 'di 'am gzhan la thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// thas cad
18a1(rgyud): tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig/ dang brtan phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs rigs de bzhin no// sems can thams cad mgu ba ru// khyod kyis de ltar rtag par bya'o// de nas de ltar khyod
18a2(rgyud): khyod kyis ma byas na// sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la slob ma bcug nas las rnams bzhi'ang slob po// lus thams cad kyis
18a3(rgyud): btugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas nas/ sdig pa thams cad ni bshags so// de nas langs la thal mo sbyar te/ pus mo gnyis sa la
18a4(rgyud): gtugs nas bsod nams thams cad kyi rjes su yid rang ngo // de nas langs te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs la/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thos
18a5(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig gis/ badz+ra bid brjod cig/ des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang / bkur bsti dang mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgod
18a6(rgyud): pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas rdo rje rig pa bsgrub pa 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor mthong bas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i g.yas su spyan ras
18a7(rgyud): gzigs dbang po/ g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o// de nas g.yo sbyin can dus gsum du khrus byed pa/ dus gsum du bkrus pa'i gos gyon la stong phrag brgyar bzlas so// 
18a8(rgyud): de'i mjug tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshon thal byung bzlas na/ nang par du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to// mchog ci 'dod pa stsol te
18b1(rgyud): sangs rgas pa'i bar du yang stsol to// de nas yang cho ga gzhan te/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i steng du gzhug par byas la/ de'i sman sngar phag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/ tsog tsog por 'dag na
18b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la blta bar bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdo rje ya cig gis rdo rje gsor/ g.yon pa na pad ma'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su rdo rje khu tshur to// khu tshur gnyis
18b3(rgyud): kyi rdo rje bsdams par byas la/ de nas tshe gcig nas brtsams te/ zla ba gcig de bzhin bzlas la zla ba chang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas mchog ci 'dod pa brtsel to// 
18b4(rgyud): yang cho ga gzhan ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du bzlas pa'i mjug la/ nyin mtshan gsum sbyang ste phyag na rdo rje byon nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
18b5(rgyud): byin gyi bar du bzlas so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na mjug de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // nam mkha' la bltas te stong phrag bzlas na/ nam mkha' l+ya de bzhin gshegs
18b6(rgyud): thams cad mthong ngo // des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin gcig bzhin du brtsol to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog thob po// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na
18b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad sogs par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang poso lag nas bzung ste/ bde ba can gyi/ 
18b8(rgyud): rten gyi khams su khrod cing / slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo // 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan
19a1(rgyud): / 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang
19a2(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ro ltar mi g.yo ba'ang bskyod cing 'dren na/ sems can gzhan lta ci smos/ gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par gal ba
19a3(rgyud): grol bar 'gyur ro// gang brjod pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par bya bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad brtsol
19a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba dang mchog brtsol ba dang / don thams cad bsgrub pa dang / dgos pa thams cad kyang byed cing rtag par phyi bzhin 'grang ba dang / gang bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang grub pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur ba/ 
19a5(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po la 'di skad bka' bstsal to// phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis legs par smros shigs rgya mo des phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang
19a6(rgyud): bcas pas rdo rje gsor te rang gi snying khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis rab gi snying po 'di gsungs so// Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos so// de bzhin
19a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ 'phar rab tu 'phar byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu bskyod par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma rungs par 'gyur ro// 
19a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni snying por 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa brtan par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa yang sra bar gyur to// bdud dang mi
19b1(rgyud): rungs pa'i phyogs thams cad brlag par bya'o// gdon thams cad bcos gsad bcom ste/ 'dar phad pad na/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/ bde bar gshegs pa
19b2(rgyud): bdag cag stobs shig pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' bstsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid la skyabs su deng shig dang / 'di nyid khyod la skyob par byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kha nas kun du 'bar
19b3(rgyud): zas bskor po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'dzum zhing khro ba/ phyag gnyis kyis me tog go gzhu 'gengs po/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa bco
19b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo phyung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun 'dod pa'i khro bos spangs nas/ phyag na rdo rje spyan sngar 'dug ste bka' nod to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
19b5(rgyud): du ji lta ba de bzhin du khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so// phyag na rdo rje de bas na/ khyod kyi snying po gang gis sems
19b6(rgyud): zheste thams cad rgyal ba dang / bcom pa dang bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan dag kyang rdo rje lus thob par 'gyur ba de smros shig 'amo ts+tsha/ rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis bdag nyid go bgos na/ rdo rje'i
19b7(rgyud): lus dang rdo rje'i tshe thob cing bsrung bar 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag ra rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// 
19b8(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi'o// rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa ste// bcu drug cha dang ldan par ro// rdo rje ra bas mdzes pa ste// grwa dang sgo yi zur dag dang / 
20a1(rgyud): de bzhin rta babs mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya// phreng ba dril bu lnga ldis brgyan// dang por phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di// snying pos bzlas shing bri bar bya// de yi nang gi 'khor lo yang // rdo rje
20a2(rgyud): srad bu mnyam ldan po// rdo rje ka ba brgyad ldan zhing // rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas su// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya// 
20a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi// dbu brgyan gyi ni brgyan thogs pa// cung zad du ni bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje snyems pa mdzad pa ste// me tog mnga' gzhu 'chang ba'o// de la gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa// rdo rje sems
20a4(rgyud): dpa'i snying po ste// khro gnyeru bshad pa'i zhal ngo can// gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gyengs shing // gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o// rdo rje can gyi g.yas phyogs su// rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya// snying khar rdo rje brtan 'dzin
20a5(rgyud): cing / mkhyud pa lta bu'i sbyor bas so// phyag na rdo rjes rgyab tu ni// chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste// sems can rdo rje dpal can ni// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// rdo rje can gyi g.yon bri ba// rdo rje snyems pa dmar
20a6(rgyud): po ste// gnyis kyis rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin// bsgregs pas bskyod cing 'dud pa'o// grwa yi dkyil 'khor gnas su ni// mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya// dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje spyan// ston ka'i rdo rje kha ba mo// phyi yi dkyil
20a7(rgyud): 'khor grwa dag tu// 'dod po'i gzugs la sogs pa bri// sgo yi dpung rnams thams cad du// rdo rje 'dod pa lcags kyu sogs// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der// rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis// rdo rje snying po phyag
20a8(rgyud): rgya bcings la zhugs nas 'di skad smros shig/ sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing // sems can kun la bde ba brtsol// sems can kun gyi bar gyur cing // rdo rje sems dpar bdag dang 'grub// Tak+ki hU~M \u0f7f/ 
20b1(rgyud): de nas de skad smras pa dang 'bab par gyur te/ babs pa tsam gyis phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs nyid mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mthong bar byas nas grub pa thams cad kyang brtsol te/ la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/ la la ni 'tshang rgya bar
20b2(rgyud): roH/ de nas slob ma zhugs te/ snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la dris phreng ba bzung na/ gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la/ ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcug nas 'di skad ces smros shig/ khyod kyis dkyil
20b3(rgyud): 'khor ma mthong ba mi mkhas pa su lo yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byos shig/ 'byung po'i gdon dang / phra men la sogs pa'i gdon gyis gsang par gyur ta re/ shi nas kyang dmyal bar myong bar 'gyur ro// 
20b4(rgyud): zhes bsgo nas gdong khrol cig/ de nas 'dri zhes smros zhig/ gang dbus na ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/ 'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i dbyung po kun du bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'o// gang mdun
20b5(rgyud): bya 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs yin to// 'dod pa'i khro bo'o// gang g.yas na ba 'di ni sems can thams cad reg pas bde bya ste/ rdo rje dga' bo zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o// gang rgyab na ba 'di ni bcom ldan
20b6(rgyud): 'das nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/ sems can thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang / nor sbyin pa'o// gang g.yon smon du 'di ni bdag nyid chen po'o// bdud de sems can thams cad mgul par byed pa'o// gang grwa'i bzhi pa
20b7(rgyud): 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa me tog dang / bdug pa dang / maur me dang dri'i lha mo'o// gang phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan no// glang sgo bsrungs de dag ni mig dang 'dod chag
20b8(rgyud): dang byams pa ste/ kyo bya tang dang zhags pa dang sgrog dang / 'bab pa dag ni 'da' ba mi bya ba yin no// khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smad par ma byed cig/ gang sangs rgyas kyi
21a1(rgyud): / bstan pa la sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mu stegs can rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos der thar pa'o// de bzhin gshes
21a2(rgyud): pa rnams ni sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar par 'gyur te// 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems can bskyed par byed de/ 'dod chags ni byang chub tu bstan pa'o zhes so// / 
21a3(rgyud): de nas snying po byin cig/ Tak+ki hUM dza/ 'di bsgrubs nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying po 'di
21a4(rgyud): bdag che ba'i 'o// Tak+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// hU~M zhes bya ba ni khro bo'o// gnyis dgug pa'i phyag rgya dzaHzhes bya ba ste/ 'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slobs shig/ de nas dam tshig
21a5(rgyud): gi phyag rgya bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje'i snying po bzlas nas// log pa gnyis su rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po 'di'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pra tan d+hA ra ya sid d+hi Tak+ki hU~M dzaHde nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la phul bas de'i mgo la skon no// de nas
21a6(rgyud): rdo rje ming gi dbang sbyin pa snying po 'dis so// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba kA me shA ra dA/ i dam badz+ra nA ma nA ma A d+hiSh+Thi ta/ dr-i D+ho s+ya b+ha ba/ oM Tuk+ki hUM waM de nas der 'dug ste phyag rgya bcings nas/ rdo rje'i tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas
21a7(rgyud): mde nas sa g.yos te grub pa thams cad theng gcig bzlas pas 'grub bo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la btso bzlas na rdo rje'i thugs dbang du 'gyuro// de phyin chud sems can thams cad kyi sI shes pa dang
21a8(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi snying la dbang byed do// thams cad kyi snying dga' bar 'gyuro// thams cad kyi snying brtan par chag so// snying thams cad la tshig thob par 'gyur ro// gyur pa dang 'gyur ba dang / de ltar tshig bden pa/ 
21b1(rgyud): 'gyuro// bdag gi snying las kyang cho 'phrul rnams bzhi mthong ba gzhan la ston pa/ de'i snying las rdo rje 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de na sos can thams cad kyis mi song pa dang mi tshugs pa dang mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i rdo rje lus su 'gyur// zhes bco ldan
21b2(rgyud): 'das phyag ni rdo rjes gsung so// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa byas te/ rdo rje'i thugs bskyod pa'i glus bstod do// de phyin chad grub pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa thams cad dang gsang ba'i mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub pa 'gyu
21b3(rgyud): de nas kun gyis mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod de/ btung ba dang kha zas dang / longs spyod ci 'byor pa dag gis tshim par byas nas phyir 'byung bar bya'o// rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas rdo
21b4(rgyud): drukyilu 'khyen du rdo rje 'dod pa la khro bo la stsogs pa'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bad+mo bris te/ zhugs nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pos snyim po ma stongs par byas nas// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings
21b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyispya snga masu ri nga bzlas pas 'bum bzlas na denas dri ni khyim 'gyu'o/ nas spyam nga bya gyur// den de sgyu mtshan gcig sa rlu da na nung par na sa seM sa
21b6(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten blo/ khams thos cad kyi/ bdag pa'i lha'i gzugs dang / mdog dang rgyan dang rgyun gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa'i rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdzangs dang 'dzin par 'argyo rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyo ba gyi po rdo rjed ky-ig la bar gyi cho ga rgyas
21b7(rgyud): rnon mong mcho ga sa gakhong sa su ma Ni da pa'i sring bus mig tab ste rin pa lnga ma nas bris /  sto bus su bcoM ldan 'das ngo sgru ba bzhin du bzhugs sa na rnam nasas+ho rjes / de'i sman sbyar na
21b8(rgyud): rje na nyi rgyang rgyan rdzog pargyas pa blugs ji dag sa mazung bar bye'o'i phyag rgyala'o/ dzin 'i sbyin rgyu tshun ma gyi rkyen nanan ma sa myongs sa sa la
22a1(rgyud): rdo rje g.yon du sbyar bar bya// de yi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// badz+rA gar+b+he hrI/ de nas grwa dang skor yang rang gi lha mo bri/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid shin du brgyan la rdo rje lag tu thogs
22a2(rgyud): bud med kyang brgyan te lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur po ci sa la dpung pa gnyis kyis mkhyud de/ zhugs la 'di brjod do// swa ma yA s+t+waM haM sa rA ta ho Ta k+ki hUM dza/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das
22a3(rgyud): ston par mdzad de/ phyag rgya thams cad grub pa dang / dam tshig thams cad grub pa'ang stsol to// de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du snying po'i rdo rje de nyid kyis btsud nas 'di zhes smros shig/ khyod kyis dam
22a4(rgyud): tshig 'di las ma 'da' shig/ gnod pa ma spangs par myur du 'chi zhing du 'bod chen por skyes par gyur ta re/ de nas dam tshig brjod de/ bdag ni tshe kun phyag rgya 'di// 'dod pa bsam las yang dag
22a5(rgyud): 'byung / de bas khyod kyis sdig med pa'i// 'dod dang bsam pa ma btang shig/ 'di ni dam tshig bsrung ba'i sngags so// uta ka ya hUM ma phaT/ 'dis rdo rje'i chu klung ngo // dngos po gzhan thams cad kyi
22a6(rgyud): phyir yang mnas bsgrags te/ de dag la yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas klad do// de ste 'di las 'gal na zla ba phyed kyis snying 'gas so// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig chen pos
22a7(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba bslab po// de nis bzhin du 'byung ngo // shin du dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas/ rlung gi
22a8(rgyud): lus sam mtshan ma bzhog go// der btsud nas las rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o// de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad brtsol bar 'gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje 'dzin
22b1(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis brgyan pa'i skur bdag nyid mthong ba de skyid du bzlas so// dri phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// 
22b2(rgyud): nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/ rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings la bzlas pa byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa man chad snying po thang cig bzlas te/ hUM zhes pas sdigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'ang
22b3(rgyud): 'gyel bar 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'gro ba dang gnas pa thams cad kyang 'grol nus par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje las 'byung ste/ sems can thams cad 'dod pa dang khro ba gnyis kyis 'dul
22b4(rgyud): bar 'dod na/ rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya me tog la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bro dag gi snying khur bcings la/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sAr rdo rje 'dzin thob pa de srid kyi bar du
22b5(rgyud): bzlas so// de bzhin gshegos pa thams cad kyi lus bya bar 'dod ni/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byung chub tu sems bskyed/ sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bskyongs/ bzod pa bsgoms/ brtson 'grus
22b6(rgyud): brtsams/ bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs/ shes rab yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ tse 'dod ci nus kyis bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong
22b7(rgyud): gi bar du'o// de nas sa bcu thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i las byed pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro// lus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// de nas sgrub pa 'i'abyung ste/ dkyil 'khor du ni ma
22b8(rgyud): zhugs pa// dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang // slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams lo// mi bzad snying po 'di mi sbyin// dkyil 'khor mthong bas bsgrub par bya ste/ phyag na rdo rje'i sngags stong phrag brgya
23a1(rgyud): @/ bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bris te/ ras kyi dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri/ de'i g.yas su phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i snying kha na
23a2(rgyud): snying po byung bar de bzhin du brI/ g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag bzhi pa ste/ gnyis ni pad mo'i ting nge 'dzin 'chang / gnyis kyis ni me tog gi sa gzhu 'gyings pa/ kha dog dmar po bri/ spyan sngar de
23a3(rgyud): bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo bri'o// stang du nam mkha'i snying po bri'o// grwar mchod pa'i lha mo rang gi mchod pas 'gram pa dang mgo bor ro// de nas ras lde bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhir dus bzhi
23a4(rgyud): stong bzlas shing bsgrubs na/ de nas zla ba tshang ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bstsol bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la/ sems dpa' chen po lha mo'ang
23a5(rgyud): de bzhin du bya'o// de'i sran sngar za ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/ de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang / phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ mtshan
23a6(rgyud): thal byung du bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin 'thob po// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa ni/ mi nyal mi mnal bar bzlas te/ de
23a7(rgyud): nas zla ba phyed len pa dang / mtshan mo thal byung du bzlas na/ nang par phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang / 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang ldan pa dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob cing thams cad
23a8(rgyud): du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo de bzhin du bris la/ de'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong phrag brgyar bzlas na des grub par 'gyur te/ de bka' bzhin
23b1(rgyud): du las byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer te 'ong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyor te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no// des kyang longs
23b2(rgyud): spyod par nus na lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos/ brgya byin yang bstsol to// phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nr-is sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang bsgo bas bstsol bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'bumo bzlas na
23b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste dbang du byed do// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon
23b4(rgyud): nas sgrub pa po'i mdun du 'dor ro// de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid 'tshal gyis 'di ci 'tshol zhes smos zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dges te ci 'dod pa'i mchog bstsol bar 'gyur
23b5(rgyud): grub pa thams cad kyang 'grub po// spyan ris gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na/ spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog bsnol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas
23b6(rgyud): na dbang bstsol bar 'gyur te/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do// rdo rje bzhag sta~M de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas ni/ des ni las thams cad yid bzhin du grub par byed do// phyag rgya chen po
23b7(rgyud): bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog bstsol to// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings na sa'i bum bzlas na rdo rje mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang bsnol bar 'gyur
23b8(rgyud): ro// rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bumo bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ba tsam gyis mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na/ 'khor lo'i rigs 'dzin du 'gyur ro// kyo ba btang thogs te
24a1(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na kyo ba btang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur ro// zhags pa thogs te 'bum bzlas na zhags pa des thams cad dang nus par 'gyur ro// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa bsdams
24a2(rgyud): la 'bum bzlas na/ sems can thams cad bcing nus par 'gyur ro// rdo dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad la dbab nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgya
24a3(rgyud): bcings nas 'bum bzlas na hUM zhes pa gcig gis gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad skad cig gis lhung bar byed par 'gyur ro// lha chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
24a4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings te 'bum bzlas na/ zla ba gcig tshun chad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyur ro// mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo 'thob ste 'khor lo de thogs na
24a5(rgyud): grub par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro// brgya byin rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na rdo rje sbyin par 'gyur te rdo rje bskor ba ni char gcad pa dang
24a6(rgyud): dbab pa dang thang cig gis ni gnam lcags dang ser ba 'bebs so// sa nad gzhon nu mnan te 'bum bzlas na gzhon nu ma thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// las thams cad kyang byed par gyur to// / 
24a7(rgyud): nyi ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bdud rtsi'i rna sbyin par 'gyur te/ des na lha'i lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zla ba la 'bar ba'i lta bas mgu bar bltas te/ stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ zla ba gnyis su mthong ste
24a8(rgyud): de phyin chad zla ba dang mtshungs pa'i 'odi dang mdangs su 'gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi mig tu mdzes shing sems can thams cad kyi snying du sdig par 'gyur ro// gza' chen po'i gzugs
24b1(rgyud): la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de nas be con thob ste/ be con des ni 'thubs na dgra las rgyal zhing nor thams cad thob po// sgyu glang gi gnas su song ste 'bum bzlas na skya gleng las kun byed do// rgun gyis myos
24b2(rgyud): pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na chang gi snod thams cad nim 'tsho'i bar du mi zad par 'gyur ro// ma du ka ra la bltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro// rgyal ba la bltas te 'bum bzlas
24b3(rgyud): na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rgyal ba thob pa mnan te 'bum bzlas na thams cad lus rgyal bar 'gyur ro// mdzod skyong rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te stong phrag brgya
24b4(rgyud): bzlas na bza' ba dang btung ba mi zad par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyis tshe 'di la zad par mi nus so// rlung mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ rlung gis de dang / 'thun pa'i 'dod pa thams cad byed pa/ 
24b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// me la bltas te 'bum bzlas na me'i dbus su 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang 'gro na yang mi tshig ste/ ma'i gzir gyur zhing nyin gcig kyang gser srang re re sbyin no// ngal+la sa bo mnan te 'bum bzlas na/ 
24b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag por gyur nas nor thams cad kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro// phag mo mdzan du byas te stong phrag bzlas nas la yod pa'i gter 'byon to// gshin rje mnan te 'bum bzlas na ma
24b7(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur ro// rnam par 'dren pa'i cha lugs la bltas te 'bum bzlas na de las thams cad pa'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// klu ba ru Na mnan te 'bum bzlas na klu thams cad las kun byed pa'i g.yog tu
24b8(rgyud): 'gyur ro// ma'i gnas su song ste stong phrag brgya bzlas na ma thams cad g.yog byed cing don thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// sa la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la
25a1(rgyud): te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i sems can thams cad 'gyel ba dang dbang byed par 'gyur zhing nam mkhan yang 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa'i 'og mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya
25a2(rgyud): bzlas na sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang du 'gyur ro// rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gser gyi dong tsau la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// skyes pa bzung
25a3(rgyud): ste 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bud med bzung ste stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rta la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar
25a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// glang po che la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung ste/ 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gos dang rgyan
25a5(rgyud): gyi chos la blta zhing stong phrag brgya brgya bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dpal mo la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshe dbyangs ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na tshig rnam par
25a6(rgyud): dag par 'gyur te/ des bslangs na tsaM bslangs pa kun ster bar 'gyur ro// gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// grub byed mu bzung nas bzlas na 'das pa dang
25a7(rgyud): da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa kun bsten cing ched du ma bslangs par nor byin par 'gyur ro// sa la ban cika mnan nas 'bum bzlas na nyin re bzhin yang gser gyi dong tse brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyur ro// / 
25a8(rgyud): gos kyi sgrog ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zad par 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gi snod mnan te bzlas na de dang de mi zad par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan te 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci
25b1(rgyud): 'dod pa kun sbyin par 'gyur ro// srin po mnan te 'bum bzlas na de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// 'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thams cad kyi bdas por 'gyur ro// shA za'i lus byis pa mnan
25b2(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na des de'i g.yog byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa yang sgrub po// ri la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlas na rtswa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// phyugs kyi lhas su 'dug ste
25b3(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na phyugs thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// shing ldan gyi drung du 'bum bzlas nu shing ljon rnams kyis mchog sbyin par 'gyur ro// zhing la 'dug ste 'bum bzlas na zla ba 'bum du 'phel
25b4(rgyud): por 'gyur mo/ tshong pa dang bcus pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad mi bslangs par thob par 'gyur ro// gnas byin can du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro// grong du 'bum bzlas
