25b5(rgyud): na zla ba gcig tshun chan gyis gong de thob po// gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// lha'i rten du 'bum bzlas na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par
25b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro// khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za ba thams cad de'i g.yog tu 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas na snang ba dbang tu 'gyur ro// skyed mo tshul du
25b7(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na skyed mo tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshor 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi gnas su 'bum bzlas na gtor rang 'byung
25b8(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// dgod cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// dgod pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur ro// cang mi zer ba
26a1(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyis 'bum bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi 'dzem par rtags btsugs te 'bum
26a2(rgyud): bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang nam mkha' la 'gro ba grub par 'gyur ro// 'dzem pa la sor mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad 'dren cing 'gug pa dang gtong
26a3(rgyud): ba dang 'gyel ba dang slong ba byed do// 'jom pa blta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'dzem par lig bu mig bcug ste 'bum bzlas ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'dzom par gur
26a4(rgyud): gum bcug ste 'bum bzlas ni des bskyas pas 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// 'jom par bya bla bcug ste 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la 'gro ba grub par 'gyur ro// 'jom par ldong ros bcug ste
26a5(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na rigs 'dzin du 'gyur ro// ral gi thogs te 'bum bzlas na rol gri can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// 'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// kyo ba btang
26a6(rgyud): thogs te 'bum bzlas na kyo ba tang des thams cad 'gug nus par 'gyur ro// rdo rje gsong nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na dra
26a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa lag gis bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i
26a8(rgyud): chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing 'i bum bzlas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas ni phyag na rdo rjes
26b1(rgyud): kyang de mchod na gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ting nge 'dzin thob po// rdo rje snying po thogs te 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur
26b2(rgyud): ro/ rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyis las kun byed nus par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nu la blta zhing 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la yig
26b3(rgyud): snang ste thams cad smra ba dang spobs pa thogs pa med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// sems bsnyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la bskor cing 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams
26b4(rgyud): cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' mdzod la bltas te 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' los sgyu ma thams cad dang don thams cad dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi
26b5(rgyud): zan du ston to// byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bumo bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor bris na 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
26b6(rgyud): bdag po slob dpon dang yid kyis thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pur 'grub
26b7(rgyud): po/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngor phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste rdo rje'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs
26b8(rgyud): pa thams cad dang ba shes gnyen thams cad dang las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i bdag po dang dbang phyug dang byed pa po dang 'byin pa dang / mi zad mi nyams pa dpe 'dod pa
27a1(rgyud): thams cad nyams su myong zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad rnyed cing thob ste sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba grub pa sbyin par 'gyur ba dang / de rang gi gnyen dang // 
27a2(rgyud): bshes gnyen dang grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo // de dag de lnga yang 'grub par byed do// bsams pa tsam gyis sgyu ma thams cad ston te dri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyang
27a3(rgyud): ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho 'phrul ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang ston to// skad cig gis gzugs sna tshogs su ston par 'gyur ro// rdo rje
27a4(rgyud): 'dzin gyi tshe dang stobs dang na tshod dang shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par yang 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing
27a5(rgyud): nas khro bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur ro// hUM zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang / khams gsum
27a6(rgyud): gyi dbang po dang spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing mchod pa dang / sems can thams cad la grub pa bstsol to// de ltar mi zad mi nyams par
27a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las/ phyag na rdo rje'i rtog pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags
27a8(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po
27b1(rgyud): 'dir rang gi snying po 'di brtsol to// gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mchog tu 'gyur ba dang 'jig pa dang gnam dal dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba dang / nad thams cad 'jig
27b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la legs so zhes bya ba byin to// legs so legs so// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po khyod kyis smos
27b3(rgyud): shig / de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// A ro l-i ka/ de nas 'di brjed pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
27b4(rgyud): cad lhan cig tu 'dus te/ 'i rab ri'i rdza mer bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa grwa lA ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te bzhugs
27b5(rgyud): sot+pado na su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po dam
27b6(rgyud): pa ste/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de dbus srung pu mnyam pa ru// grwa bzhi par ni gdab par bya// gnyis pa'i grwa ni sgo bstan te// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya/ 
27b7(rgyud): / tshul du ste// dpung na ni yang ga /  mye ma bdun gis / byung ma myang ba rgyung brib /  sbyong bong dadus su sa/ la ga na mgon bzhugs par bya/ 
27b8(rgyud): ma kun gyi steng rnams su ha sangs rgyas cha lugs bri bar bya// pad ma che mchog phyag rgya yis// der ni slob dpon zhugs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor gnas su 'dug nas ni// rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug pA bA// 
28a1(rgyud): @ji ltar pad mo chu rnams dang // nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis// chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir// 'gro ba chags pa dag 'gyur yin// 'di lan gcig brjod nas bsgoms te/ do na
28a2(rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis kyo tang gis kun drangs la pad mo chen po de spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar dgrol lo// de la pad mo chen po'i kyo ba btang ni 'di'o// u ma hA pad+ma hUM dzaH/ de nas bcom ldan 'dra
28a3(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po de nyid byon te slob dpon la zhal ston par mdzad dam/ yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed do// de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis slob ma gzhug go// der dkar pos g.yogs la
28a4(rgyud): gros dkar po bgos la thod dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o// de nas lag pa g.yon par pad mo byin/ g.yas par sngags
28a5(rgyud): kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skad smos shig/ sangs rgyas thams cod phrad mo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rtag pa ru nI brtag par bya// khyed ni deng nas spyan ras gzigs// de nas phyag rgya chen po
28a6(rgyud): bcing ba dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bslab po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po pad mo zhes bya'o// de nas pad+ma mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ pad mo'i dkyil 'khor
28a7(rgyud): de bzhin du bris la dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin la pad ma mdab ma 'obyed pa'i tshul gyis blta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na/ 'phags pa kun
28a8(rgyud): tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thob po// pad mo'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas pa las de'i dbus su pad mo stong bzhag
28b1(rgyud): ste/ de nas pad mo re re zhing bzlas pa thang res bcom ldan 'das la pad mo stong dbul lo// de nas slob ma bcug ste dam tshig brjod do// slob min bu min ma yin te// dam tshig can la dam tshig
28b2(rgyud): bstan/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni// dag po nyid de pad mo bzhin// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris latamachod pa rnam bzhis mchod do// sangs
28b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad yid kyis te// phyag na rdo rje tshig gis so// lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste// nam mkha'i snying po las kyis so// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras
28b4(rgyud): gzigs dbang pos sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad pa 'di gsungs so// ras la bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po ri rab ri'i rtse mo ni rang gi ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs
28b5(rgyud): pa brgyad mtha' kun du bzhugs par briHde nas zla ba yar gyi tshes zhag gcig la brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyun du bzlas te/ nim spyan ras gzigs dbang / 
28b6(rgyud): dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin ga shegs pa'i sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad ma'i dbus su bzhugs te/ yang de las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku byung nas sgrub pa po'i dbang bskur ba'i gan
28b7(rgyud): su brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlas so// de nas sbyin ras gzigs kyi skur kun gyur te/ skad cig gis bde ba can gyi 'jig rten tu 'gro zhing ldog go// soms can thams cad kyang mthong ste
28b8(rgyud): tsho dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa gzhan 'byung ste/ 'bum bzlas na sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// nyi 'bum bzlas na mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i
29a1(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro// gsum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub thams cad dang de bzhin
29a2(rgyud): gshegs pa la sogs pa dang / phun sum tshogs po thams cad dang / bshes gnyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i 'jug
29a3(rgyud): tu mtshan thal byung du bzlas na de'i nang par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bon nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'thob po// yang na khar zhugs na spyan
29a4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang po 'thob po// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang las su 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas ni bdag bsrung ngo // gnyis pa brjod pas ni gzhan dang grong dang grong khyer bsrung ngo / 
29a5(rgyud): gsum pa brjod pas ni las thams cad byed do// dbab pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug pas so// gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hri zhes bya bas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba
29a6(rgyud): ni rdo rje me tog bzlas te sbyin no// sems can thams cad mnan pa ni sa ser pos so// bud meng dbang du bya ba nI su ma ni'o mye tog la sngags pas so// rlom rkun mnan pa ni yungs dkur
29a7(rgyud): gyi sbyin bsreg gis so// rI dwags dang bya munan pA ni yungasu dkar gtor bas so// sgyu ma bstan pa nIr+m+ma bya'i chung byas so// rmi lAm mthong bar bya ba ni duso gsum du bzlas pas s+ho// 
29a8(rgyud): rmi lam ngan pa gzhil ba ni til gyi sbyin bsreg gis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni khyim bya'i sgo'i sbyin bsreg gis so// bu mo thor bu dbang du bya ba ni bu mo'i sgra'i sbyin
29b1(rgyud): bsreg gis so// yugs mo dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin bsreg gis so// bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin bsreg gis so// 'dod pa thams cad dbang du
29b2(rgyud): bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la mchod pa byas nas nub gsum rlangs par bzlas na/ de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// spyan ras gzigs dpa
29b3(rgyud): po'i spyan sngar nyin+da re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na dre nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis ra ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog brtsol bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla ba
29b4(rgyud): gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum du bzlas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas mchog brtsol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las spyan res gzig
29b5(rgyud): dbang po'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten
29b6(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi snying po dbul gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes su gsol/ 'dris sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa
29b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chen po la skyes bu chen po smros shig ces bka' bstsal to// de nas 'phags
29b8(rgyud): pa nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// tsA ba ga Ta ga ha ha/ de nas 'di brjod pas nam mkha' las dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgyan tham
30a1(rgyud): cad drub gros dang gser dang / nor dang rin po che dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char 'bab po// bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun du rgyan thams cad kyis kyang brgyan te bzhugs so// de nas
30a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin te// rdo rje rin tshan mnyam ldan zhing // grwa brgyad shin du mnyam par ba// rin chen kun dang
30a3(rgyud): ldan par bye/ dar slob dpon zhugs te/ rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag la zhugs nas 'di brjod do// re ba thams cad grub pa yin// nam mkha' grub pa mchog yin te// 
30a4(rgyud): grub shing grub shing sems chen po// bcom ldan thams cad grub par ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi
30a5(rgyud): dbus su nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bzhag la/ de'i thad kar kun du phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa brgyad bya'o// de nas slob ma rdo rje nor bu khu tshur gyis gzhug go/ bcug nas 'di skad ces
30a6(rgyud): brjod do// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir// don zhes bstan pa gang yin te// byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin// de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bslab po// de
30a7(rgyud): dbang bskor ba sbyin pa dang / nor sbyin pa dang / zas sbyin pa dang / chos sbyin pa'o// de la dbang bskur sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o// nor sbyin pa ni sems can thams cad la'o// zas/ 
30a8(rgyud): sbyin pa ni byol song thams cad la'o// chos sbyin po ni sems can mo snang ba thams cad la'o// de nas snying po byin la rin po che thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang
30b1(rgyud): bskur te 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra rad nA b+hi She kA b+hi Shiny+tsa sarba d+hi pa t+ye hUM ba ba Ta Ta ha ha/ de nas rdo rje'i nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bslabs te/ sngags 'di'o// oM pa Ta ha/ rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bcings te
30b2(rgyud): sngags ni 'di'o// oM pa Ta Ta mu baM/ daM nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhi byas te 'byung ngo // dbang thams cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste rdo rje rin po che'i dbus
30b3(rgyud): su bris la lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che ldangs kyi bar bzlas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te/ dbang bskur ba des na thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dkyil 'khru
30b4(rgyud): ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te nam mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs kyi spyan sngar nor dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la de nas de btsud de/ 
30b5(rgyud): thams can bstan nas dam tshig 'di sbyin no// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag/ gal te ni nyin mchod stongs na// khyod kyi nor dang don sogs pa// tshe rabs dkan tu 'jig par 'gyur// de la
30b6(rgyud): 'di ni mnan pa'i snying po'o// u ba ba ta Ta ya swA hA// de nas chus dbang bskur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bris la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams
30b7(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan par byas te/ de'i dbus su bzhig nas der btsud de/ de nas las rnam pa lnga bslab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dbong sbyin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya'o// de nas
30b8(rgyud): nor sbyin pa ni dge slong dang / bram ze la sogs pa la ci nas kyis sbyin no// de nas zas sbyin pa ni byol song gi rnams la sbyin no// de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrin can thams cad la sbyin no// 
31a1(rgyud): @/ de nas chos sbyin pa ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no// las kyi dkrol 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste/ ras lnga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brgyan pa
31a2(rgyud): rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bar bri ste/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'phagos pa nam mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o// g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das phyag
31a3(rgyud): na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de nas ras la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ma shar nas brtsams te/ phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bcom ldan 'das
31a4(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po ras la bris pa de las byung nas sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ba des na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs par yang las su 'gyur
31a5(rgyud): ba ni 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnyed do// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na
31a6(rgyud): sman ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad brtsol bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid thob po// rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sder 'bum bzlas na
31a7(rgyud): nam mkha' la khu tshur bcangs pas gser gyi dong tse 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob po// des nor yang skyo bar byed do// rdo rje 'khor lo
31a8(rgyud): srin lag gi so rims mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i mdzad kun nas mkhyud de 'bum bzlas na nam mkha' la nor thams cad dang / yo byad zad mi shes par
31b1(rgyud): 'byung po khyams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ldan gnam gyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo // de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad kyi
31b2(rgyud): nor gyi bdag por 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las nam mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi byang chub sems dpas thams cad 'dus
31b3(rgyud): pa'i 'khor thams cad bskyod nas bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di dbul bya
31b4(rgyud): bgyi sted/ bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa las rdo rje'i ri rab bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/ nges 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams
31b5(rgyud): 'grib pa thams cad grub par byas te/ de'i bri skyed pa nA sa de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi byar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khu tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po la ldegros so zhes bya ba
31b6(rgyud): byin tI legs so legs so rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smos shig/ de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsung
31b7(rgyud): sau oM ru Tu ru nu hUM mA rga de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / 'khor thams cad dang bcas nas ri rang ri'i rtse mor btsom+b+ha ldan 'das ga la ba der lag
31b8(rgyud): te lag po gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyis phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyile 'khor chen por gyur nas
32a1(rgyud): @'khod do// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor chen po
32a2(rgyud): dam pa ste// rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dra ba ni// rdo rje khu tshur zhes gsungs so// de yi dbus su sems chen po// rdo rje khu tshur bzhag par bya// rdo rje khu tshur rdo rjer bcas// lag pa gnyis ni btsir bar bya/ 
32a3(rgyud): de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas gzugs rnams bzhag par bya// de dag gi ni gra dag tu// byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon
32a4(rgyud): gyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhugs lnga 'di zhes brjod ci pAHhUM da kI Ni sma ra phaT/ dwe nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par 'gyur ro/ 
32a5(rgyud): de la phyag rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bai rA mi nus so// de nas snying po 'dis bdag gi snying khar dgol lo// oM badz+ra muSh+NI mu// de nas slob mi gzhug ste/ rdo rje khu tshu rA dam tshig gi phyag
32a6(rgyud): rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa phreng ba dang bcas par byas te/ de bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste de nas de 'di zhes brjod do// dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btig
32a7(rgyud): pa ni/ chos kyi phyag rgya dang / rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang btab po// khyod chos dang rdo rje las gang 'dod/ des smras pa/ gnyis ka'o zhe na/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis rdo rje dang de bzhin ga
32a8(rgyud): pa'i cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/ dgol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying khar dgrol lo// de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o// g.yas par de bzhi
32b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'o// de ste de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no// de ste rdo rje'o zhes zer na/ de'i lhag pa g.yon par rdo rje byin la 'di skad ces 'di gnyis ni khyod kyis
32b2(rgyud): 'grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod par byos shig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa khrol la dkyil 'khor bstan te 'di zhes smros shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// lus dang ngag sems
32b3(rgyud): rdo rje rnams// bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste// bcings la rdo rje khu tshur bshad// de nas snying po byin la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs shig/ dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag rgya'i
32b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po tshul bzhin du// dkyil 'khor tham cad yang dag bri// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// thams cad rgyan gyis
32b5(rgyud): brgyan pa yi// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pa'o// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bzhi rnams bri bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su// rdo rje rin tshon kyang de bzhin// de bzhin rdo rje pad mo dbus
32b6(rgyud): rdo rje rgya khram bri bar bya'o// gru yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya// de nas btsud nas phyag rgya kun// bcing ba yang ni bslab par bya// sgrub pa gsung ba dag dang ni// bskul ba
32b7(rgyud): gsang ba bslab par bya/ 'di rnams thams cad kun bris nas// bsgrubs shig ces ni brjod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ de bzhin du mtshan ma ngan
32b8(rgyud): nas 'di zhes brjod do// ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthing la// phyag rgya shes pa bstan na ni// rdo rje rin tshon rgyal ba dang // sna tshogs pas khyod sod par 'gyur// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi
33a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor babyung ste/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab po// de la phyag rgya bcing ba 'di'o// rdo rje bcing ba kun byas la// sor mo
33a2(rgyud): thams cad dgug byas te// rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya bcing // de las lag pa'i phyog rgya bcing ngo // de lta bur mi ldan na 'dod pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pas ni/ dam tshig chen po
33a3(rgyud): yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi snying po thang cig bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi ni ma yin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi sgrub pa 'byung ste/ 
33a4(rgyud): 'o ma mthung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya btsongs nas 'bum bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur tham
33a5(rgyud): cad kyis brgyan par bris la/ phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i dar gis bcings la de'i thad kar thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
33a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcing bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams
33a7(rgyud): cad kyang ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun du sbyang nas/ 
33a8(rgyud): bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bsgoms la mtshan thal byung bzlas so// de nas nam phyed na bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'di brjod cig/ hU~M badz+ra mu
33b1(rgyud): ha na ha na sarba mA ra ya phaT/ de nas nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon te lus kun du 'jug go// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
33b2(rgyud): rgyas su 'gyur ro// yang ras kyi cho ga gzhan 'byung ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shugs pa rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris te/ de'i g.yas su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i
33b3(rgyud): khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis br-irgyan pa sku mdog sngo sangs ud pa la sngon po lta bu rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya g.yon pa'i rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste de'i
33b4(rgyud): g.yas su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzhon nu ma ngom tshig gi khu tshur gyis rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dmar mor bya'o// de'i thad du rdo rjegs
33b5(rgyud): phur ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa spyan gsum pa lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje gsol phur thogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi rtse g.yon phyogs su spyan ras gzigs dbang po thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan
33b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa khyad myo dang mchog skyon gyi phyag tu byas pa/ de'i g.yon du pad mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya'o// de'i g.yon du rdo rje dpal mo dang rdo rje pho
33b7(rgyud): mo'o// rdo rje dpal mo ni gser gyi sku mdog dpal gyi gzugs la khyog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog sngon po la rdo rje khar ba 'chang ba'o// de nas zlo ba yar gyi chos gtsug nas brtsams nas
33b8(rgyud): rdorjekhu chur byed ma tshig phyag rgya btsongs nas stong phrag brgya nas gzugs kyi ras de las phaT ces bya ba thos na de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje grub par gyur to// de phyin tshad nam ma
34a1(rgyud): dkyil na spyod cing 'dod na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen du yang 'gro'o// ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// kun du 'khyil pa'i skra can lo bcu drug lon pa'i lus su
34a2(rgyud): gyur nas 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur ro// rdo rje khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas bcad pa la sogs pa thams cad
34a3(rgyud): byed nus par 'gyur ro// gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas shing rgas pa dang 'chi bar yang mi 'gyur ro// yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i g.yas phyogs su phyag na rdzo
34a4(rgyud): rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sku mdog ud po la sngon po'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyor la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/ de'i g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma dam
34a5(rgyud): tshig gi khu tshur rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ yid tsam 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba lag pa g.yos pa na a mra'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/ g.yon pa na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to// de nas
34a6(rgyud): ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum srung la/ gu gal gyi ril bu sran ma tsam du ru ka'i 'bru mar skyugs pa brgyad stong du ba med pa'i medag ma la bsreg go// de nas gzugs de 'gul te/ bcom ldan
34a7(rgyud): 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis mchog brtsol po ni rgyal po 'am 'khor lo bskor ba 'am gter ram lha ma yin la dbang ba 'am sa'i 'og brjod pa 'am/ 
34a8(rgyud): sa brjod pa 'am/ khams brjod pa 'am/ 'dod pa'i gzugs sam mi snang ba 'am/ nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams
34b1(rgyud): rgyud kyis brgyan pa bris la/ de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshun macangs la ud pa la skyon po'i sku'i mdog tu byas la de'i spyan sngar dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur bcings te
34b2(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ni mtshan gsum gsumo thal byung bzlas na/ nam phyed na bcom ldan 'das nyid byon te mchog brtsol bar 'gyur ro// ros sam shing leg gam rtsig nges la bcom ldan
34b3(rgyud): 'das ma rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang a mra'i 'bras bu thogs par byas te/ de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed pa/ 
34b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// de nasde ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rdo rje dam tshig gi khu tshur bcings la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas
34b5(rgyud): pa'i khu tshur bcings ni phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur pa ni 'bum bzlas pas so// lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te stong phrag brgya bzlas na khu tshur bcangs
34b6(rgyud): des mi snang bar 'gyur te dgol na yang snang ngo // rdo rje bcings pa'i khu tshur byas la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / myos par bya ba dang / gnyid
34b7(rgyud): log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la rdo rje khu tshu ro bcangs te 'bum bzlas ni rdo rje khu tshur byabs pa tsam gyis nam mkho la nor dang / gser dang / mu ti gau dang rgyan dang rin po che dang
34b8(rgyud): gos dang bza' ba dang / btang ba dang / me dang / chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / myu gu dang / yi ge dang / 'thab cha dang stan skyob dang / mtshon cha dang / glegs bam dang / rtog pa dang / mdo sde dang / sangs rgyas kyi skra la so
35a1(rgyud): pa dngos po gnas pa dang / 'gro ba ci 'dod pa 'gug par byed do// g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang 'gro ba thams cad 'gug pa dang / 
35a2(rgyud): 'dren pa dang / 'gyel bar nus par 'gyur ro// khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad gtan 'pho nus par 'gyur ro// g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings la stong phrag bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams cad las/ 
35a3(rgyud): nor dang gser dang / rgyan dang / gos dang / mtshon dang / me tig dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad 'gug go// gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la sogs pa thams cad kyang 'gug go// bud
35a4(rgyud): med kyi nu ma dang mngal phyogs dang / mi gra dang sna dang / mchu dang / rna ba dang mgo dang / brla dang / ska rags dpa gsang sbra la sogs pa dngos po thams cad 'gug go// dkrol na thar par 'gyur ro// nyin zhag gicig srung la
35a5(rgyud): lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te stong phrag brgya bzlas na de phyin chad khu tshur bcings pas las thams cad byed do// de la las rnams ni 'gug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang 'ongs
35a6(rgyud): par bya ba dang / rmugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gnyid log pa dang na bslang ba dang / drang ba dang / bsgyel ba dang / brdab pa dang / bsrad pa dang / dbye ba dang / gos zlog pa dang / gtan 'phro ba dang gso ba dang / sgyu ma thams
35a7(rgyud): cang bstan pa dang / dus tshigos bsgyur ba dang / sa la sogs pa g.yo bra dang thams cad la dbab pa dang / dkyil 'khor ba zhugs pa dang / gor byed pa dpo glu len pa dang sngon ma byung ba'i bya ba'i sbyor ba dang / so sor lung bstan pa
35a8(rgyud): dpa'akhrul 'khor thams cad gzhom pa dang / sgo thams cad dbye ba dag gnod pa thams cad 'jug pa dang / drig thams cad bslang ba dang / ma rung bar bya ba dang thams cad spang ba dang / thams cad kyi
35b1(rgyud): rgyurgya gzhom pa dang / thams cad 'gems pa dang gas pa sbyar ba dang / sbrul bskrad pa dang / gzung ba dang / btang ba dang / ser ba dang / char dbab pa dang / klog dbyung ba dang thams cad bcad pa dang / sngan chad med
35b2(rgyud): pa'i gos dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bya dang / ri dgas dgug pa dang / gtong ba dang / gzugs mang po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba
35b3(rgyud): bstan pa la sogs pa 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
35b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rang gi snying po 'jig rten gsum ltas rnam par rgyu lta ba'i rtog pa 'dinA brtsal bar bgyi ste/ 
35b5(rgyud): gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod brjod par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis smros shig ces
35b6(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsungs pa/ A ra pa tsa na/ de nas 'di brjod ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid las yi ge mnyam pa
35b7(rgyud): nyid sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yar gyi de ches bcu bzhi 'am bcwo lnga la bris te
35b8(rgyud): de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o// rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la de'i thad kar thams cad du yi ge a ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o// de nas slob pa/ 
36a1(rgyud): @#/ gyis rdo rje'i ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/ Ni b+ha ra na tsAkra/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'di lnga brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yang brtsom
36a2(rgyud): te/ de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' la yi ge byis te thams cad gsung ngo // de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste 'di zhes smros shig deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob par 'gyur
36a3(rgyud): gyis/ snying po 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra zhig dam tshig 'dis khyod la gnod par 'gyur ta re/ de la gsang ba'i yi ge ni 'di'o// a ra pa tsa na/ zhes bya ste/ 'dod pa thams cad 'thob po// de ci'i phyir zhe
36a4(rgyud): na/ a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o// ra zhes bya ba ni chags pa'o// pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa'o// tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o// na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o// de ltar 'dod pa dang chags pa dang don dam pa
36a5(rgyud): dang / spyod pa dang / rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te/ de bas na/ 
36a6(rgyud): snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro// de nas phag rgya bcing ba slob po// spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o// de nas ral gri'i dkyil 'khor 'byung
36a7(rgyud): ste/ de bzhin du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbus su rol gri bzhag ste/ mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa grub par 'gyur ro// rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'a
36a8(rgyud): ro&dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du bris la zhags nas 'di zhes brjod do// a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM.Ad+ya nata pan na tata/ a/ yig ni chos thams cad
36b1(rgyud): kyisgo ste thog ma nas mA skyes pa'i phyir ro// zhes nang par langs nas nyin re la na re brjod na mtshams med pa thams cad kyis kyang mi gos so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor
36b2(rgyud): 'byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhug nas mchod pa rnam bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha don byed pa dang / bsgoms pas so// las kyi dkyil 'khor
36b3(rgyud): rgotshod nas sgrub 'dod pos dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ras la bris la yi ge phreng ba thams cad brjod de 'di skad du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis grub pas so// zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'bum
36b4(rgyud): bzlas na sgribs pa ma zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa drung nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang lus su 'gyur ba ni lan gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad wa
36b5(rgyud): grol mo// gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur no// gsum bzlas pas cing nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro// bzhi bzlas pas rlon dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 
36b6(rgyud): bzlas pas myur du blo na mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sku gtung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi ge phreng ba g.yas phyogs nas oM zhes bya ba'i drung du ne zhes bya ba
36b7(rgyud): phyin gyi bar du bri'o// de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/ yi ga re re 'bum re rdzogs ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / phyag na rdo rje cig char 'grub ste/ nyon re zhing mtha
36b8(rgyud): bor bstan nas chos bshad de slar gshegs so// tshe 'di nyid la 'tshang rgya ba man chad kyang bstsol to// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jam dpal gzhon na'i rtog
37a1(rgyud): de nus bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal por
37a2(rgyud): snying po 'di brtsol bar bgyi ste gang brjod pa tsam gyis dokyil 'khor thams cud ngu zhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpo' lnga bskul to// de nas rdo rje
37a3(rgyud): 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba/ oM badz+ra tsikra hUM/ de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang / sems can thams cad
37a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugs so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin bris la// rdo rje 'khor lo bdag che ba// rang gi phyag rgya lag na thogs// de yi
37a5(rgyud): dbus su bzhag par bya// de yi thad kar thams cad du// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri// de yang sems can chen po rnams// de dag nyid ni legs par bri// de nas blo ldan thig mo ru// rdo rje 'khor los
37a6(rgyud): 'jug par bya/ zhugaso nas snying po 'di bzlas so// dzeHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod nas de nas des bcom ldan 'das dges te grub pa thams cad rab tu brtsal to// de bzhin du slob ma bcug nas de nyid du bsgrub pa
37a7(rgyud): bya'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbus su rdo rje bris te/ de bzhin du bzlas ni rdo rje
37a8(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste 'di zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'khor los 'jug po yis// mthong ba dang de bzhin bsgrubs na// rtog pa thams cad 'grus
37b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ de bas rtag tu bsgrub par bya// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris pa de bzhin du// phyag rgya shes pa 'grub pa'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtan pas thams cad kyi// bla med las ni bslab par bya
37b2(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad byed do// ji ltar dga' ba'i cho ga 'am rtog pa las bshad pas bsgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
37b3(rgyud): ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kying 'jig rten gsum las rnam
37b4(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po 'dir rang gi snying po brtsal bar bgyi ste/ snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis smros shig ces gsungs so// de na
37b5(rgyud): nam mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs so// oM ga gan swa b+ha l+la badz+ra so// de nas de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la nam mkha' lus mchod pa kun du 'byung bar byas so// de nas dkyil 'khor
37b6(rgyud): 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i 'khor lo bzhin du bri// de yi dbus su nor chen te// nas mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya// rgyal ba kun gyis bskor bar ro// dang por slob dpon 'jug pa ni// mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyas so// 
37b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de ru zhugs nas ni// rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste/ de bzhin du slob mo yang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod lo phyag rgya yang slobs shig
37b8(rgyud): mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor te yid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la der zhags nas 'di skad brjod cig/ 'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de bden pa gang gis
38a1(rgyud): nam mkha' gzugs mad pa las gzugs 'byung ba bden pa des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad nam mkha' las 'byung
38a2(rgyud): bar gyur cig ces byas nas 'dug ste/ rdo rje kun gyi phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na nas nam mkha' lngas mchod pa'i rnam pa thams cad dang don thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa tham
38a3(rgyud): cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig go zhes brjod cig/ 'byung ba kun las nam mkha' ni// 'byung ba chen po lnga pa'o// nam mkha
38a4(rgyud): las ni 'dod pa 'byung // 'dod pa'i mchod pa grub gyur cig ces smras nas/ 'dis khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cig ces bsgos shig dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// slob
38a5(rgyud): ma nam mkha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'dir bcug la der slob ma la yid kyis mchod pa yang slobs shig/ yid kyis 'di skad brjod cig/ nam mkha'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
38a6(rgyud): cad la mchod do zhes nyin re zhing byas na 'grub po// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las nam mkha' mdzod kyi rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa
38a7(rgyud): byam smra ba byang chub sems dpas 'di skad gasngal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam por rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po brtsal bar bgyi ste/ gang brjod pa
38a8(rgyud): tsam gyis sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smros shig ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa'i byang chub sems dpas
38b1(rgyud): rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM mai tri dr-iny+dza tsi to ta tiSh+Tha hoHngo nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'kho/ 
38b2(rgyud): 'byung ste/ de nas 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bris la der byams pa bzhag nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhi byas te/ go cha brtan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do// 
38b3(rgyud): badz+ra dr-i D+ha triSh+ThaH/ de nas byams pa'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis gzud do// btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya
38b4(rgyud): bslabs te/ de nas go chos go bskon no// brtan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrubs shig/ byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor du
38b5(rgyud): bcug la 'di zhes brjod do// rangs sam yang na khros kyang rung // mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te// 'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na// byams pa chen po sgom par gyis// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas las kyi
38b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du btsud do 'di bslab bo// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can thams cad dgo bar gyur cigo/ 'byung po thams cad la byams pa dang byol song thams cad la mi 'jigs pa
38b7(rgyud): sbyin no// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i sgrub pas sgrub po// las rnams kyang yid kyis cir dad pa'i cho ga dang byams pas bsgrubs shig/ 'jig rten gsu
38b8(rgyud): mes rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las byams pa'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la rdo rje ga pa'i dam pa la sogs pas mgos phyag 'argyal te 'jig rten gsum las rnam
39a1(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po dul lo// oMT+Ta hU~M ban d+ha badz+ra shU la/ oM chenad+ha d+hu n+yakra pakra/ oM b+hur b+hu ba swA/ oM ha na bin d+ha bad+d+ha hUM phaT oM la la la la A be shag rtsu
39a2(rgyud): da ni de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/ dkyil 'khor zlum po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa'i srad bu'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po bri/ der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad du bri 'am/ bzhag pa'am mthun tshon gyi thig le
39a3(rgyud): yang bzhag go// de nas thog mar slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'jug go// g.yon logs nas rdo rje slob ma yang bcug ste/ de nas phyag rgya yang bslab po// de phyin chad thams ca
39a4(rgyud): 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rigs 'dzin du 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rig pa'i blon po chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la sogs
39a5(rgyud): pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams phul ba/ oM a mr-i ta kuN Da li kha kha khA khA kro d+ha dz+wa la mA la hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pra bi s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ oM kA la daN
39a6(rgyud): Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM kA la pA shA gra A kaT+Ta D+ha hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste / dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par bris la de'i dbus su rdo rje bzhig go// phyogs bzhir ni khro bo rnams de bzhin du bar chad
39a7(rgyud): byas la dgod do// de nas slob dpon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab pa// de nas thams cad dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba dang / gtan 'pho ba dang bsrung ba 'grub po// rdo rje khro
39a8(rgyud): rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa tshogs kyi gtso bos snying po 'di rnams phul lo// oM ma ti ba la ka ma hA ga Na de bi pa ri pU ra d+ha rin sarba duSh+TA nAn phaT/ oM mA lA d+ha ra tsa la tsa lA ya hAM/ oM d+hi nur d+ha ra ba
39b1(rgyud): ku ru sarba satwA nAM swA hA/ oM dza ya bi dza ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor 'byung ste gzhu lta bur bris la der rdo rje bzhag go// g.yas su gnyis g.yon du yang gnyis so// de nas rdo rje srin po'i phyag rgyas btsud de de nas
39b2(rgyud): phyag rgya sla bas nas chos bslabs pa ni gang dge ba dang drin bzo dang / lha'i 'khor mthong ba ma rtogs pa gzhan rnams de dag thams cad kun/ mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya// 'jig rten gsum las rnam
39b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las tshogs kyi gtso bo'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje gtun shing la sogs pa'i pho nyas rang gi snying po smras pa/ oM laM ga liM hUM/ oM ma hA phaT hU~M/ oM badz+ra dz+wa lA ya swA hA/ oM bi ga ta b+h+ya/ 
39b4(rgyud): ra ba de hi me sar ban hUM phaT de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ni shing rta dang 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bris te dbus su rdo rje bzhag nas rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgyas bcug lnga las 'di bslab po// mi dgra
39b5(rgyud): ba'i sems can thams cad 'thung shig/ phrogs shig/ bsrogs shig/ zo shig/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcing ba bslab po// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las pho nya'i tshogs
39b6(rgyud): kyi rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje kyo ba btang la sogs pa bran rnams kyis 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po 'dir rang
39b7(rgyud): gi snying po 'di 'bul lo// oM ba rA haM daMSh+Tod ka Ta bi ka To d+hA ra sarba na kha na kha na hUM phaT oM sarba mA ra da Na Da hU~M phaT/ oM bI ga te ke daMSh+Ti b+hin da hU~M phAT/ oM ma hA ma Ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'dri
39b8(rgyud): gru gsum par bris la mngon sum du byed pa'i phyag rgyas zhags nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste rang gi mchod pa ni dbus kyi rdo rje la mchod do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa
40a1(rgyud): @#// chen po'i rgyal po las bran gyi rtog pa'o// de nas thams cad kyis sku rtsi'i sgra 'thon te gar gyi mchod pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas rang rang gi snying po phul lo// de nas rdo rje'i blon
40a2(rgyud): mo chen mo dag gis smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ra la l-i hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsakra tshi na da hUM phaT/ oM shA na ti hUM/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha na tshin da hUM phaT/ oM kA mA ra A be shra ga Na ti ki ra Na ra Na tsa lA ya sarba duSh+TA na hUM phaT de nas de dag
40a3(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgo bzhi'i sgor 'khor lo la sogs pa bri'o// de'i dbus su rdo rje khro mo'i lag na rdo rje'i gsal phur can bzhag go/ dam tshig gi cho ga ni de bzhin no// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba
40a4(rgyud): rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyis rang gi snying po smras pa/ hUM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM sa~M mya kro d+he hUM phaT/ oM daN Da d+ha ra Ni hUM phaT oM piM ga li hUM phaT kyi
40a5(rgyud): 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te/ de'i dbus su rdo rje bzhag go// cha bzhir dgos pa rnams la bzhi po rim gyis bzhag go// 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do// 'di ni khro mo'i dkyil 'khor ro// 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa/ 
40a6(rgyud): / rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po las rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o// de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM kharga mA ri Ni hrI/ oM a sha pi ba d+ha hi ra ma ho// hUM ba she sa ma ye hUMHhUM sarba ma nr-i ti prI ye ho// de nas de dag gi dkyi
40a7(rgyud): 'khor ni zlum po ste/ sgo bzhi pa dbus su se ral srang bu byas te thig bzhi btab la rim pa bzhir bri'o// gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du zlum par thig bzhi rim tu btA ba lA de'i dbus su gnod sbyin gyi
40a8(rgyud): gdong bri'i ngos bzhir ni rim gyis te shar phyogs nas brtsams la bri 'am bzhag par bya'o// sgo bzhir rdo rje mngag gzhug ma bri 'am bzhig go// de'i snying po ni 'di'o// b+h+r-i gi ri Ti b+h+yo b+h+yoHde ltar rig pa'i blon mo
40b1(rgyud): chen mo la sogs pa thams cad du gyis shig/ 'dis thang cig bzlas pas thams cad khugs so// de nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bo bzung ste/ phyag 'tshal nas dkyis/ 
40b2(rgyud): mo dkrung gir byed cing zhugs la dbab po// babs nas dam tshig byin cig/ sarba mA ra ya khA da pi ba de he ba ra sa ma ya ho// de nas de bzhin du dam tshig sbyin no// glu gar dang sil snyan dang / zlos dang skom gyis tha
40b3(rgyud): cad tshim par byas la dril bu phab ste/ de nas dngos grub thams cad dang bde ba thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rnyed nas rnal 'byor drang nam mkha' lha 'gro ba la sogs pa yang 'thob po
40b4(rgyud): smros shig/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje tshogs ma mo'i rtog pa'o// de nas rdo rje phro nya mo rnams kyis smras pa// oM b+h+yo kI li mA ra NI bad+ma rAk+Sha si ha na sarba
40b5(rgyud): na d+hi ma/ oM b+hu ta ne tra oM mA ra ka ra bag tre hUM pheM ga dkyil 'khor grwa lnga par bris te/ rdo rje ni grwa'i dbus su bzhug go/ bzhir ni rdo rje pho nya mo bzhag ste/ cho ga de bzhin du bya'o// 'jig rten gsum lngas
40b6(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje pho nya mo'i rtog pa'o// rdo rje bran mo rnams kyis smras pa/ oM bA rA hi badz+ra mu khi nr-i tod d+ha ra pA la na sa ma ya ma nu sma ra A bau shA be shwA hUM phaT/ oM kA li kA
40b7(rgyud): pA la mA lA d+hA ri Ni ka TA kA Ta ma Ta ma Ta/ khA dA pi bi mA rA y+ya sarba mA ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM pu ti ni uts+tshash+ma r+ye hriM/ khA da sarba shi Sha yA swA hA/ hU~M m+bA rA kA ra mu khi ha ra ha rA hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor glu bzhi la sgro bzhir d+hU/ 
40b8(rgyud): nas de'i dbus su rdo rje bris ted bzhin gan gyis mchid do// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po la sa bra ni ma'i rtog pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas phyin
41a1(rgyud): na rdo rje la 'ang gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ba 'dzin pa khyod yin no// de bas na rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di don yod cing myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sems
41a2(rgyud): can thams cad dngos grub dam pa bde blag tu thob par gyur pa'i phyi ma'i rgyud shod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'du la te/ dad pa dang mi ldani pa sdig pa byed pa brdzun
41a3(rgyud): smra ba lde lo can dka' bar spyod pa mi bzod pa snyam las can 'dod tshogs dang bral bas 'dul ba rtog tu chags pa de dag gi don gyi phyir gang gis sems can de dag bya ba thams cad byed bzhin pa dang brtson
41a4(rgyud): 'grus med pa dang dka' ba spyad pa'ang med par bde blag tu tshe 'di nyid la myur du 'grub par 'gyur pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis shod cig 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni yul la ma
41a5(rgyud): par dga' zhing bdag gi gro gos po dang / pha dang ma dang bu dang chung ma rnams mthong 'dod cing de yang sred pas 'khor ba ste phyogs nas phyogs su 'gro yang mi nus nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rig 'dzin gyi gnas su
41a6(rgyud): lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ga las byung / phyag na rdo rje ga las skyes/ rdo rje yang ni ga
41a7(rgyud): las 'byung / phyagar+b+ha snying po rig pa dang // sngags rnams khyod par ni zhig yod// gsang po sgrub pa ji lta bu// phyag rgya ba cing ba ji lta bu// de rnams kyi ni de nyid gang // byin gyi brlabs sogs ji lta bu// sgrub pa rnams
41a8(rgyud): ji ltar mthong // dngos grub 'dod pa ji lta bu// ras la ri mo ji ltar bri// sku gzugs tshad ni ji tsam zhig/ ji ltar bzlas pa bya bar gsungs// ci 'dra bar na mchod pa bgyi// bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub// ji
41b1(rgyud): ltar grub pa myur bar 'gyur// slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur// las rnams sgrub pa ji ltar bya// de dag gi ni de nyid gsang // thams cad bradag la bshad pa'i rigs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bstan te/ 
41b2(rgyud): sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// kun du bzang po thams cad dag/ 'dod pa 'gro ba bdag po yin// sems can kun sems gang yin pa// brtan pas sems dpa' bya ba'o// / 
41b3(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin// nges par rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// de la smras pa/ sems gzugs med pa la ji ltar na bsra ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ba na sha/ 
41b4(rgyud): rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur pa bzhin te/ sdug pa dang chags pa dang / bde ba dang rnam par shes pa gzugs rnams 'dus pa las sems can skye ba dang ji ltar klu rnams khros pa'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzin de/ 
41b5(rgyud): pas nam mkha' las gnam lcags 'byung ba 'am klog dang bcas pa 'byung ba de bzhin du nges pa dag las rdo rje nyid du 'gyur te sems dpar byin brlabs sbyor ba yis rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ro// bcom
41b6(rgyud): ldan rdo rje de nyid ni// bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur ro// de la sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor ba grang zhe na/ sems dpa' kun gyi bdag ce na/ bdag nyid la yang gnas so zhes// byin gyis brla
41b7(rgyud): nus sems dpa' badrug yin zhes nga tshu lnga bsgom par bya// de nyid bcom ldan sems dpa' ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ba yin// rang sems so sor brtags pa ni/ sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid yin
41b8(rgyud): nyid phyag na rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis so// 'jig rten dbang po nam mkha' snying// de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do// sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid la// de nyid rdo rje 'chang ba'i rigos// de nyid spyan ras
42a1(rgyud): @/ gzigs kyi rigs// de nyid nor bu'i rigs son te// khams gsum de nyid yin zhes gsungs// 'jig rten gsum po'ang de nyid do// de nyid byed dang 'byin pa po// sems can kun gyi mes po'o/ 
42a2(rgyud): de nyid sems can gnas yin te// 'byung ba che rnams de nyid do// de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste// gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba yin// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes
42a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de kho na nyid chen po zhes bya ba'i rab tu bya'o// de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa'i khyad par gyi rab tu bya ba ste snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba dang ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'o// de la
42a4(rgyud): sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang brjod pa dang smra bo ni snying po brjod pa ste/ snying po brjod pas na snying gis bsam pa'i grub pa thob po zhes bya ba ni snying po'i khyad par ro// de nas phyag rgya'i khyad par ni// rdo rje
42a5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// gzugs brnyan sbyong ba 'di dag ni// phyag rgya kun gyi khyad par te// 'byung ba yang ni de yis bstan// ji ltar jo bo'i rgya mthong na// bran rnams 'gal bar mi byed pa// de bzhin rgyal ba nyid
42a6(rgyud): rnams kyang / phyag rgya 'da' bar yong mi mdzad// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// ji ltar gnas dang 'thun byas la// mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// sems dpa' chen por bdag nyid sgyur// de ni phyag rgya chen
42a7(rgyud): po'o// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// sor snol brtan pa dam tshig ste// sems kyi shes rab ldan pa las// gnyis phye las kyi phyag rgya yin// de dag dam tshig rtsa ba ste// rtsa byung bcing ba'i rgyu yi mchog/ gang
42a8(rgyud): gis thams cad lus brtan 'gyur// de phyir phyag rgya brjod pa yin// gang gis thams cad rgyas btab pa// chud mi za zhing rab sbas te// mnga' bdag gzugs brnyan 'chang bas na// sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'bru
42b1(rgyud): glang dag mthong nas sangs rgyas dang / sems dpa' la sogs mthong bar 'gyur// dmachog nyams pas gzir bas na// 'da' bar mi 'gyur 'grub por 'gyur// phyag rgya'i khyad par yin te dron dam pa'i mtsha
42b2(rgyud): nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o// de la sngags kyi khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ ngag tsam spros pa med pa ste// sangs rgyas bka' yis grub pa nyid// chos kyi tshig gis bskul ba ste// de dag sngags zhes bya ba yin// de la
42b3(rgyud): rig pa'i khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa ni med par byed// ma rig de bzhin chud par byed// don rnams rtogs par gyur pas na// rig pa zhes ni de phyir bya// snying po dang phyag rgya dang sngags dang rig pa'i rab tu bya ba
42b4(rgyud): gnyis pa'o// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba'i rab tu dbye ba bshad do zhes bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la phyag rgya chen po ni de nyid bskul ba'i snying po
42b5(rgyud): bcing ngo // dam tshig dong las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje tsong ba dang brdab pa la sogs pa byas nas bcing ngo // dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying pos phyag rgya thams cod bcing ngo // de yang ma chags pa dang slob
42b6(rgyud): ma ma yin pa dang / snod ma yin pa dang / dad pa med pa la mi sbyin no// yun du sbyangs ni de dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la de kho na bskul ba'i snying pa ni 'di'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de la dam tshig chen po de kho na bskul ba'i
42b7(rgyud): snying po ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ rdo rje khro bo phyag rgya thams cad rang gis bcing ngam gzhan 'ching du gzhug na ni/ hUM zhes thang cig tsam gyis so// de nas rdo rje bcing ba la sogs pa'i bcing ba 'a/ 
42b8(rgyud): badz+ra ban d+ha/ zhes brjod la rdo rje bcing ba snying khar chings shig/ de nas snying po 'dis sor thams cad brdab par bya'o// oM badz+ra ban d+ha tra rag 'dis ni phyag rgya thams cad dgug cing dbang du bya'o// de nas
43a1(rgyud): dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phag rgyu ba cing ngo / khadz+ra A pre sh+yA zhes brjod la snying po 'di rdo rje dbab pa skyes par byed do// sa thams cad dbab pa'i snying po 'di ni gdon mi za'o// de nas rdo rje
43a2(rgyud): gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ badz+ra muSh+Ti zhes brjod la macing ngo // de nas phyag rgya thams cad bcing ngo // de ste de ltar ma byas na yang snga ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams
43a3(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya lan gcig bzlas na grub pa thams cad la gtse
43a4(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcing po 'byung ste thal mo sbyar la sor mo phan tshun sgrol ba ni thal mo'o// de nyid sor me'i bar rnam shin du bsdams pa ni rdo rje bcing ba'o// de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang tu
43a5(rgyud): bcug ste/ mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du rab tu btsugs la bcum pa 'di ni dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bo gnyis pa shi bus pa'i nang du bcug la de bzhin du mthu
43a6(rgyud): chung dang srin lag gi bar btsugs te/ 'dzub mo shin du bkug pa ni rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gnyis pa ni phyag rgya gzhan du 'gyur te/ dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid lan gcig
43a7(rgyud): brjod la snying kha 'am nam mkha' la so sor bcing ngo // ngag gi phyag rgya ya pa~M badz+rA dzA hA zhes brjod la phyag bcing ngo // lta ba'i phyag rgya ni snying po'i don gyis bcing ngo // so phyag rgya dang mchu'i phyas
43a8(rgyud): rgyu dang mig bskul ba'i phyag rgya dang / snying dang lus g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni sa ma ye s+t+waM zhes brjod nas bcing ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje hU~M zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste rdo rje
43b1(rgyud): bo'i 'dzub mo ni rdo rje khu tshur du byas la 'dzub mo brkyang na/ rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub mo zhes bya ba yin no// rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub mo gnyis// lag ngar stsol te bcings nas kyang // mthe'u chung lcags kyu sbrel byas la/ 
43b2(rgyud): hUM zhes pas ni bsdigs par bya// de nyid las g.yos pa kyo ba btang du byas pa ni/ rdo rje khro bo'i kyo ba btang ngo // de la 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// lag mthil dag tu rdo rje bcings// mthe bo ba shibs pa
43b3(rgyud): bkab pa ni// khu tshur byas pa dom tshig go// phyag rgya rdo rje khro bo ste// ti rine ti ri zhes bya'o// hU~M ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni thams cad gsod pa'i khro bo'o// rdo rje'i sa gzhi bcing ba ni
43b4(rgyud): bcing ba sa la brkyang ste/ bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje'i saM gzhir 'gyur te/ de la sus kyang kla gros mi rnyed do// de la 'di ni rdo rje 'dod po khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcing ba bcings la 'dzub mo rdo rjer byas pa ni
43b5(rgyud): thams cad la dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dam tshig rdo rje bcings la 'dzub mo gnyis rtse mo mnyam par bshibs pas snying khor gtugs shig/ gal te de las 'da' bar byas na snying gas te/ 
43b6(rgyud): 'chi'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings la// 'dzub mo kyo ba btang du bcing // dkrol zhing bkri bar byas pa ni// lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog yin no// rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas la// 'dzub mo bkug
43b7(rgyud): pa shin du btsi ro// mthu bo gnyis ka ba shibs pa yis// dbus su btsir ba bar snang gi/ rdo rje khu tshu ro gnyis bcas la// mthe'i chung gnyis ka sbrel nas su// 'dzub mo yi ni rgyab sbyar te// bzlog pa nam
43b8(rgyud): mkha' rgyu ba rnams kyi'o// rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas nas// khu tshur gyis ni sa mnan pa// 'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pa 'dra' bar dka'// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs te// g.yon pa'i
44a1(rgyud): @#// 'dzub mo 'dzub mo btsir// mthe'u chung sor mo mnyam brdang pa// 'di ni 'og ma rnams 'gug pa'o// 'dzub mo gnyis ka brtan po ru// rdo rje bcings pas sbrel bar bya// gung mo mthe bo rdo rjer bya/ 
44a2(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad 'jom pa'o// rdo rje dkri ba dang / rdo rje btsir ba dang / rdo rje phreng ba dang / rdo rje sa dang / rdo rje sa'i 'og dang / rdo rje he ru ka'o// de la rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa na// srad
44a3(rgyud): pu 'am yang na ri mo la// 'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba na// sgrub pos yid kyis bteg nas so// de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di'i snying po ni 'di'o// hU~M badz+ra bai ga hU~M/ 'dis ni dam tshig nyams par mi 'gyur ro// 
44a4(rgyud): du dam tshig nyams pas grub pa med par 'gyur ro// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cat+pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o// dpung po gnyis rdo rjer bcings te rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas la pus mo
44a5(rgyud): btsugs te mgo bo sa la gtugs nas phyag bya'o// phyag na rdo rje la ni de nyid kyis ngang pa'i bstabs kyis gnas par byas la 'jam zhing skyod pa dang / smin ma 'gyed pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag 'tshal lo// 
44a6(rgyud): gzhan rnams la ni pus mo btsugs paso so// de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin te/ lagr-I pa gnyis ni rgyub sbyor nas// mthe'u chung mthe bo sbrel bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya ni
44a7(rgyud): 'di'o// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ pra tAts+tsha badz+ra/ snying po 'dis me tog d+har ro// rdo rje kyo bya btang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i 'dzub mo gnyis kyo ba btang ba'i tshul du b+h+yo'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tha
44a8(rgyud): cad la sogs po dang / sems can thams cad dgug pa'i dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya ste/ dam tshig lcags kyu yin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i
44b1(rgyud): gnyis bcangs nas// g.yas pas bsdus par bya ba ni// rdo rje khro bo'i 'ju myo gson/ sang+yas rgyas byung rgya ba mchog bsam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam+b+ha tshig gi phyug rgyu ni 'di'o// ma
44b2(rgyud): po gnyis ka dkyil mo dkrung // 'dzub mo gnyis ka dgug par bya// rdo rje thal mo 'od dkyil 'khor// gung mo gnyis ka kha 'byed pa// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs
44b3(rgyud): pa thams cad 'gug pa dang gzhug pa dang dbang du bya ba las 'do' bar mi 'gyur zhing 'di mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas badz+ra bod kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya
44b4(rgyud): sems ni rnam dag shes bya ba// brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o// mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin// nges par rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas ngo bo'i bdag nyid de// sems nyid sangs rgyas nyid yin
44b5(rgyud): no// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas// nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas de sgom mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi sems so sor brtags pa
44b6(rgyud): lnga sogs pa sangs rgyas su yongs su sbyang ba byas nas/ ji ltar tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas pa thob par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ni lis
44b7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas phyag ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin no// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid bsgyur// rdo rje 'gying ba rab byed cing // 'gying dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor// 'di
44b8(rgyud): yis kun 'gro skad cig gis// 'od dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur// 'dod pa kun dbang thams cad po// phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa bcings nas kyang // gung
45a1(rgyud): @#// mo nang bcug snying khar bzhag// mthe bo mthe'u chung kha pe sA ma// rdo rje chen por de ltar bcing // sems dpa' kun gyi ting 'dzin gyis// 'di ni snying khar bcings pa yis// phyag rgya kun gyi dngos
45a2(rgyud): grub pa ta dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// de la ye shes kyi pa ga N+ya ni 'di'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis// phyag na rdo rje bdag gi lus// bsgoms na myur du
45a3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la// 'gying bcas rdo rje gsor byas nas// 'gying zhing gyen du sdod tshul gyis// snying khar bzung nas 'grub par 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i phyag
45a4(rgyud): rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje khyu tshur grwats+tshas bcings la// g.yas pa gzhu 'dren sbyor ba dang // mdo' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis su// kun la bsnun nas chags par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang
45a5(rgyud): bskur ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i pag rgya gtsug tor du bzhag de las pha ba nas gung mo rdo rje byas te dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag go// de las bskor te
45a6(rgyud): gung mo nor bur byas la g.yas su bzhag go// lhag par gung mo'i rdo rje'i padad+ma mo bzhag go// de nas bskor te gung mo dang mthe'u chung myos par byas nas g.yon du bzhag go// de nas 'dzub mo gnyis
45a7(rgyud): mdung pa byas te/ phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du lhag par mdud pa byas la sor mo thams cad mthe'u chung nas mthar g+his+thA badz+rI po'i rgyal gyis dgrol ba ni snod pan gyi tshul bzhin du dgrol lo// 
45a8(rgyud): phyagan rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//  nas bcom ldan 'das thog mi dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpa' sgrub pa'i 'dod pas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi mo nyi/ de nas nyin gcig bdag nyid byin gyis brlangs rnam
45b1(rgyud): dz+ha lta bu'i dus su ts+tsha nus par ci 'dod pas bde bar byas la phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis klu'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje'i tshig tu rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas te snying po 'di ci 'dod par bzlas so// hU~M mahA
45b2(rgyud): da badz+ra satwe dz+nyAts+tsha ba~M hi su ra ta s+t+wa~M/ de ltar zla gcig bzlos te sgrub bo// zla ba lon pa'i 'jug tu chos bcwo lnga la ngal na// phyag rgya dkrol la rdo rje'i thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyis phyag bya'o/ 
45b3(rgyud): zad mnan ne sa ji ltar ngal bar mi 'gyur bar byas te/ de ltar mtshan rengs par bzlas na/ ning pAr bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i kha dog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa'i 'od can byon to sgrub pa po la
45b4(rgyud): mkhyud nas de'i lus la kun du zhug gi/ de nas sgrub pa po yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa dang / lha'i rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan
45b5(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi rigs dang gnyen dang grogs po dang gnyen pa shes la sogs pa dang sems can thams cad kyi gzugs
45b6(rgyud): po mthong na yang 'chi ba'i mi 'gyur ro// blta bar byed do// mchod par byed do// bsten par byed do// don thams cad do// don yang rang gi khyim de nyid na gnas bzhin du lha'i cho 'phrul byed do// de bzhin gshegs
45b7(rgyud): yung gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang tshe 'phrul thams cad byed do// rdo rje hU~M zhes pa la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis kyang 'dul bar byed do// sems can de dag gis kyang mthing ngo // ma dul ba rnams kyang btul lo// ji ltar
45b8(rgyud): 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de'i 'ong ba dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas na phyir
46a1(rgyud): 'ong ba'i bar du'o// don thams cad la longs spyod pa dang 'dod pa thams cad la dbang ba dang / 'drod pa thams cad spyod pa'i nam mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje/ 
46a2(rgyud): sems dpas gsungs so// de nas rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su bcings pas mda' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis me tog gi gzhu 'dren pa ni thams cad dga' bar byed
46a3(rgyud): pa sbyin no// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying khang rdo rje hU~M zhes pa ste/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phen pas rdo rje 'phangs pas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o// de nas 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i khu na
46a4(rgyud): gnyis bcings te// de ltar kyo bo mthe'u chung 'dzub// mi dudra nas mthe bo bshibs pa yis// bsnams te snying khar bzhag par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa nges par dgug pa dang
46a5(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'dren par byed pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gyis mkhyud pa ni rdo rje dga' ba'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcing ba bsdams byas nus// g.yon bI/ 
46a6(rgyud): 'dzub mtheb mo mtshan du// mthe bo'i rtags ni bcug nas su// de spyod rab tu bsgom par bya// 'dis ni bud med thams cad dga' bar byed do/ rdo rje khri tshur gnyis kyis rgyal// mtshon 'dzin pa yi tshul
46a7(rgyud): du rgyu rgyul mtshan no/ ma tshig gi phywag+sa d+hA b+hUng s+thi rdo rje bcing ba bsnyams byas nas/ dzub mo gnyis ni dgug paR+tha / na lagro shis pa m+bu bau rlung ba skyed/  m+WAr ma the bo gaN+DIs / 
46a8(rgyud): rnams pa tsun khyi marje tsha ni ga gags pathams cad kyang byams pa brtan par mdzad na gzhan myi gyi smos/ rdo rdza tshur gnyis kyis bsrem sa par pyod pa ni rdo rje sems pa'i/ ngos
46b1(rgyud): gi phyug+sa rgyu 'byung ste/ rdo rje ba cing bya kun b+h+yas nas// rtsi ba logs gnyis su bskor nas su// 'joms pas spyod pas 'dud pa pyod// khro bo thams cad mgu bar byed// rdo rje bsnams ma mchog bcas dpa/ rdo rje
46b2(rgyud): gar gyi rab sbyor bas// mdor na me tig la sogs pa'i// gsang ba'i mchod pa myur du 'grub// rtog pa gzhon gyis gsang po'i mchod pa dang yang sbyar ro// de nas rdo rje gar 'byung ste/ rdo rje khu tshur gnyi ba
46b3(rgyud): nas// 'jim pas mtha' nas brtsams te dgrol// klo ga bzhin sgyur te bskor zhing dgol// 'gram pa dang ni gtsug tor bzhag/ rdo rje gar zhes bya ba ste// bdag che'i mchod pa thams cad do// mchod pa 'in
46b4(rgyud): gsol bas na// dngos med kyis kyang myur du 'grub// de nas rdo rje gzugs la sngogs me'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje bcings pa brkyang la mthil du blta'o// rdo rje bcings pas g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo ni pi wang
46b5(rgyud): gi shing ngo // g.yas pa dgug pas ni len to// brkyang ba'i lag mthil gyis rang gi snying khar byug go// me tog g+hi thal mo'i tshul gyis rdo rje'i ro btang bar bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te/ g.yon pa'i
46b6(rgyud): ma'u chung ni g.yas pa'i kyi ba btang gis bzung po/ kyo b+ha bkang nas goyas pa'i sems dpa'i' dam tshig rnams cad dang sems can thams pad byung mug go// rdo rje sbyin pa la mthe blo mdud ma smin
46b7(rgyud): d+hA'i phyag rgya'o//  rje bu chur gnyis kyi 'dzub mi sbre la ba ni thams cad bcing ngo // rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyun thams kya 'brubs par byed do// de nas go tshe'i phyag rgya 'byung ste// khru rgyur ba cings pa blan
46b8(rgyud): kyis snong khar ram 'dud po'i tshul gyis bya'o// smos nas yang lhag par yang de bzhin no// spos nas snying khor yang de bzhin no// yang bar du yang 'dud do// yang spros nas snying kha dang lhag par yang de bzhin no// 
47a1(rgyud): mgo la yang de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i gnas su'o// phreng ba bcing ba'i mdud pa'i tshul gyis mthe'u chung la sogs pa'i sor mo thams cad dgrol ba ni cod pan gyi tshul du bya'o// de nas
47a2(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ pad mo zums pa'i thal mo sbyar// pad mo chen por grags pa ste// mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis 'gyed pa// sdigs pa rnams ni sel ba'o// de nyid
47a3(rgyud): 'dzub mo kyo bo btang du byas pa ni thams cad 'gugs pa'o// de nas pad mo'i khu tshur 'byung ste/ rdo rje bcings pa'i 'dzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo snyams pa'i steng du gung mo gnyis ka bzhag go// 
47a4(rgyud): gnyis su byas nas g.yon pa la g.yas pas pad mo 'byed par bya'o// de nas pad mo ngag gi phyag rgya ni/ hriHye shes kyi phyag rgya ni pad mo 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa dri ma sbyong bar gsu
47a5(rgyud): pa nyid dohaMde nas nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis kas dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcing ngo // de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje bcing ba kun byas nas// 'dzub mo
47a6(rgyud): snyams nas mthe'o dang sbyar// de dag ngos su spyad pa ste// dbang bskur gnas su dbang sbyin no// de nyid kha yar bstan la snying khar bzhag pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur zhes bshad de/ don thams cad 'phrog po
47a7(rgyud): de nyid las mthe bo rdo rjes 'dzub mo bsnams pa mnan te/ rgyab tu bskum pa ni rdo rje nor bu'o// trAM chos kyi phyag rgya'o// ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni thams cad nam mkhar sgom pa'o// de nas rdo rje khu
47a8(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni de ltar sngar bshad pa nyid do// bAM ngag gi phyag rgya'o// byams pa'i 'ching ba na 'tshong ba'i nang na mchog s+ho/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// mthun du ni rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// 
47b1(rgyud): su ni rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya bstan pa nyid de// rgyab tu ni rdo rje bcing ba snying khar bkan nas mthe bo sbyar te 'dzub mo gnyis ka dgug par bya'o// rdo rje'i pad mo mchog gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings pa'i
47b2(rgyud): mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis kar snying khar brkang bzhag pa ni rdo rje ste/ rdo rje thams cad do// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste/ sgrub pa thams cad brtsol ba phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dwa bri dro/ 
47b3(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya bcings pa ni/ rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa yI// rtse mo bkug pa 'di ni ral gri'o// gnyis pa ni glegs bam mo// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni/ g.yon pa'i glegs bam 'tshang
47b4(rgyud): ba'i mthe'u chung ni g.yos pa'i ral gri 'dzin pas bzung ngo // A ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o// chos thams cad la yi ge med ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje
47b5(rgyud): tshun gnyis bcings te// mthe'u chung 'dzub mo rdo rje bcing // rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa po// 'di mthong bas dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin
47b6(rgyud): du dbus su khar bzhag ste bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du grub par 'gyur ro// hU~M chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje no// 
47b7(rgyud): phyag rgya las mthe'u chung dang srin lhag sgyums pa'i rgyul mtshan ba dran bsgreng ba'i tshul du bya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya na tAM// 'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ 
47b8(rgyud): go cha'i phyag rgya'o// ngag gi phyag rgya ni/ oM de nas rtog pa thams cad spyi'i phyag rgya zhes 'byung ste/ de la lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'greng yang rung 'dug kyang rung rkang pa snyams te brgya
48a1(rgyud): ba lag pa slang ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya yin no// mchog sgrub la rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro// ngas la gson pas rdo rjeg khu chur bcangs/ gasnum bkug pas drangs pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu
48a2(rgyud): phyag rgya ste thams cad 'dren pa yin no// langs la pus mo bkyed de bkug nas leg pa gnyis bsdams te gyen du brkyang ba ni thams cad gtan 'pho ba'i ral gri'o// dpung pa gnyis kyis rang gi snying
48a3(rgyud): khar mkhyud pa ni go cha ste/ mi phyed pa'o// de nas ngag gri phyag rgya bats+tshing ba ni/ a ho haM hUM/ dbab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang kho srung ba dang / gtan 'pho ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lta ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba ni/ myur
48a4(rgyud): sbyar rdo rje'i lta ba ste// da gde do btsums pa 'dren pa yin// khro bo'i lta ba khro gnyer te// brtan par lta ba mi g.yo ba'o// de nas 'di dag gi lngas 'byung ba ni/ rdo rje'i lta bas skye 'gro thams cad mgu bar byed do/ 
48a5(rgyud): dgrad pa'i lta bas ni thams cad dgug pa dang / rims dang / gdon dang / dug dang byud ma la sogs pa dang nad thams cad sel to// khro bo'i bsta bas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o// brtan par bas ni tham/ 
48a6(rgyud): cad bsrung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta/ dI pa ta dr-iSh+Ti a~M ku sha dzaHoM kro d+ha dr-iSh+Ti phaT/ dr-iD+ga dr-iSh+Ti tAM pa'i phyag rgya srung ste/  'ang btsun gtan 'pho'o// myur bas ni dbang du byed do// snying po bzlas
48a7(rgyud): shIng khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin byas te phyag rgyas las byed de// g.yas nis bcu pa ni 'gug pa'o// g.yon nas bcu pa ni dbang byed pa'o// ma mchu sros mnan pas ni gtan 'pho'o// mchu gnyis ka bsta
48a8(rgyud): pa ni bsrung ba'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran pa dang / rdo rje khro bo rjes su dran pa dang rdo rje rjes su dran pa ni tham nA sgrub ste/ mchu'i phyag rgya'o// mig g.yas pa skyod pas dbang
48b1(rgyud): du byed do// mig g.yon pa skyod pas rjes su chags so// gnyis ka btsums byas gtan 'phro'o// gnyis ka dgad pas ni bsrung ngo // thams cad kyi snying po bzlas te gyen du bltas nA nam mkha' la
48b2(rgyud): 'gro ba 'grub po/ b+hur du boltas nA sa'i dbying por 'gyur ro// g.yas nas bskor bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do// g.yon nus bskor bas ni phyag na rdo rje la mchod do// thams
48b3(rgyud): cad snying po stong bzlas nas sgrub po// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/ de la 'jig rten gyi phyag rgya rnams ni 'jig rten pa'i khu tshur lus 'byung ste/ rdo rje'i khu tshurar+ya ni rdo rje'i ba
48b4(rgyud): ba las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du btsug pas mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi byar du btsir la bsdam par bya ste/ de nyid l-i phyag rgya'i snying po 'bum 'bum bzlas te sgrub po/ oM badz+ra mu drA hUM/ rdo rje'i khu tshur
