227b1(rgyud): gshegs la phyag 'tshal te// de nas cho ga 'di dag gis// mkhas pas sa gzhi sbyang bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
227b2(rgyud): ces gsol to// sangs rgyas mtshan ma ma mnga' ste// chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs// mtshan med 'dus ma byas pa yi// mtshungs pa med pa'i chos ston na// dpa' bo chen po ci slad du// 
227b3(rgyud): mtshan mar bcas pa'i cho ga 'di// gsang sngags spyad la bstan par mdzad// 'di ni chos nyid tshul ma lags// de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis// de nas
227b4(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di nyon gsungaso// chos ni rtog dang bral ba ste// kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yin// de la sems dang sems byung gi/ rtog pa rab tu spong bar 'gyur// nga yis
227b5(rgyud): chos mngon sangs rgyas pa// de na khams las byung ba ste// log par rtog pa'i spyod yul pa// byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so// yul dus mtshan ma la sogs pa// man gyis bslabs pa rnams
227b6(rgyud): 'dod de/ de dag gzud par bya ba'i phyir// cho ga 'di yang brjod pa yin// yul med dus kyang med pa ste// bya ba med cing byed pa yang // chos rnams kun la yang med do// chos rnams nyi tshe 'ba'
227b7(rgyud): shig go/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang / sems can dag gi blo zhan cing // bya ba tsam gyis rmongs pa dag/ dngos po'i don la chags pa rnams// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di
227b8(rgyud): lholha'i tshul ni mi shes pas// yul dang dus dang bya ba las// dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma yi// rmongs pa 'bras bu 'dod byed de// sems dpa' chen po de dag phyir// cho ga 'di ni brjod pa yin// 
228a1(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la/ ji skad bstan pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar sa gzhi rab tu 'thas par bcags te/ bra'i lci ba sA la ma lhung ba dang / ba'i gcin du bsres pas byug go// 
228a2(rgyud): da nas sngags 'das gsang gtor bas te bsngags so// na maHsa man ta bad d+ha nAn// sa pra ta hA t+ya sa me ga gA na sa maM tA nA ga ta pu kaM tI bi bud d+he dwe ra ma d+hA da bi sho d+hA ni swA hA// de yi log tu
228a3(rgyud): sngags pa na// langs nas de yi dbus su nga // pad ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// thor btsugs dang ni dbu brgyan 'chang // 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pas// kun nas yodzes su bskor bar
228a4(rgyud): bsam/ de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi// blo dang ldan pas phyogs su bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ nyi ma 'tshar ka lta bur bsam// lho ru rgyal ba dpa' bo ni// me tog
228a5(rgyud): kun rgyas zhes bya ba// gser gyi kha dog 'bar bar bcas// nyes pa bcom pa ting 'dzin gnas// byang phyogs ni mi 'khrugs pa// nad dang bral ba'i ting 'dzin gnas// nub phyogs 'od dpag
228a6(rgyud): med pa ste// rgyal ba lnga po 'di rnams ni// bsams te de nas bsngags pa yis// rgyal ba'i gnas dbus 'dag nas su// mi g.yo bdag nyid chen po 'am// yang na 'jig rten gsum rgyal
228a7(rgyud): gyi/ gsang sngags don kun bsgrub pa yas// sa ni yongs su gzung bar bya// dbus su dkyil 'khor bzang po dag/ can dan dag gis bya ba ni// dang por gcig ni nga yi yin// gnyis pa/ 
228a8(rgyud): skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// gsum pa de dang mnyam bya ba// the tsom med par yum gyi yin// bzhi pa lag na pad ma ste// lnga pa lag na rdo rje'i phyir// drug pa mi g.yo mgon gyi ste// ma zad 'og
228b1(rgyud): tu legs par bya// de bzhin gshegs rnams rjes dran nas// me tog spos la sogs phul te// mnyam par gzhag nas gus pa ru// tshig tu 'di skad smra bar bya// mgon po thugs rje'i bdag
228b2(rgyud): nyid da can/ thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// sras bcas sang gi gdugs 'das na// sa gzhi yongs su gzung ba mdzod// da skad kyi ni tshig smras nas// gsang sngagase 'di ni brjod pa
228b3(rgyud): bya/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn/ sarba ta thA ga tA d+hiSh+Tha nA d+hiSh+Tha te/ a tsa li bri ma la smA ra Ni pra kr-i ta pa ri shud d+he swA hA/ de nas sngags pa langs nas su// snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// 
228b4(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs su gnas su// nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas// byang chub sems ni sems byed cing // de nyid du ni nyel bar ba// de nas sngags pas rmi lam lha// byang chub sems dpa'
228b5(rgyud): grags chen nam// yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i los rnams la/ bdag nyid kun rtsol 'bad pa 'am// bdag nyid la
228b6(rgyud): ni 'di skad du// sems can chen po bu khyod legs// dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces// spro ba bskyed pa mthong ba'ang rung // de nas de'i phyi de nyin// slob ma dad cing rigs btsun pa// 
228b7(rgyud): de bzhin dkon gsum la dang // zab mo yi ni blo dang ldan// spro ba che zhing tshul khrims ldan// bzod dang ldan zhing ser+ra sna med// dpa' la yid dmau brtan pa ni// bcu 'am brgyad dam bden na
228b8(rgyud): lnga gcig gnyis bzhi lus lhag kyang rung // dpyad mi dgos par gzung bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci
229a1(rgyud): lags/ ci'i slad du dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste// dkyil ni snying po zhes
229a2(rgyud): bya'o// 'khor ni rdzogs pa ste/ de'i gang na snying por gyur pa gzhan med pas na dkyil 'khor zhes pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di ni/ sems can gyi khams ma
229a3(rgyud): nges pa yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir// snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba ste/ der ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bar
229a4(rgyud): chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa byin gyis brlabs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na/ rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gcig gi/ 
229a5(rgyud): phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya ba ma yin/ gnyis kyi phyir ma yin/ gsum gyi phyir ma yin/ 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i dbang du gyur pa dag/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa
229a6(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa raM 'tshang rgya ste/ de dge gis sems can gyi khams rnam pa du ma la/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos
229a7(rgyud): 'chang par rig par bya'o// gsong ba pa'i bdag po thag pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa rnams ni/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul mthong ngam thos na/ sems can dag la dga' ba 'am
229a8(rgyud): dang ba cung zad kyang yang dag par mi skye'i/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag gis sngon theg pa chen po gsung sngags spyad pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa la goms par byas pa/ 
229b1(rgyud): de dag ni rdo rje sems dpa' yin te/ de rnams nyid kyi phyir grangs kyi tshad 'di byas so// 'on kyang slob dpon snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sems kyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yid dam
229b2(rgyud): bca' ba kho nar ba ste/ des byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyur 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su gzung bar bya'o// de nas de dag bso la gsum la skabs su
229b3(rgyud): btang bar bya'o// sdig pa mi bye ba'i las rnams kyang bskyob par bya'o// de nas de dag la spos dang / me tog la sogs pa sbyin no// de dag dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa yang
229b4(rgyud): 'dzan du gzhug go/ 'dzin du bcug nas sngags pa yis// de nas so shing dag kyang sbrani// rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag pa dag/ shar dang byad dA kha bltas te// u dA ma bA ra a shwad ta// shin tu/ 
229b5(rgyud): bzang po bsrung byas shing // me tig dri la sngogs bskus pa'i// so shing dag ni 'char gzhug go/ sems can snod rung sdod mi rung // bor ba nyid la brtag par bya// de nas lag pa g.yon pa la// 
229b6(rgyud): skud pa ma dad pa gsum ldan pa// bdag nyid mnyam par gzhag pa yas// legs pa ru ni bcing bar bya// de ltar yongasu gzung ldan pa'i// slob ma nyes pa mad rnams la// bsam pa brtan par bA bI
229b7(rgyud): phyir/ 'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnam
229b8(rgyud): kun/ yongs su gzung sngo skra bzhin la// de phyir khyad rnams theg chan la// sang ni rab tu skyes par 'gyur// gal te rmi lam dag tu ni// gtsug lag khang dang kun dga' bzang // khang pa bzang po sna tshogs
230a1(rgyud): dang / de bzhin du ni yang thog dang // ral gri yid bzhin nor bu dang // gdugs dang me tog sna tshogs dang // bud med bzang mo gos dkar can// sdug pa'i gnyen dang ba dag dang // glegs bam
230a2(rgyud): de bzhin bram ze dang // sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyani thos dang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// gal te 'bras bu theb pa dang // mtsho dang rgya mtsho las brgal
230a3(rgyud): mthong de bzhin du ni nam mkha' las// bkrong gis yid du 'ong ba'i tshig/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba grags// de la sogs pa'i rmi lam na// bzang po zhes ni bya bar brtag/ mkhas pas de lnga bzlog pa
230a4(rgyud): yi/ rmi lam ngan pa shes par bya// brtul zhugs bzang po khyod rnams kyis// nang par thams cad nga la zlos// slob ma de dag rnams la ni// de skad bsgo nas chos kyang bshad// theg pa chen po cher
230a5(rgyud): 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyad rnams drir ni dong bas na// rang 'byung bskal pa chen po pa// 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// 
230a6(rgyud): yod dang med las rnam par 'das// nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med// zab mo rtog gi thams cad kyis// rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa// spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// spros pa rnams kyis rnam par
230a7(rgyud): spros/ las dang bya ba la sogs bral// bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi// theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni// tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// rdo rje 'dzin spros pa med
230a8(rgyud): par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dus gsum du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye chags kyi sdom pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
230b1(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'dzin spros pa med par gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lus
230b2(rgyud): dang ngag dang yid gcig tu 'jug cing // rdo ste snyoms cad la rtsom pa med cing / bya ba med pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ de yang g+hih+Na n+na nA sangs rgyas dang bang chub sems dpa' rnams
230b3(rgyud): lnga bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis bdag gi lus yongs su btang ba des ni/ dngos po gsum yang btang ba yin te/ dngos po gsum yongs su btang
230b4(rgyud): ba de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyi sdom pas bsdam par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
230b5(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid gsum yongs su ma btang bar bslab pa 'dzin par mi byed do// de nas pa de nyin bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag byas te/ bdag
230b6(rgyud): nyid rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba la 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas mngon par bsngags te/ sgo dang por bzhag la mkhas pas skya bo kun la
230b7(rgyud): des bsang gtor bya'o// de nas sems sbyang ba'i phyir spros chu gtsang ma gyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gastsol to// dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon dag/ gseng
230b8(rgyud): sngags sgrub la 'byed pa na// gang gi dus su dkyil 'khor dag/ sems dpa' chen po byin rlob pa'i// dus dang tshod ni kun mkhyen pa// smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol nas
231a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor don kun gnyar ba la// rtag tu mtshan mo bri bar bya// / bam po gnyis pa// 
231a2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de la slob dpon gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i srad pu thogs te/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la/ shur
231a3(rgyud): du srad pu bri ba ni// lte ba'i thad kur bzung nas ni// bar snang la ni bzung bar bya// de nas lho phyogs seng nas su// byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya// de nas srad pu gnyis pa ni// rang gis blangs nas de
231a4(rgyud): nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran zhing // shar phyogs bltas te bri bor bya de nas lho phyogs song nas ni// byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya// blo ldan de nas slar log nas// bden bral phyogs su
231a5(rgyud): gnas nas ni// byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya// de nas g.yas su bsgyur bar bya// bsgyur te de ru 'dug nas su// lho phyogs su ni bri bar bya// de nas gnas da btang nas ni// me yi phyogs su gnas
231a6(rgyud): nas su/ sngags pa gsang sngags che gar gnas// shar du srad pu bri bar bya// de nas de bzhin dbang ldan phyogs// song nas nub tu kha bltas te// rlung gi phyogs kyi bar du ni// byang phyogs su ni bri
231a7(rgyud): par bya/ sngags pa yis ni de lta bur// kun nas gru bzhi lham par bya// de nas dbus su zhugs nas su// de la cha ni gsum du brtag/ sa rnams thams cad kun du yang // cha gsum dag tu brtag
231a8(rgyud): nas ni/ ma rnams kyang ni re re la// chu gsum du ni rab tu brtag/ cho ga cag gis ni biski ri ba yi// 'khor sar byas te lhag ma yi// cha gnyis po ni lha nyid kyi// gnas su nges par bya ba min/ 
231b1(rgyud): dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi ru// so so'i phyogs char sgo khyud ni// sdom brtson can gyis nan tan du// lha rnams gtso ba'i gnas su bya// de ltar rim par legs phye ba// 'di dag thams cad byas nas
231b2(rgyud): niHdbus su pad ma dkar po mchog/ de ni snying po zhes su bsgrags// dkyil 'khor snying rje 'byung ba kun// des ni snying po can du byas// de yi tshad kyang sor bcu drug/ yan chad du ni bshad pa yin// 'dab
231b3(rgyud): ma brgyad pa lags par rdzogs// za bar ldan la shan du bzang // 'dab ma'i bar ni thams cad du// kun nas rdo rje bra bar bya// de ye snying po'i dbus su ni// rgyal mchog gtso bo gser gyi mdog/ 'bar bcas
231b4(rgyud): thor tshugs dbu rgyan can// 'od zer dag gis kun nas bskor// mgon po nad dang bral ba ni// ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri// de yi shar du blo ldan gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// gru gsum
231b5(rgyud): thams cad thal kar nyid// pad ma'i steng nas khor yug tu// 'od zer dkar pos yongs bskor ba// rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// de yi byad du mkhas rnams kyis// skyob pa dag ni kun gyi yum// gser
231b6(rgyud): gyi mdog can 'bar dang bcas// na bza' dag ni dkar po bas// kun du rnam par sdang mdzad pa// ting nga 'dzin du gnas par ba// mgon po da na bang phogs su// sman ras gzigs dbang dpa' bo na// 
231b7(rgyud): pad ma dkar po'i stan la 'dug/ dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// dbu la 'di dpag med zhugs pa// gzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum par bri// de yi g.yas suM lha mo ni// sgrol ma grags pa chen mo de// dge
231b8(rgyud): zhing 'jigs pa sel ba ste// sngo sangs mo la sna tshogs/ gzugs// bud med dar la bab pa'i tshad// thal sbyar me tog ud dpal thogs// 'od zer dag gis kun bskor cing // gos ni dkar ba
232a1(rgyud): / gyon par bri// g.yon du lha mo khro gnyer can// sngags do'i phreng ba lag na 'phyang // mig gsum pa la thor tshugs can// kha dog mdog ni dkar mo la// 'od zer dkar po ser po dang
232a2(rgyud): dkar po rnams kyis bskor bar bri// khro gnyer can dang nye bar ni// mthu chen lag na padau ma thogs// brtse ba chen po gos dkar gyon// 'od zer dag gis bskor ba yi// dpa' bo yang dag bri bar
232a3(rgyud): bya// de yi pad ma kha ma bye// de yi drung du bla can gyis// rig sngags lha mi grags ldan ma// gser gyi kha dog lta bu can// rgyun rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// lag pa g.yon pas pri yang ku'o// 
232a4(rgyud): snyi ma yid 'ong 'dzin pa bI// sgrol ma yaM ni nye 'khor du// blo dang ldan pas gos dkar mo// thor tshugs can la gos dkar gyon// lag ni pad ma thogs par bri// de yi 'og tu sngags pa yis// rig
232a5(rgyud): sngags rgyal po stobs po che// kha dog nyi ma 'char ka bzhin// pad ma dkar pos rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad pa// spu dag seng ge'i ltar 'dug pa// sman ras gzigs dbang blo
232a6(rgyud): ldan gyi/ rta mgrin can zhes grags pa bri// sangs rgyas rnams kyi lho phyogs su// byang chub sems dpa' slob rnams kyi// phyag gi rgyu yid bzhin nor bu zhes// gragos pa bskal pa chen po can
232a7(rgyud): re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa// pad ma dkar la 'dug par bri// mgon po rnam snang mdzad chen bri// lho'i phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin// re ba thams cad skong byed pa// mdog ni pri yang ku lta bur// ljang
232a8(rgyud): ser 'am ni margad ltar// sngo sangs mgon po dbu rkyen can// sems dpa' chen po rgyan kun gyis// rnam par brgyan cing mtha' yas par// 'jug pa chen po rdo rjer bcas// 'od zer dag gis bskor
232b1(rgyud): bar bI/ da yi g.yas su lha mo mang // mA ma kI zhes bya bA de// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// lag na rdo rje thogs par bri// da yi 'og tu lha mo ni// rdo rje rtse mo'i stobs chen de// pho nya rnams kyis yongs
232b2(rgyud): bskor cing / gzhin ni bag tsam 'dzub par bri// g.yon rol du ni sngags pa yis// rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces pa// lag na rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rang gi pho nya rnams kyis bskor// pri yang ku ltar ljang ser mdog/ rdo rje'i
232b3(rgyud): mtshan mas legs mtshan bri// lag na rdo rje'i 'og logs su// khro zla gtso bo zhes bya ba// bgegs chen dgra ni zhi byed pa// khro bo 'jig rten gsum du grags// mig gsum mche ba bzhi pa ste// kha dog
232b4(rgyud): dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra// rab tu rgod pa'i sgra yang 'byin// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'khor ni mtha' yas khro bo yi// dbang phyug rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// lag pa stong phrag brgya dag ni// 
232b5(rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing gdengs// kho bo chen po 'di 'dra ba// pad mA'i steng du 'dug pa bri// de yi nub tu song nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po dag/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// kha dog sna tshogs
232b6(rgyud): stobs po che// 'od zer dag gis yongs bskor ba// sems can kun don byed pa bri// gsang sngags mgon po 'og logs su// bden bral gyi ni phyogs kyi char// mi g.yo zhes bya lag na ni// ral go zhags/ 
232b7(rgyud): pa lag na thogs// zur phud spyi bo g.yon du 'phyang // rab tu brgyan cing mig gcig g.yo// rang gi 'od kyi nang na gnas// khro dang bcas pa brag la 'dug/ gzhin ni khro gnyer rab tu gnyer// byis pa'i gzug
232b8(rgyud): can mkhrang bag bri// bris nas blo ldan rlung phyogs su// song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni// khro bo 'jig rten gsumo las rgyal// 'bar ba'i phreng can mi bzad pa// lag na rdo rje rtse bran rgya no// dka' lu
233a1(rgyud): nod pa ltar 'dug cing // zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas pa// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// de ltar nang du bri ba ni// rgyas dang bcas par bshad pa yin// de nas sngags pa phyir byung nas// nges par
233a2(rgyud): gnyis pa'i cha dag la// shar gyi phyogs kyi nang du ni// che ni gnyis su phye ba la// sgo khyud gyi ni nang rol du// sngags pos rgyal ba shAkya thub// gsIr gyi kha dog 'bar dang btsos// mtshan mchog
233a3(rgyud): sum bracu rtswa gnyis ldan// mgon po na bza' ngur smig mnams// kha ba bdag bstan pa'i don mdzad pa// pa ma dkar po'i sman la bzhugs// chos 'chad tshul du bzhugs pa bri// de yi g.yas
233a4(rgyud): su lha mo ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba ste// lha mo cung zad 'dzum po'i zhal// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang pa// mtshungs med sku ni rab tu dang // de ni shAkya thub pa'i yum// de yi g.yas su
233a5(rgyud): lha mo ni/ rig sngags mdzod smra zhes grags pa// pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa ste// dung zla kun da lta bu'i mdog/ lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs// ra ba kun rdzogs byed par bri// de nas sngags pas
233a6(rgyud): g.yon rol du// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// gtsug tor gzi can brtson 'grus tshe// gdugs dkar po dang rgyal za'i gtsug/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal nyid dang / gzi brjid phung po bskal
233a7(rgyud): chen dang / rnam par 'thor zhes rnam grags pa// lnga po yang dag bri bar bya// shAkya tog ni mthu chen gyi// gtsug tor lnga po 'di dag ni// gnas ni lnga rnams nyid du ni// rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya/ 
233a8(rgyud): de'i byang du song nas su// gnas gtsang rnams ni bri bar bya// dbang phyug kun du me tog dang // 'od kyi phreng ba nyid dang ni// yid mgyogs dang ni rnam grangs te// de dag thams cad legs par bri// mdzod
233b1(rgyud): spu yi ni g.yas logs su// gtsug tor chen po cher 'byung ba// de bzhin gyen du 'byung nyid dang // sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa yang ste// gtsug tor gsum po kho na ni// bsgrims te yang dag bri bar bya// gtsug
233b2(rgyud): tor lnga po stobs chen rnams// dkar po ser skya ser por bya// gsum po gzhan ni dkar po dang // ser po dang ni dmar por bya// kun kyang 'od zur mang po can// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yin// de
233b3(rgyud): dag smon lam stobs chen de// ra ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas sngags pas ma phyogs su// me ni drang srong cha rnams dang // bcas shing me'i nang du 'dug/ thal ba'i so ris gsum gyis mtshan// dpa'
233b4(rgyud): bo thams cad rab tu dmar// snying kha gsum mdo ras mtshon can// ma lce 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug/ bgrang phreng 'i guM d+he thogs pa bri// de nas lho'i phyogs kyi charo// gshin rdza gtso bo lag pa na// dbyug pa thogs
233b5(rgyud): shing ma he zhon// kha dog dbyar gyi chur sprin 'dra// ma mo rnams dang dus mtshan dang // 'chi bdag rnams kyis bskor bar bri// bden bral phyogs su bden bral ni// lug na ral gri 'dzin pa bri// de nas kyang ni blo
233b6(rgyud): ldan pa/ myur du byung gi phyogs sngo ste// lha'i rgyal po ri rab la// 'dug cing lha rnams kyis bskor ba// lag na rdo rje cod pan can// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa bri// de nas de yi shar du ni// chu lha lag na zhags
233b7(rgyud): thogs bri// de yi yang nau shar phyogs su// nyi ma shing rta'i steng 'dug bri// de yi g.yas dang g.yon du ni// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba bri// de yi g.yas su tshungs pa ni// gdong bzhi pa la thor tshugs can// 
233b8(rgyud): so zhes bya ba lhur lan pa// ngang pa pad ma'i sman 'dag bri// da yi na ba tu bri ba ni// sa yi lU dang dgangs can dang // khyab 'dzag snyam bad de bzhin rlung // bar byed de bzhin zla ba ste// na ba ki phyogs sa gan
234a1(rgyud): nas ni/ rab tu nan tan bas te bro// bris nas sngags pas de nas ni// yid la 'khrul pa med par ru// gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs su// khro tshon gzhan gyis mi thub ces/ 
234a2(rgyud): bya ba nyid dang lha tsa ni// gAn+ta n+ta gyas mi sgrub ma dang ni// sa bdag lag na bum pa thogs// gus par yang dag gnas par bri// kla chen dga' bo bsnyen dga' dag/ shA kya sang gi slob pa yi// sgo drung
234a3(rgyud): gnyis su mngon phyogs par// rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// gzhan yang shAkya thub pa ya// rgyud rnams kun las dkyil 'khor du// sngags dang phyag rgya gang bshad pa// de dag kyang ni mkhas pa
234a4(rgyud): bri/ sngags pa de nas phyir byung nas// cha gsum pa ni nges pa la// rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa ni// gur kum lta bu'i mdog can do// spyi bo zur phud lnga dang ldan// byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs can la/ 
234a5(rgyud): ud pa la sngon po rdo rje can// lag pa g.yen na thogs pa ste// pad ma dkar pa'i stan la 'dug/ rab tu 'dzum pa bzhin du gnas// 'od zer mtshan nyid bzang po yis// kun du 'khor bar sngags
234a6(rgyud): pas briHde yi byad du gzhon nu ni// dra ba'i 'od can lag pa na// rin chen dra ba thogs pa ste// sde tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// pad ma dmar po'i stan la 'dug/ rgyal ba'i sras la blta bar bri// 
234a7(rgyud): rdo rje dam pa stin+tau pa yi// g.yon tu pho nya mo lnga bri// skyu can+da dang ni nye sgra can+da// sna tshogs ma rAng nor can ma// de bzhini 'gugs ma zhes bya ba// 'di dag blo ldan po nyi ma'o// de dag gr-i ni 'og zad du// phyag
234a8(rgyud): brnyan ma ni lnga rnams dang // gzhon nu dra ba'i 'od can gyi// 'khor gnyis po yang bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas lho phyogs su// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel gtse
234b1(rgyud): yid bzhin nor bu thogs par bri// de yi cha sa nis bor nas ni// dpa' bo ngo mtshar can dang ni// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// ngan song thams cad spong ba dang // de bzhin skyong sems blo gros dang // 
234b2(rgyud): blo can snying rjes gdungs pa dang // byams pa mngon du 'byung ba dang // gdung ba thams cad zhi byed dang // de bzhi ni blo gros bsam yis te// mkhas pa brgyad po bri bar bya// byang gi phyogs su song nas ni// sa
234b3(rgyud): yi snying po 'bar dang bcas// bzod dang nges pa phun tshogs bri// de yi stan ni mkhas pa yis// 'byung khung kun dang ldan pa yis// rin chen kun gyis nyer brgyan pa// de yi steng ni rin chen bzhi'i// pad ma
234b4(rgyud): yang dag gnas pa ni// yid du 'ong ba bsam bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// de yi steng na 'dug par bri// de yi 'khor ni yon tan gtso// mtha' yas shing ni grangs med de// de yi nang nas bang
234b5(rgyud): chub sems// rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen lag/ sa 'dzin nyid dang lag dang ni// rin chen phyag rgya can dang ni// lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa nyid// grags chen 'di dag bri bar bya// de bzhin sngags pas
234b6(rgyud): nub phyogs su// dpa' bo nam mkha' snying po ni// gzi brjid chen po gos dkar gyon// lag na ral gri thogs pa ste// rgyal sras pad ma'i stan steng na// legs par 'dug pa bri bar bya// bdag nyid chen po
234b7(rgyud): de 'khor du// grags pa dag kyang bri bar bya// de 'khor dpa' bo chen po ni// nam mkha' dri med blo gros mkha'// blo gros rnam dag nyid dang ni// spyod pa yi ni blo gros dang // blo brtan pa zhes bya ba ste// de dag
234b8(rgyud): rab tu bsgrims bri zhing // rtag tu dpa' bo 'di rnams dang // lhan cig go rims bzhin du bsam// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bltas nas/ 
235a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la ring zhig tu mig mi 'dzums par bltas te/ ched du gleng pa 'di gleng zhing tshig smras pa/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u du ma bA ra'i
235a2(rgyud): me tog bzhini// brgya lam na ni ras 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo // gsang sngags smad pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// bskal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa bgyis par gyur
235a3(rgyud): pa gang / de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba// mthong bas byung bar 'gyur lags na// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyad pa'i// tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni// 
235a4(rgyud): 'phang bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag spyad pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin du mi g.yo ba// de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu bcad// de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
235a5(rgyud): de dag dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'thun pa'i tshig smras pa/ gsang sngags spyad pa'i dbang gyur pa// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// khyod kyi yid la gang bsams pa// mnyam
235a6(rgyud): med thams cad mkhyen la zhus// sngags rgyud rtogs par shes pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams dang // sngags smad 'bras bu la gnas pa// bdag cag thams cad dbang du gyur// de nas
235a7(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// tshon ches bgyi ba de gang lags// ci slad 'dir ni tshon ces bgyi// tshon ni ji ltar dgye bar bgyi// gang zhig thog mar btang bar bgyi// 
235a8(rgyud): rta babs rnams dang de bzhin du// sgo khyud rnams kyi tshad dang ni// sgo yi tshad kyang ci 'drar bgyi// mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol// lha bshos me tog bdug spos dang // bum pa rnams kyang rgyas par/ 
235b1(rgyud): gsungs/ slob ma ji ltar gzud pa dang // de ni ji ltar dbang bskur dang // bla ma la ni yon dbul dang // sprin bsreg gnas kyang bdag la gsungs// gsang sngags mtshan nyid ci 'dra lags// ting nge 'dzin dadu bzhed
235b2(rgyud): pa gang / de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das// chos kun dbang phyag thub pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsung // yid gcig tu ni tshwar nyon cig/ theg chen 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// gsang sngags spyad pa'i
235b3(rgyud): tshul gyi mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni// gang dag dris pa bshad par bya// sems can khams ni zhan byed cing // 'di ni chos dbyings ro yin par// sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon gsungs te// de
235b4(rgyud): phyir 'di ni tshon ces bya// tshen ni nang nas dgye bar bya// phyi rol nas ni tshon mi bgyi// dkar po thog mar btang bar bya// de yi 'og tu dmar po ste// de nas ser po btang bar bya// de yi 'og tu ljang khu btang // kun
235b5(rgyud): gyi nang rol nag po ste// tshon gyi cho ga de ltar bshad// rta babs rnaMm kyin kyang ni// dkyil 'khor dbu ma dang mnyam mo// sgo khyud dag kyang de dang mnyam// pad ma sor bcu drug tu bshad// dang po'i sgo ni snying po
235b6(rgyud): yi/ dkyil 'khor dang ni mnyam zhes bya// 'jigs med dag gis rim gyis ni// bsnyad de de bas lhag zhes pa// sgo rnams kyi ni bar bar du// sgo srungs rnams ni gzhag par bya// ting nge 'dzin ni mdor
235b7(rgyud): na sems// yang dag mgu yin par bshad// sems dpa' chen po khyab par ni// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// stong pa nyid ces rgyal bas gsungs// 
235b8(rgyud): de ni sems yongs shes pa las// thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan las min// de dag nyid ni spangs pa ste// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod// stong pa chen po zhes bya ste// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs/ 
236a1(rgyud): byed pa'o// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// stong nyid rtag tu dran par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad dang thabs gcig yang dag par mol nas
236a2(rgyud): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin so so'i tshul gsungs so// de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig pa'i stobs kyi shugs shes
236a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub snying por gshegs nas su// bdud ni rnam pa bzhi bco
236a4(rgyud): pas/ de nas dpa' bo chen po zhes// chongs la sogs pa lha tshogs rnams// 'jigs pa thams cad med pa'i sgra// dga' bzhin du ni sgrogs par byed// de phyin chad ni nga dpa' bo// dpa' bo chen po zhes
236a5(rgyud): su grags// skye ba med pa ngas rtogs pa// tshig gi smod yul rnam spangs shing // nyes pa thams cad med pa ste// rgyu dang tan dang bral ba yin// stong pa'i ya shes mkha' 'ad ba// mun pa kun dang bral gyur
236a6(rgyud): cing / shin du dri med de kho na// ji ltar 'byung ba nga la byung // kun mkhyen tsam gyi tshul du gnas// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas mtshan nyid do// nga yi de nyid dam pa 'di// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa ste// byin gyi
236a7(rgyud): brlabs kyi stobs kyis ni// yig 'bru rnams su bstan nasaM su// sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir// ngas ni thams cad rab tu bshad// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// ngo mtshar gyur nas mig
236a8(rgyud): gdangs ste// thams cad mkhyen pa mgo bo yis// pag 'tshal nas ni tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas kun gyi brabs dang ni// shes rab bsam yas ngo mtshar chu// smos pa kun dang bral ba yi// chos rtogs nas ni rang
236b1(rgyud): byung rnams// 'jig rten kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ston// gsang sngags mtshan nyid de lta bu// bden pa gnyis la lcags gnas pa// sas can kun gyis shes nas ni// 'jig rten gyi ni
236b2(rgyud): mchod gnas 'gyur// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyug na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsol nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mig mi 'dzums par lte bar bltas nas cang mi smra bar
236b3(rgyud): 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ sangs
236b4(rgyud): rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ dgos pa dang ni bral ba ru// 'jig rten mtshan nyid shes nas ni// dgos pa'i sa la gnas pa yin// gsang ba pa'i badrag po gzhan yang byang chub
236b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sa brgyad pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul ni/ chos rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing // srad dang skye ba rnam spangs pa'i// 'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes nas// 'jig rten 'jig
236b6(rgyud): rten dbang du 'dod// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang // nyan thos dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams// skye ba dang 'jig par rtogs nas/ mtha' gnyis bshig pas rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 
236b7(rgyud): shin du dngos po med pa'i ye shes mi spyod de/ 'di ni nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam par bshig nas brjod du med po'i
236b8(rgyud): tshul la gnas pa rnams ni chos thams cad brjod du med do snyam pa'i ye shes 'jug ste/ ngag shin du 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par reg par byed pa 'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge
237a1(rgyud): 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gasdang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams rgyu las 'bras bu dang las 'byung ba 'am/ ldog par rtog cing gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kun
237a2(rgyud): du skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'jan gyi tshul lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul yin te/ de la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// byang chub
237a3(rgyud): sems dpa' skyob rnams dang // nyan thos nges pa sdig bcom par// grags pa gang dag yin pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi lha gang yin// gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga'i tshul// sems can rnams la phan
237a4(rgyud): 'dod pas// dpa' bo de tshe 'chad par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rnams kyi gsang sngag
237a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gser ba
237a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po de la rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang sngags ni/ tshig dang ming dang brda yis mtshan// tshig de dbang du gyur pas na// gsang sngags don rnams thams cad sgrub// kha nig bskal ba'i tshig
237a7(rgyud): dang ldan// kha cig rang mod thog mar spros// hUM dang phaT dang ldan pa ni// gtsug tor rnams kyi yin par bsgrags// zung ze tshom shig ces bya ba dang // sman song drol cig bre ba ni// phyag byarkyen rnams dang
237a8(rgyud): khro ba yi/ gsang sngags yin par 'dren pas gsungs// na maHswAhA la sogs ldan// ting nge 'dzin ni rtogs pas mtshan// zhi ba'i yig gi rnam par dag/ re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// gsang sngags
237b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyeb pa'i yin// nyan thos rnams kyi gsang sngags ni// gcig pu bzhi ni gcig la gnas// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin te// khyad par dag ni bshad byan
237b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par lngas// los tshe rnam par sbyong shes bya// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / gsang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas byed du ma bcug/ rjes su yid rang ba
237b3(rgyud): ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid de// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ byung yang rung ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de ni ye nas gnas pa ste/ de yang 'di ltar gsang
237b4(rgyud): sngags rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi chos nyid do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa/ 'jig rten du byung ba de'i tshe/ chos
237b5(rgyud): nyid de tshul sna tshogs dang dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis/ sems can bsam pa sna tshogs pa rnams la/ tshig sna tshogs dang yig 'bru sna tshogs dang / yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu brjod pa sna tshogs dang / dbyangs sna
237b6(rgyud): tshogs su go ba rnams su byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do// ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// gsang sngags kyi tshul yig 'bru dag tu byin gyi rlob ce na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
237b7(rgyud): de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
237b8(rgyud): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
238a1(rgyud): 'dres pa bco brgyad gang dag yin pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
238a2(rgyud): kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs kyis byin brlabs nas/ sems can rnams la skul ba ji lta ba bzhin
238a3(rgyud): du gsang sngags kyi cho ga yang dag par rab tu ston to// gsung sngags kyi cho ga yang gang zhe na/ gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir a ni ches thams cad kyi sgo'o// dgos pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ ka ni chos
238a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgo'o// nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ kha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'gro ba thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ga ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gcig tu 'bungs
238a5(rgyud): pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir g+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'chi 'pho thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ ce ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// grib ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ tsha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 
238a6(rgyud): skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dza ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dri ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dz+nyA ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ Ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bskyed
238a7(rgyud): po dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ Tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ Da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bslu ba dang yongs su grol ba'i phyir/ zla ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 
238a8(rgyud): de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gnas dmigs su med pa'i par/ tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'dul ba dmigs su med pa'i par/ da ni chos thams cad kyi
238b1(rgyud): sgo'o// khams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ d+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// don dam pa'i bden pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// dbu ba dang 'dra bar snying po med pa'i phyir/ pa ni chos
238b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgra'o// ngag gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir kha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// srid pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ b+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgra'o// 'tsho ba dmigs su mang po'i phyir/ ma ni
238b3(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// theg pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ya ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir// ra ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa'i
238b4(rgyud): phyir/ la ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i phyir/ sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis bam po'i phyir/ Sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bden pa thams cad dmigs su med
238b5(rgyud): pa'i phyir sa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rgyu dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po nga dang nye dang Na dang na ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba ste// 
238b6(rgyud): mthu thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu myur bar dgos pa'i don rab tu sgrub par byed pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi tshul ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
238b7(rgyud): byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bosam gyis ma khyab pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid don nges pa/ dus gsum las
238b8(rgyud): shin du 'das pa/ nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa ste/ bsam yas sems kyi sa la gnas// las dang bya ba dag las byung // spyad pa'i sa ni rjes thob nas// bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin par byed// 'di ni
239a1(rgyud): de nyid dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bstan// gsang sngags cho ga 'di shes na// sngags pa dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog/ gsang sngags rnams kyi
239a2(rgyud): gsang sngags mtshan// gsang sngag pa yid la sems na ni// 'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas thob po// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom
239a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar logs so// da ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 
239a4(rgyud): thun mong ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dge gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa'i sems can de dag kyang thun mong ma lags pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang
239a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi yo pad kye cho ga bshad du gsol// da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa' bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas grags pa de yas su// 
239a6(rgyud): me tog sar po dkar po dmar// yid du 'ong bas nan tanra du// lha rnams la ni mchod pa bya// pad ma 'am yang na ud pa la// nA ga ge sar pun na ga/ tsam pa a sho ka ti la ka/ paM Da la dang sa la'ang rung // 
239a7(rgyud): de la sogs pa'i me tog rnams// yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug/ bkra shis pa la sngags pa yis// mkhas pas nan tan mchod par bya// tsan dan ta dkar smri ka dang // gur gum dang ni ru rta'ang rung // spos
239a8(rgyud): mchog rab tu bzang po ni// sna tshogs yid du 'ong bar dbul// a ka ru 'am sgron shing ngam// ga pur dang ni tsan dan dang / sA la'i thang tshwa bkra shis pa 'am// shi ri bi sa ka yang rung // gzhan yang bdag spos
239b1(rgyud): sna tshogs pa// bkra shis 'jig rten rnam par glags// yid 'ong sngags pas chog bzhin// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas gzhan yang sems dpa' che// lha ba shos las kyi cho ga nyon// 'o thug 'bras chan
239b2(rgyud): zhor sbyar dang // la du dang ni khur skya dang // gar b+hod kA ra yid 'ong dang // khan da'i bcwa' ba bzang po dang // pu ri ki dang g+ha r-i ka/ de bzhin ma thur shI r+ya dang // phi nA a sh+lokra par tI dang // pAr pA ta yang dbul bar bya'o// 
239b3(rgyud): de la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang // shing tog rnams ni sna tshogs dang // hwags dang li kha ra rnams dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dag dang // btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // zho dang 'o ma rgyas par dbul// mar ma rnam pa sna
239b4(rgyud): tshogs pa/ gtsang zhing shin du bzang po ya// 'bru mar rab tu dri zhim pas// rab tu bkang ste dbul bar bya// phyogs su gdugs dang ba dan rnams// kha dog sna tshogs rab tu bsgrags// rta babs bzang po rnams
239b5(rgyud): kyang ni/ dril bu dang bcas rab tu dbul// yang na yid kyi mchod pa ni// thams cad nan tan bskrad de ba// de nas bum pa brgyad dam ni// bcu drug rgyas par blangs nas su// sman dang rin chen thams cad blugs// 
239b6(rgyud): spos ki chus ni rab tu bkang // ldum bu dag gis kha brgyan te// de bzhin 'bas bus kha yang dgang // ma tog smos la sogs pas brgyan// shan du bzang pos bsrang ba bas// mgon pa ras kis bcings
239b7(rgyud): pa rnams// mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya// lha yi gtso bo rnams la ni// ras ni zung re zung ra dbul// sems dpa' chen po phal rnams la// ya re ya re dbul por bsgrags// mched pa de ltar
239b8(rgyud): byas nas ni// slob ma dkyil 'khor drud bkug ste// sngags pas chu yis bsang gtor bya// dri dang me ti ga sbyin par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa dran byas nas// byang chub sems kyang 'dzin du gzhug/ des
240a1(rgyud): na rgyal ba'i rigs dag la// thams cad rab tu skyes par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// phyag rgya de dag rnams la bcing // chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bcings nas ni// rdo rje sems dpar
240a2(rgyud): byin gyis brlab// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis ni// dam tshig sems dpa' can gyis bcing // de tshe sngags kyis cho ga bzhin// ras la lan gsum gdab par bya// snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis su// de
240a3(rgyud): dag gi ni gdong yang dgra ba// dam tshig lan gsum bzlas nas ni// spyi bor yig gi ra zhes pa// klad kyi 'khor bcas brjid dang ldan// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro// zla ba 'char ka lta bu yi// kha dog
240a4(rgyud): dkar po bzhag par bya// skyob pa kun gyi spyan sngar ni// de nas ma tog 'dor du gzhug/ me tog gang la babs pa de// sngags pas de la sbyin par bya// dkyil 'khor dang po sgo yi drung // sgo khyud kyi ni dbus
240a5(rgyud): kyi chaHdkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo gnyis kyi// bar du slob ma gzung bar bya// der gnas pa la cho ga kun// rim pa bzhin du legs par bya// slob ma sdig dang bral ba kun// de ltar legs par btsud nas
240a6(rgyud): de dag zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// sprin bsreg cho ga bzhin du bya// snying po dkyil 'khor gyi ni mudan// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i rgyab rol gyi// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi tsher// ma yangs pa'i sems kyis bya// 
240a7(rgyud): me thab khru gang tsam gyi ni// tshad du rab tu bsgrags pa yin// kha ran sor bzhi'i tshad du bya// dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag/ de nas sngags pa'i g.yas logs su// sbyin bsreg ga ni yo byad bzhag/ g.yon gyi phyogs
240a8(rgyud): su slob ma rnams// tsog tsog por ni 'khod du gzhug/ sdom brtson bdag nyid sa steng du// ku sha bting ba'i stan la 'dug/ yang na tshon rtsi dmar po mchog/ rab tu bzang po blangs nas su// de yis me yi gnas
240b1(rgyud): rnams kun// sngags pas mdo ru bri bar bya// ku shwa dag gis g.yas phyogs nas// thams cad khor yug dgram pa ni// mang pos bskor ba'i tshul du 'gram// spos kyi tshwa yis bsang gtor bya// de nas sems can
240b2(rgyud): phan byed pa'i// me ni thab khung nang bsams nas// bArtul zhugs bzang pos bgang blug mchog/ gsang sngags 'di yis sbyin par bya// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA na/ a ga nA ye/ swA hA// de nas slob ma re re nas/ 
240b3(rgyud): mkhas pa'i lag pa g.yen pa yis// g.yas pa'i mthe bo bzung nas su// mnyam par gzhag pas sbyin bsreg bya// yid ni mnyam par gzhag nas su// bsreg blugs re re las kyang ni// gsang sngags cho ga
240b4(rgyud): bzhin zlos shing // nyi shu rtsa gcig sprin bsreg bya// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAna?/ oM ma hA shAn+ti ga tA/ shAn ti ka ra pra sha ma d+harma na ri dza ta a b+hA ba sA b+ha ba d+harma sa mne tA prA pa te swA hA// sbyin bsreg rjes la/ 
240b5(rgyud): sngags pa yis// sleb mu rnams la yon bslang ba// gsar dang dngul dang rin chen dang // rta dang de bzhin glang po dang // rnga mo ba dang ma he gos// gzhan yang dngos po ci yang rung // de tshe slob mos gas par ni// dang
240b6(rgyud): pa rab tu ldan pa yis// sems la dga' ba bsnyad nas su// bla ma la ni yon dbul lo// yang na ci nas bla ma de// rab tu mgu bar 'gyur bar bya// de ltar bas nas bdag bsrungs te// sleb ma da bos bsgo ba ni// 'di
240b7(rgyud): ni bsod nams zhing yin zhes// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// skyob pa rnams ni kun gyis gsungs// rnam dag yon tani rgyas pa yi// dege 'dun la ni kun gyis byin// dge 'dun la phul 'bras bu che// skyes bu
240b8(rgyud): mkhas pa gang dag gis// dge 'dun la ni yon phul na// long smod chen po ma zad pa// 'jig rten 'thad pa skye bar 'gyur// de bas thams cad 'thun par ni// sems la dga' ba bskyed nas su// sangs rgyas
241a1(rgyud): bsngags pa'i dge 'dun la// ci nus par ni mchod bstod bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ sas
241a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po dbang bskur ba// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa// rgyas par du ni bshad par bya// yid gcig bsdus te legs par nyon// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dkyil
241a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi mdun tu bar khru ngo bor nas phyi rol gyi sa la dkyil 'khor gnyis pa gru bzhi la sgo gcig pa bri bar bya'i// grwa bzhir rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhi dgod de// bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste spros pa med par
241a4(rgyud): gnas pa dang // nam mkha' dri ma med pa dang // de ma med pa'i mig dang ni// gos sna tshogs gyon pa rnams so// dbus su pad ma chen po 'dab ma brgyad pra ze ba dang bcas pa bzhag ste/ 'dab ma bzhi la
241a5(rgyud): bang chub sems dpa' gogs su gyur pa son gya smon lam gyi mtha can bzhi bri bar ba su/ 'di lnga sna gzungs ku dbang phrug rgyal po dang dran pa dang shas bzhin can dang / phan pa' lhag pa'i bas
241a6(rgyud): po can dang / snying rje can no// 'dab ma gzhan rnams la ni phyag brnyan bzhi bri ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi khyad par la spyod pa dang / 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ma
241a7(rgyud): chags pa dang rnam par grol ba'o// dbus su na chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzugs bzhag go/ de nas rin po che'i bum po bzhi rin po che dang sman thams cad blugs pa kun du bzang
241a8(rgyud): po dang / byams pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan ngon thams cad spong ba rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// pad ma dam pa de la ni// sngags pa/ 
241b1(rgyud): bdag gis de bzhag nas// spos dang me tog gis mchod de mar ma mchod yon sbran par bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang // rnga skra yad du 'ong ba dang // bka shis rgya chen snyan pa yi// tshig gis legs
241b2(rgyud): par mngon dga' bya// skyob pa rnams kyi spyan snga ru// de ni bsgrims te dbang bskur ro// spros dang me tog bzang po yis// de la yang ni mchod pa bya// de nas gser gyi thur ma ni// thogs te mdun du 'dug nas su
241b3(rgyud): slob ma'i snying la 'bab pa'i tshig/ 'di skad ces ni smra bar bya// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// 'jig rten ling tog bsal ba bzhin// bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i// ling tog rgyal ba rnams kyi bas de nas
241b4(rgyud): me long blangs nas su// chos kyi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dang zhing dag la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing brjod du med// rgyu dang las las byung ba ste// ngo bo nyid med gnas
241b5(rgyud): med pa/ de ltar chos 'di shes nas su// sems can don ni mnyam meng byos// 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skyes// de nas rkang pa'i bar 'og tu// chos kyi 'khor lo bzhag par bya// de nas lag pa g.yas par yang
241b6(rgyud): shin du bzang po'i dang byin te// chos kyi dung ni bla med pa// kun du rgyas par bus nas su// de ring phan chad 'jig rten la// skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor// som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing // dogs pa med pa'i seMs
241b7(rgyud): kyis khyod/ gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ 'jig rten 'di la rab tu shod// de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la// pani 'dogs byas pa gzo zhes bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang // khyod la rnam pa kun du srung // 
241b8(rgyud): de nas slob ma da bslang la// sngogs pa snying rjer gyur pa yi// yid kyis nad du bcug nas ni// de la dam tshig bstan par bya// de rang phan chad bu khyod kyis// dam pa'i chos kyang bang chub sems// srog gi phyir dang da
242a1(rgyud): @#// phyin chad/ yongs su btang bar mi bya'o// khyod kyi ser sna dang ni gang // sems can gnod pa mi bya'o// dam tshig 'di dag sangs rgyas kyis// brtul zhugs bzang po khyod la bshad// ji ltar rang gi srog
242a2(rgyud): bsrung ba/ de ltar khyod kyis 'di ltar bsrungs// slob mas bla ma'i rkang pa la// dad cing gus par phyag byas pa// shin du nges pa'i yid kyis ni// de dag thams cad khas blang ngo // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
242a3(rgyud): la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i dam tshig la
242a4(rgyud): zhugs par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ji tsam zhig mngon par 'das bgyis par rig par bgyi/ da skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad da ces
242a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// sems dang po bsnyad pa nas nye bar gzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'das byas pa yang ji tsam pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
242a6(rgyud): bsod nams mngon par 'dus byas pa yang de tsam du rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin
242a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i zhal dang thugs las skyes pa'i sras yin par rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag phyogs gang na gnas pa dar de bzhin gshegs pas/ ched po dgongs mi dgongs
242a8(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis de dag la mchod par bya'o// de bzhin
242b1(rgyud): gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod pa rnams kyis de dag la blta bar bya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag dang / kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242b2(rgyud): chen po de rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa// bcom ldan 'das dang slan chad rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de rnams la rim gror bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe
242b3(rgyud): na/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su lta bar bgyi lags so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
242b4(rgyud): dag la gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin de rnams dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsang
242b5(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas par 'jug pa rgya chen po las byung ba// sna tshogs kyi gzugs kyi nor bu dang 'dra ba ra ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bsod nams kyi
242b6(rgyud): tshogs dpag tu med pa byasags pas/ thogs pa med pa'i rtogs pa la gnas pa dus gsum du chags pa med pa'i stobs ldan pa dag yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag
242b7(rgyud): na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dzin du rnams dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis mgrini gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab po// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab po// de nas
242b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ljags kyi dbang po 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par rnam par sprul pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun du g.yogs nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtog
243a1(rgyud): / rgya chen po yongs su drag pa'i rtse mo lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
243a2(rgyud): kyis chos kyi dbyings khyab pas sems can gyi khams ma lus pa rnams yongasu bslab pa'i sku 'ben pa rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo stobs chen mo bsrang ba chen mo 'di gsungs so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+haH
243a3(rgyud): sarba b+ha ya bi ga ti b+h+yo ba shA mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA haM khang rak+Sha ma hA ba lA sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya nor dza te hUM hUM hU~M ta Ta ta Ta a pra ti ha te swA hA// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyis// rigs sngags 'di gsungs med
243a4(rgyud): la ni/ de tshe sangs rgyas zhing 'di dag/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i de kun gyis// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mig gdangs nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sman sngar ni// yid du 'ong ba'i
243a5(rgyud): tshig smras pa// a ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bsrung ba rab tu stobs chen 'di// sems can thams cad bsrung ba dang // bskyab cing sba ba'i phyir gsungs te// gang gi snying la bsrung gnas pa// de
243a6(rgyud): dag la ni 'jigs pa mad// gsang sngags mtha chen dan byas na// bgags dang log 'don thams cad dang // srin pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs rgyan na// da dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// de nas yang
243a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dbyings rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs nas de'i tshe chos kyi mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
243a8(rgyud): zhugs ma thag tu dam tshig la 'jog pa'i rig sngags byung ngo // na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA~M/ a sa me/ tri sa mo// sau ma yo swAhA/ de nas dom thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ngan byang chub sems #
243b1(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du dam tshig la 'jug pa'i rig sngags kyi sgra gang zhig thos nas mkhas pa rnams chos thams cad las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba grag par gyur to// de nas yang bcom
243b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings kun du 'byung ba'i gsang sngags gsungs pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlabs pa'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rA
243b3(rgyud): NAMHbadz+ra At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM/ badz+ra ka pa tsa hUM/ rdo rje go cha'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ta thA ga tAHtsag+na ra b+huHa ba lo ka ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs
243b4(rgyud): pa'i sman no/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ bi shud d+ha gan d+hod b+ha ba swA hA/ byug spos kyi sngags so// na maHse mna? ta bud d+ha nAM/ ma hA me tri byAd ga ta sAM hA/ mye te ga gi sngogs so// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ d+harma d+ha tA/ 
243b5(rgyud): nu ga tau sAhA// bdug spos kyi sngags so// na maHsa man ta pud d+hA naM/ ta thA ga tA ra tsa s+pha ra Na a pa b+hU sa ga ga not+ta ra b+h+yaHsA hA/ mAr me'i sngags so// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na sa ma se ma sA hAM// 
243b6(rgyud): mchod yin gyi sngags so// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na nan ta s+pha ra Na bi shud d+ha d+harma nir dza ta swA hA/ gtsug to r-i gyi stegs so// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ pra tsaN+Da badz+ra dz+wa la bi s+pha ra hUM/ de bzhin gshig/ 
243b7(rgyud): pa'i go cha'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ dz+wa lA mI li ni ta thA ga ta ra tsi swA hA/ kun du 'bar ba'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA ga ta dzi hA sad t+ya d+harma pra tauSh+Thi te swAhA/ de bzhin ga shegs pa'i ljags
243b8(rgyud): kyi'o// dkyil 'khor du dgos pa'i sngags kyi mdzod do// / bam po gsum pa// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
244a1(rgyud): @#// ji ltar na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i tshe na ni/ bgegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ba lags// gsang sngags sgrub pa'i cha na yang // log 'dren rnams ni ma mchis 'gyur// gsang sngags rnams kyang ji ltar sgrub
244a2(rgyud): de yi 'bras bu ci 'drar 'gyur// de skad gsol nas de yi tshe// bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyis// 'di skad ces ni bka' stsal to// sems dpa' chen po logs so legs// khyod kyis yongs su bris pa ga/ 
244a3(rgyud): thams cad khyod la bstan par bya// sngon chad sar sna bsten pa'i phyir// bgegs ni rlung gi sems las byung // de yi rgyu ni gzhig pa'i phyir// gang du sems dang sems byung ba'o// rtog pa thams cad spong ba dang // rnam
244a4(rgyud): par rtog pa las byung ba yi// smos pa thams cad zhagag 'gyur ba// byang chub sems dgas pashad pa yin// sngags pas pang chab sems dan zhing // ma g.yo ba na yid la bzlas// de ya phag rgya bcings nas ni// bgegs
244a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rlung bcings pa 'di nyon cig/ a zhes bya bar bdag bsgyur to// ha zhes bya ba yid la bzlas// rlung gi phyogs su gnas na ni// sa la spos kyi thig la
244a6(rgyud): dag/ bdun nyid lags par byas nas su// kham por gyis ni gdab par bya// kham por ra rib chen po ru// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// de yaM steng du a zhes po// klad kor bcas pa rgyas par bsam// rlung bcing
244a7(rgyud): tan pa de lta bu// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// sems dpa' chen po chu yi yang // yid gcig bsdus te mnyan mar gyis// sngags pas ra zhes bya ba ni// thams cad dmar po stobs chen bsam/ 
244a8(rgyud): 'bar bya'i phreng chunA maM bzud bya// khro bo lpag+sa nA rAl gyi phyogs/ rgyas la sprin gyi gzugs byis nas// ral gri'i phyag rgyas dbang bar bya// phyogs kun nas ni langs pa'i sbyin// de ma thag tu 'jig par 'gyur
244b1(rgyud): yang na sngags pa mi g.yeng bas// de dag phur bus gdab bya ste// mkhas pa rdo rjer gyur nas su// thams cad rdo rje'i pus gdab// yang na bgegs rnams thams cad ni// zhi bar bya ba yang bshad de// sngags
244b2(rgyud): pa dkyil 'khor dbus gnas te// mi g.yo stobs chen gsung sngags ni// shin du mi bzad bdag nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dgra la gnas par gsam// de'i gzugs brnyan byas nas ni// rkang pa g.yon pas
244b3(rgyud): spyi bor gzir// 'on tang de ni zhir 'gyur ba'am// dogs pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas su// skye tshe dag dang bsres pa yis// byugs nas sngags pas bskams nas ni// gdon
244b4(rgyud): do myur du tshig par 'gyur// de ni me la skams pa dang // dug gis bskus na nges par ni// tshangs pa 'am 'on te brgya byin na mo// de'i mod la myur du tshig/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di
244b5(rgyud): skad nus gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdage gis 'tshal pa ltar na bdag gis 'di ltar 'jal to// bcom ldan 'das rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi gnas la/ lha rnams ban gyis rlob
244b6(rgyud): par bgyid do// de nyid du gnas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' las kyang 'gal bar mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rang gi rigs la gnas pa de ni gsang sngags thams
244b7(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig lags so// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis kyang rang gi gnas la gnas nas/ don thams cad sgrub par bgyi'o// bcom
244b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// gsang po pa'i bdag po gzhan yang // gang gi kha dog gang gsungs pa// de nyid de'i dkyil 'khor te/ 
245a1(rgyud): lha yi gzugs ni de lta bur// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan// de la gsang ba pa'i bdag po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na// sems can blo zhan pa ma dad pa gang dag bstan po 'di la dad par
245a2(rgyud): mi 'gyur zhing / yid gnyis dang / sum nyi mang ba/ thos pa tsam snying por 'dzin pa sgrub pa la mi phyogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdag nyid kyang ma rung la/ gzhan yang phung bar byed
245a3(rgyud): ma yin no/ 'di skad du 'dzi ni phyi rol pa rnams lo yod de/ sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ni ma yin no// zhes smra bar 'gyur gyi mi blun po de dag gis 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa
245a4(rgyud): chos thams cad la mnga'o brnyes pa/ sems can gyi don rtogs par thugs su chud pa des/ sngon sems can rnams la phan par bzhed nas 'di dag thams cad bshad do// zhes bya bar ni mi shes
245a5(rgyud): so/ chos rnams kyi ni chos kyi mtshan// blun po des ni de ma shes// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// stong pa nyid du yang dag gsungs// sngags pa rtag tu der gnas nas// rab tu nges por las
245a6(rgyud): bya'o/ bgrogs zhi ma bya ba Ta mi par bya 'i rgyas pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / kun rje bzang po la stsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
245a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal nas/ snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i sgo ji snyed rtogs pa/ rang rang gi tshig tu brjod pa'i
245a8(rgyud): sa gsang sngags rnams smra bar 'dod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang rdo rje
245b1(rgyud): 'dzin de dag la mi nyams pa'i chos nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag chos kyi dbyings ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags
245b2(rgyud): kyi tshig rnams smros shog/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags
245b3(rgyud): smras pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nA~M/ sa man tA nu ga ta be rA dza d+harma nir dza tA ma hA swA hA// kun du bzang po'o'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po kun du mngon par 'byung ba
245b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi snying po smras pa/ ne maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ a dzi tan dza yau sarba tA ya sha yA nu ga tau swA hA/ byams pa'i 'o// de nas byang chub
245b5(rgyud): sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po rnam par dag pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa ma ni ta bud d+hA nAM/ A kA sha sa maM tA nr-i
245b6(rgyud): ga ta bi tsita tr-i ba ra d+ha ra swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba snying rje chen po'i stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
245b7(rgyud): zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ AM satwAM hi tA a b+hud ga ta traM traM raM raM swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du/ 
245b8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun du spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi snying po 'khor dang bcas par smras pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA
246a1(rgyud): / sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti ka ru NA mA yA ra ra ra hUM dza swAhA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM dz+r-i dza~M swAhA/ mthu chen thob kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud
246a2(rgyud): d+hA nAM/ ka ru No b+ha be tA re tA ra Na swAhA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i 'o// ne maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM/ sar ba b+ha ya/ tA sa ni hUM s+pho Ta ya swAhA/ khro gnyer can ma'i 'o// na muHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ to prA
246a3(rgyud): gai tuM bi sha ya saM b+ha bi pid me mA li nr-i swAhA/ gos dkar can ma'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ hUM khA da b+hany+dzi s+pho Ta ya swAhA/ rta mgrin gyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying pos
246a4(rgyud): rdo rje mi shigs pa rtogs pa'i yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags smras pa// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha ha ha pu ta nu swA hA// sa'i snying po'i 'o// 
246a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nar gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi beni brlabs rnam par 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi snying po smras pa// na maHsa man te
246a6(rgyud): bud d+hA nAM/ he he he ku mA ra ka bi muka ti sa thA nr-i ti smai ra sma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swA hA/ 'jam dpal gyi'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje/ rdo rje mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting dze 'dzin la snyoms par
246a7(rgyud): zhugs nas rang gi snyi po 'o khyor dang bzlas pa smras pa/ na maHsa men ta badz+rA NAM tsarba Da ma hA roShAr+NahUM/ phyug na rdo rje'i'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM tri Ta tri ma dza yan ti swA hA/ mA ma kI'i'o// na maHsa man ta
246a8(rgyud): badz+rA NAM hUM b+han d+ha ya/ bAn d+hA ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ badz+rod b+ha be/ sar pa tra A pr-i t+ye he te swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi'i'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM/ hUM hU~M phaT swA hA// khro bo zla gtse'i'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rANA
246b1(rgyud): sir ba d+harma nir b+he da ni badz+ra su tsi ba ra de swA hA/ rdo rje me'i'o// na maHsa mun tA badz+rA NA~M hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT dza~M dza~M swAhA/ rdo rje 'dzin kun gyi'i'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM he he ki tsau rA ya si grih+Na gr-ih+Na/ khA da khA da/ ba
246b2(rgyud): pU ra ya sa pra tIdz+nyA na swA hA/ phyag brnyan thams cad kyi'o'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dis shAkya thub pa rin chen 'byung nas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi snying po 'khor dang
246b3(rgyud): bi ces par gsungs paM/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA NAM/ sar ba kle sha ni shud d+ha na/ sar ba d+harma ba shi ta prI pa ta ga ga na sa ma sa ma swA hA// shAkya thub pa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM ba ra de ba ra pra pa ta hUMH
246b4(rgyud): mdzod spu'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ baM baM hUM hUM phaT swA hA// gtsug tor thams can+da kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM/ d+h+r-i d+hI ri ri dz+r-i dzI swA hA/ khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i 'o// na maH
246b5(rgyud): sa man te bud d+hA nAM/ a pa rA dzi te dzi yane ti ta Ti te swA hAM// gzhan gyi sa mi thub ma'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nI/ pr-i thi byaM swA hA// sa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM/ biSh+Nu be swA hA// khyab
246b6(rgyud): 'jug ga'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ rudrA ya swA hA/ drag po'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ bA ya be swA hA// rlung gi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ sa ra sA ta ya swA hA// dbyangs can gyi'o// 
246b7(rgyud): nas na ta bud d+hA nA~M/ na k+Sha s+t+rai d+hi pa ta me sbyi/ byidan bral gyi'o// namanamasan ta nA~M/ bigs d+d+hi sa si~MhA/ gshin rje'o// na/ sa man ta bud d+hAnA~M/ mr-id to le AH/ 
246b8(rgyud): bdag gi'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM kA la rA tri ye swA hA// dus mtshan gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ mA tri b+h+yaHswA hA/ ma mo rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ sha krA ya swA hA/ 
247a1(rgyud): brgya byin gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hAn+ta/ a pam pa ta yo swAhA/ chu lha'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA naM/ A di t+yA ya swAhA// nyi ma'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ pra dzA pa ta ye swAhA/ 
247a2(rgyud): tshangs pa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ tsan+d+ra ya swAhA/ zla ba'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ me g+ha sha ni yai swA hU~M/ dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
247a3(rgyud): bstan pa don yod par sgrub pa bzhi nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsungs pa/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ga ga na pa ra lak+Sha ka Ne ga ga na
247a4(rgyud): sa ma sar bod ga tA ti se ra sam b+hA ba dz+wa la na mo a mo g+ha nr-i swA hA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum na mkha'i spyan gyi'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
247a5(rgyud): bgegs thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir gzi brjid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lo snyoms par zhugs nas/ bgegs chen po 'joms pa'i gsung sngags 'di gsungs so// na maHsa man ta badz+rA
247a6(rgyud): N+yai ts+tshaN+Da rA mahA ro Sh+Tha r+Na s+pho Ta ya hUM trag hU~M ma~M/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i'o// nA maHsa mAn t+ya badz+rA NAM ha ha ha besmA ye/ sar bA ta thA ga tA bi Sha ya/ sam b+ha ba tre lo kye bau dzA ya hUM dzaHswAr+b+ba/ khams gsum las
247a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i'o// na mchis man ta bud d+hA nAM/ he tu pra t+ya bi ga ta d+harma naMr dza tahU~M/ nyan thos rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA ba/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA~M/ sar pra
247a8(rgyud): bud g+h+nAM bo d+hi sa twa hrid yAn po sha ni na ma sar+b+ba bo d+ye swAhA/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po'o// na maHsa ma~Mn ta bud d+hAnA lo ka le ka ka rA ya~M sarba dI bi nA ga ya k+Sha gni d+ha ra ga/ ngas su
247b1(rgyud): a su ra/ ga ru Da kin na ra ma ho ra ga hri da yan n+ya ka ri Sha ya bi tsita tra ga ti swAh+ma/ lha la sogs pa'i snying po'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM sarba b+hA bi ma ti bi kri ra Na d+harma d+hA tu nir dza ta saM saM swA hA// byang chub
247b2(rgyud): / sems dpa' thams cad kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ dur d+ha ri Shi ma hA ro Shi Na khA da ya sarbA na ta thA gra ta/ Adz+nyA ku ru swA hA/ sgo bsrungs gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i 'o// na maHsa man te bud d+hA nAM/ haM ma hA
247b3(rgyud): pra tsaN Da a b+hi mu kha gr-i h+ma khA da ya ki ta tsi rA ya saM sa ma ye ma nu sma ra swA hA/ sgo bsrungs mngon du phyogs pa zhes bya ba'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ sarba tA nu ga te ban d+ha sI man ta ma hA sa ma ye nir dza ta
247b4(rgyud): sma ra Ne a pra ti ha ti d+ha kA d+hi ka/ tsa ra tsa ra/ b+han d+ha ban d+ha da sha di shin sarbe ta thA ga ta u nudz+nyA te pra bo ra d+harma la ba d+ha biM dza ye b+ha ga ba ti bi ku ri bi ku le l-i lu paM raM sA hA// mtshams chen po gcod pa'i 'o// na ma
247b5(rgyud): sa man ta bud d+hA nI a/ byang chub kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM A/ spyod pa'i'o// na miHse man ta bud d+hA nAM/ oM rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM a/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i'o// na ma
247b6(rgyud): sa man ta badz+rA NAM hA/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'o'o// na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM haM/ 'phags pa mi g.yo mgon gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM A/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i 'o// 
247b7(rgyud): na maHsa man te bud d+hA nAM sa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi'o// na maHsa man ta dud d+hA nAM baM/ phyag na rdo rje'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM maM/ 'jam dpal gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM ga/ nam mkha'i spyan
247b8(rgyud): gyi'o// na maHsa mnaM traM bud d+h+r-i nAM/ raM chos kyi dbyings kyi'o// na maHsa man ta budad+d+hinAM kha~M/ dpa' bo chen po'i'o// na maHsaM maMnaM ta bud d+hA nAM dzaM/ chu'i dbang po'i'o// na ma sa men ta bud d+hA nAM r+d+ha
248a1(rgyud): @/ lha mo sgrol ma'i'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nAn b+h+r-i/ khro gnyer can ma'i 'o// ma na sa man ta bud d+ha nAna? paM/ gos dkar can gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn saM/ mthu chen thob kyi'o// na ma sa man d+ha
248a2(rgyud): bud d+hA nAn hAM/ rta mgrin gyi'o// na ma/ sa man ta bud d+hA nA na yaM/ gra gis 'dzin ma'i 'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nAn saM/ phyag na rin chen gyi'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nAn dzAM/ dra ba'i 'od kyi'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nAn b+hA/ 
248a3(rgyud): shAkya thub pa yi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn hAM t+yaM rI/ gtsug tor gsum gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn la/ gdugs dkar po'i'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn shai/ gtsug tor rgyal ba'i 'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nAn sau/ 
248a4(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn tri/ gzi brjid phung po'i 'o// na maHse man ta bud d+hA nAn hUM/ rnam pa ra mthor ba'i 'o// na me sa man ta bud d+hA nA na hUM/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o// 
248a5(rgyud): na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn bI/ sa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn ki lI/ sgra can ma'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn da li/ nye sgra can ma'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAn mi li/ sna tshogs ma'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha
248a6(rgyud): nAn hi li/ nor ldan ma'i 'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nAn hA sa nAn/ ngo mtshar can gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nA na ra sa nAne/ sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAn d+haM sa nAn/ ngan song/ 
248a7(rgyud): thams cad spongs pa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hi nAn bi ha sa nAn/ yongs su skyong snyoms blo gros kyi'o// na mAHsa myan t+ya bud d+ha nAn yAM byams pa chen po mngon par 'byung ba'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bide d+hA nAM d+hA nA yan/ snying
248a8(rgyud): / sa gdungs pa'i'o// nA maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM AM/ gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i 'o// na ma/ so na ma ta bud d+hA nAM aM/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros can gyi'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nAM traM/ rin chen 'byung gA
248b1(rgyud): kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM NaM/ phyag na rin chen gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM taM/ sa 'dzin gyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM au/ gzungs thob pa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM D+haM/ phyag na rin chen
248b2(rgyud): / phyag rgya'i'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nAM ShaM/ bsam pa bstan pa'i 'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM haM/ nam mkha' dri med kyi'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA nAM ring / nam mkha' blo gros kyi'o// na ma
248b3(rgyud): sa man ta bud d+ha nAM ga taM/ blo gros rnam pa ra dag pa'i 'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nAM d+hI/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM hAM/ brtan pa'i blo gros kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM d+hing shing
248b4(rgyud): te biM/ phyag brnyan rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM k+ShaHTa/ ta ra yaM kang / byang chub sems dpa' ji skad gsungs pa rnams kyi'i// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma no mA ye d+ha ra ma sam b+ha bo bi b+ha be
248b5(rgyud): ka tha ne/ sa sa ne/ gnas gtsang ma rnams kyi'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+hA mAM krang ke re/ srin mo rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM dzI/ ha/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha naM/ 
248b6(rgyud): yak+Sha bI rA d+ha ri/ gnod sbyin ma rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM me tsi mi tsa/ sha za mo rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ guM hu au au/ 'byung po rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man
248b7(rgyud): ta bud d+hA nAM/ ra TaM ra Ti/ br-i TaM pra TaM/ lha ma yin rnams kyi'o// na maHsa min ta bud d+ha nAM/ ga ra lan ba ra nAM/ lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi'o// na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ha sa nan bi hA sa nan/ mi 'am ci rnams kyi'o// nA maH
248b8(rgyud): sa man te bud d+ha nA~M/ i ta tsa lA ra na ma ni mo// mi rnams kyi'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sogs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags ngas bshad de de la gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po de bas mnyan par gyis/ a zhes
249a1(rgyud): thab sngags kun gyi// snying po yin pa ya dag pashad // de lugasang sngags kun gnas te// de ltar sngags rnams nam du' dzes// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
249a2(rgyud): rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las spyi'i gsang sngags kyi mdzod rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gas ngeb pa'i
249a3(rgyud): bdag po gisang stsogs ji ltar sgrub pa dang / bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin nyon// yi ge dang ni yi ger sbyar// de bzhin gzhi las gzhor 'gyur pa// shin du bsdams pas yid la ni// bzlas brjod 'bum
249a4(rgyud): p+lag gcig bya'o// yi ge byang chub sems yin te// gnyis pa sgra zhes bya ba yin// gzhi ni rang gi lha gzhag po// rang gi lus kyi gnas la bya// gzhi gnyis pa ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// rkang gnyis mchog tu
249a5(rgyud): shes par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// sngags pas de la gnas par bsams// yi ge rnams ni go rims bzhin// de yi dbus su legs par dgod// slar sdud pa yi tshig gis non// 
249a6(rgyud): / srog dang rtsol ba rnam par sbyangs// srog ces bya ba rlung du bshad// ro maHdran pa zhes bya ste// de gnyis bsdams pa byas nas su// sngon du bsnyen pa legs par bya// de nas sngags pa zla gcig tu// shin du
249a7(rgyud): sngams de bzlas brjod bya// gsang sngags sngon du sbed pa ni// gzhi gcig nas ni gcig tu 'jug/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sngar spyad pa zhes bshad pa yin// de phyin chad ni gang cung zad
249a8(rgyud): me tog spos la sogs dbul zhing // sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir// de tshe byang chub tu yang bsngo// sngags pas 'jigs med de lta bur// zla gnyis pa la bzlas brjod bya// de nas zla ba nya'i tshe// mi de
249b1(rgyud): sgrub la 'jug par bya// ri rtse dang ni ba glang lhas// de bzhin 'bab chu'i mdog dag dang // lam gyi bzhi mdo mtshan gcig dang // ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// dkyil 'khor nan tan bri bya ba// thams cad
249b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i khang par byas// des ni der gnas bsrung byas nas// sgrub pa li ni nan tan bya// der ni mtshan mo nam phyed dam// yang na nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe// 'di lta'i lhas rnams 'byung 'gyur te// blo dang ldan pas de shes bya
249b3(rgyud): hUM zhes pa dang rdo sgra dang // de bzhin sa ni g.yo ba dang // yid du 'ongo ba'i tshig kyang rung // de ni nam mkha' las grag na// mtshan ma dag ni de rnams kyis// yid bzhin rdzas grub shes pa ste// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis
249b4(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis// de yi 'bras bur yang dag bshad// de ltar sngags kyi tshul gnas pa// de ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// sngags nyid rtag tu dran par bya// sngon gyi sangs
249b5(rgyud): rgyas mthu chen gyis// de ni dran par bya ba'ang bshad// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa rim par phye/ 
249b6(rgyud): pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// dus gsum mtha' yas pa'i sgo nges
249b7(rgyud): pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i chos kyi tshig rnams gsungs so// mkha' ltar dri med ngo bo nyid med pa// rnam mang ye shes sna tshogs sbyin par byed// ngo bo nyid kyis rtag tu stong pa nyid/ rkyen la
249b8(rgyud): rag las zab cing lta bar dka'// khyod par 'gro ba rnams la rtag par ru// rnam par bsams pa'i 'bras bu mchog sbyin byed// ji ltar nam mkha'i chags med spyod yul can// 'gro ba kun gyi gnas
250a1(rgyud): gyur pa ltar// de bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid 'di// srid gsum ma lus 'byor pa 'byung bar byed// mchog skyes mkhas pa gang zhig 'dir spyod na/ rgyal ba kun dang spyod yul gcig par
250a2(rgyud): 'gyur// rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa'i chos nyid ni// shin tu rnam dag thams cad snang byed pa// de las go 'phang rnyed dka' gzhan med do// yangs pa'i chos ni zab la 'grib med cing // mnyam med 'jig
250a3(rgyud): rten pan byed de la ni// rnam rtog rnam par spangs te spyad par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/ thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor tshogs pa la
250a4(rgyud): gzigs te/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis na sems can rnams mthong ba'i chos kho na la dga' ba dang / mag pa thob nas bde ba la reg par
250a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi mthu rlabs gyur pa dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshig rnams ston cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la
250a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal nas/ chos kyi rjes bka' ji skad stsal pa bzhin 'tshal li// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid la gsol ba btab pa/ bdag cag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du dngos grub sgrub pa'i tshig
250a7(rgyud): rnams bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bstan tu gsol/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang bdag cag rang gis rtogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bshad pa de ni rab tu dga' lags so// de lta
250a8(rgyud): lags pas ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i slad du// bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
250b1(rgyud): mdzad kyis rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la phan yon che ba'i chos gcig yod pa ni 'di lta
250b2(rgyud): ste ngo tsha shes pa'o// ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ni mthong ba'i chos pa'i chos nyid la chos gnyis rab tu myur bar 'byung ste// gnyis gang zhe na mi bya ba'i las mi byed pa dang / dam pa rnams
250b3(rgyud): kyis sngags pa'o// yang gnyis de khong du ma chud pa khong du chud pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig 'grogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'o// yang gnyis te tshul khrims la rab tu
