273a5(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes su grags// u gyen du 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni// pa de mu bzang po snga ma bzhini// hUM mtha' yas pa yi dbyangs sgra'i// dung yin par ni ngas
273a6(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la smin mtshams su gzhag pa ni/ mdzod bu'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o// spyan gyi ni gtsug gtor snga ma bzhin te bye brag
273a7(rgyud): du rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// lag pa g.yas pa pad+ma ma 'dzin pa'i thabs su snying khar bzhag la/ lag po g.yon pa la mo bsnun pa'i tshul du brkyang ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyog
273a8(rgyud): rgyo'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba las dgug pa ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma zhes bya ba'i kha'i phyag rgya'o// log pa g.yas pa 'gram par brta
273b1(rgyud): ni dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo dang gung mo gnyis bcus pa lta bur gzung ngo // kun tu me tog gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo nang du gzhug go// 'od kyi
273b2(rgyud): phreng ba can gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis me tog 'dzin pa lta bur bya'o// yid 'gyogs kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i srin lag gi steng du mthe
273b3(rgyud): bo bzhag la 'dzub mo dang gung mo dang mthe'u chung gsum brkyang ste rna ba'i steng du gzhag go// lag pa g.yon pa yang de bzhin du bya// sgra rnam pa sgrogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gcig tu sba
273b4(rgyud): la mthe bo gnyis rtse smad de zlum por ba// sor mo lhag mo rnams kyi rtse mo dgug/ sa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la mthe bo nang
273b5(rgyud): du gzhag pa ni me gnyer ba'i phag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bur byas mthe bo mthe'u chung gi tshigs gnyis par gzhag go// drang srong rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ste go/ 
273b6(rgyud): rims ni ji ltar rig par bya'o// de bzhin lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar lo 'dzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste lhag ma rnams gcig tu bsdus la bstod de gzung ba ni gshin
273b7(rgyud): rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khwas phub ste dril bu 'dra bar byas pa ni 'chi bdag gi phyag rgya ste dril bu'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon po khu tshur bcangs la 'dzub mo dang gung
273b8(rgyud): mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni dus mtshan mo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gyen du bsgreng ba ni drog mo'i phyag rgya ste shU la'o// phyag rgya de nyid las pad ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas pa ni/ 
274a1(rgyud): tshangs ma'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo dang gung mo rgyab kyi tshigs gsum par spyad pa ni/ gzhon nu ma'i mdung gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo mthu
274a2(rgyud): bo'i rtse mor gzhag go// khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo gyen du bsgreng ngo // phag mo phyag rgya ste tho ba'o// phyag rgya de nyid las lag pa snod lta bur bya'o/ 
274a3(rgyud): tsA mun de'i phyag rgya ste thod pa'o// bden bral gyi phyag rgya ral gri ni sgyu ma bzhin no// khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya 'khor lo yang snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis g.yon phyogs nas
274a4(rgyud): bstod de bskor ba ni dga' bo dang bsnyen dga' bo'i sprin gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las ser mo gsum gyen du bsgreng ba ni bde byed kyi mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid
274a5(rgyud): las sor mo de dag drang por byas pa ni u ma'i pha ti sa'i phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i phyag rgya ni padad+ma ma snga ma bzhin te khyad par du dkar por bya'o// lag pa de gnyis kau ba shi bas te bkan la
274a6(rgyud): 'dzub mo drang srin lag gnyis ngos su dgug go// nyi ma'i phyag rgya ste shing rta'o// lag pa de gnyis ka gcig tu thal mo sbyar la gang mo dang srin lag gnyis gzhu 'dra bar bya'o// rgyal ba
274a7(rgyud): dang rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// ba dan gyi phyag rgya ni snga ma bzhin te rlung gi'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon po lte ba'i phyogs su bkan la sor mo gnyis bsgreng ste gzung ngo // lag pa
274a8(rgyud): glasas pa de la phyogs par byas te pi wang len pa lta buR+Sha byas nas dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste pi wang ngo // chu lha'i phyag rgya ni zhags pa ste snga ma bzhin no// dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya de nyid
274b1(rgyud): las 'dzub mo dgug go// lha ma yin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM ga ra la ya~M swA hA// phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag brkyang ngo // dri za'i phyag rgya ste gsang sngags
274b2(rgyud): li/ bi shud d+ha sarba he ne swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo dgug go// gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags laM/ yakle shwa ra swA hA// phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis
274b3(rgyud): rtse mo sbyar ro/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ yak+Sha bad+yA d+ha rI swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ngo // sha za rnams kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ pi shA tsi ga ti swA hA/ 
274b4(rgyud): gung mo de las bgug lo gzung ngo // sha za mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig la sbyar la mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ste gzung ngo // gza'
274b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM/ gra he sha rA ya pra pa ta dze tai ra ma ya swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang mthe bo gnyis bzlog ste sbyar ro// rgyu skar thams
274b6(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM nok+Sha tre ni ra nA da ni ye swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug ste lag 'thil du gzhag go// gsang sngags la/ ne maHsa man
274b7(rgyud): ta bud d+hA nAM rAk+Sha sA d+hi pe ta ye swA hA/ srin po rnams kyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags so// lag pa g.yas pa khar gzhag ste lce la reg par bya'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la
274b8(rgyud): na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM hrIHswA hA// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bu la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan
275a1(rgyud): mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rab 'byam rnams te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang ji tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag kun phyag rgya rgyas par rig par bya'o// ji tsam du lte ba
275a2(rgyud): pa de dag kun kyang gsang sngags bstan par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
275a3(rgyud): rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gzhan du byas na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
275a4(rgyud): byang chub kyang bslus par 'gyur to dam chog las 'das pas nges par ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul
275a5(rgyud): po byin gyis rlob pa las phyag rgya rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams
275a6(rgyud): cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs nyon cig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bya ba la gnas te dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par ba'o// na ma
275a7(rgyud): sa mnau ta br-id d+hA nAM ai/ na \u0f7fsa mna? tA bud d+hA nAM sa/ na mAHsa mAmun ta budz+nyAn+taM br-i/ kau khA ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dzI Tu ThA D+heMD+ha/ trA tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+h+ra ma/ ya ra la bai/ sha Sho sahA/ nga nya Na
275a8(rgyud): no na maHsa man ti bud dA nAM a/ na maHsa man te bud d+ha nAM sa/ na maHsa min ta badz+ra NAM bA/ kA khA gA g+ha/ 
275b1(rgyud): dAnyaN+Da nAHna maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM aM/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM saM/ na maHsa man ta badz+rA NAM bAM/ kaM khaM gaM g+haM/ tsau tshaM dzaM dz+nyAM/ TaM thaM DaM D+haM/ taM thAM daM d+haM/ paM paM baM b+haM maM/ yaM raM l-i waM/ shaM ShaM saM haM/ dzaM
275b2(rgyud): NaM naM/ ne maHsa man ta bud dA nAM a/ na maHsa man ta bud dA nI se/ na maHsa man ta badz+ra NAM ba/ kaHkhaHgaHg+haH/ tsaHtshaHdzaHdzAH/ Ta ThaHDa D+haH/ taHthaHdaHd+yAH/ paHphaHbaHb+ha mAH/ yaHraHlaHwaH/ sha
275b3(rgyud): ShaHsaHhaHpaHnyaHNanAH/ e IHiHIHu UHeHaM/ oHauH// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na 'di ni yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul
275b4(rgyud): la rnam par gnas pa'i cho ga lha yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul
275b5(rgyud): la mkhas pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'i rol mo ste 'das pa dang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsong ba
275b6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ mi 'chad pa ma mthong ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po
275b7(rgyud): de lta bas nA/ byang chub sems dpa' gsong sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gsang sngags kyi cho ga shes par 'dod na thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam
275b8(rgyud): grangs la mngon par brtson par bya'o// ka dang tse dang Ta dang ta dong pa rnams thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs la 'jug pas byang chub dang spyod pa dang yang dag
276a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas par thob par byed do// de bas na gsang sngags kyi chog la dang po la sogs pa'i tha snyad dang ldan par gyur pa
276a2(rgyud): de dag nyid thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus dang lhan cig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig re re la ji ltar 'dod par nges par spyor par bya'o// blo yis rnam par rtogs na
276a3(rgyud): ni/ de dag bla med gnas mchog ste// de ltar 'di ni 'khor lo gcig ste 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khor ba ni yi ge'i 'khor lo'o// sngags pas yi ge'i 'khor lo de shes na rtag tu
276a4(rgyud): ra btsamya ldan 'das rnam paR+Sha sAng mdzang+ga 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du rnam par mAdzes par 'gyur ro// thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi yi ge'i tshul rim par phye ba'o// 
276a5(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis sems can gyi khams la gzigs nas chos kyi dbyings mi bzad pa bkod pa bstan pa gsang sngags kyi spyad pa
276a6(rgyud): mngon par bslab pa 'di nyid gyis sems can gyi khams ma ltos pa gdon par thugs dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi mthu rlabs de bzhin
276a7(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zlabacom ldan 'dis snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe sems
276a8(rgyud): na gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo ba spyi'i bug thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za blo dang zar 'jug pa'i gzug
276b1(rgyud): dang kha dog dbyibs dang / nga ro dang 'gro ba dang spyod pa dang nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i sku
276b2(rgyud): rnams byung bar gyur to// byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bum rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab par rig par byed po de bzhin
276b3(rgyud): gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su gcad pa 'di sgrogs par gyur to// chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las ni// chos rnams dag ni thams cad dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos
276b4(rgyud): dang rang rgyal slob pa rnams dang nya ni// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang // de bzhin rgyal ba mchog rnams dang // sems can snod kyi 'jig rten dag/ btags pa rim pa bzhin
276b5(rgyud): 'byung zhing chos rnams ste dang gnas pa dang // gang las rtag tu 'byung 'gyur ba// shes rab thabs dang ldan gyur cing // yid gnyis so so dang bral ba// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rab bshad
276b6(rgyud): lam 'di khyed kyis bsgom par bgyi// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos ki dbings las byung ba de dag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi skra rnam par rig par bed pa/ stsal
276b7(rgyud): pa'i sbyin gyis yongs su bkang nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sra nga tsam gyis pa spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa byin gyis brlabs
276b8(rgyud): te/ rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag ni rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
277a1(rgyud): / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bkod pa lha rnams kyi gnas yang dag par gnas par bsam pa sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa yod kyis de nyon la legs par
277a2(rgyud): rab tu yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan te// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di
277a3(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal to// dang por spags pas dkyil 'khor de// rang gi lus la dgod bya ste// rkang pa nas ni chu so la// thag gi bar nga sa'i bsam// de nas gong du snying kha'i bar// sdom
277a4(rgyud): brtson can gyi chu'i bsam// chu'i yan chad me'i ste// me'i yan chad rlung yin no// bsams nas de nas mkhas pa yis// sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje
277a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sa la bzhugs nas chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas te ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtogs nas rigaso sngags
277a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po the tsom thams cad gcod par byed pa 'di smras so// na maHsa mna? ta pud d+hA nAM/ A sa ma bAp+ta d+harma d+hA dA kAR+ya gI tA ga tA nAM/ sarba thAM aM khaM aM aMHsaM saM haM ha raM rAHpaM ba swAhA/ 
277a7(rgyud): hU~M ha~M swA hA/ raM rA swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal po chen po 'di smras ma thag tu dr-i nA~Ms phyogs b+hits+tsha'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de bzhin gshes
277a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag nas legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam
277b1(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi sa la zhugs nas thams cad du gsang sngags kyi tshul la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang bar 'dod pa'i phyir gas
277b2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po 'di smras pa legs so legs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
277b3(rgyud): snying po la bzhugs te tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par dpyad cing bdud bzhi pham par byas nas chos kyi dbyings las byung ba 'di dag gnas gsum nas byung ste
277b4(rgyud): bdad sdig can rnams btul bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'dis kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes nas nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir skra tshad med pa brnyes par gyur/ de
277b5(rgyud): bzhin du gsung dang thugs tshad med pa yang brnyes par gyur to// de ltar ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad la dbang thob pas 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi rgyal po tshig
277b6(rgyud): bcu gnyis po 'di dag nyid las brtsams te chos 'chad do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pas
277b7(rgyud): na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du snang ngo // thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// sngags spyad tshig mchog zhus shig dang // cho ga rgyas pa
277b8(rgyud): bka' stsal to// nged kyang sngon ni 'di rnams kyis// bla med byang chub rtogs nas su// mya ngan 'das la ma 'gro ba yi// mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad pa// 'jig rten khams na bzhugs
278a1(rgyud): @pa'i/ rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dbang du gyur// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// bsam pa mchog rab mgu gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs pas/ 'di skad
278a2(rgyud): ces ni tshig tu smras// chos 'di rnams ni mtshan nyid med// ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa// las dang tshe las rnam par grol// rdzogase ba'i skyongs rgyas 'dra bar 'dod// thugs rjes
278a3(rgyud): mnga' ni mdzad ma'i// mgon po rnams kyi thabs kyis ni// rnam par bskal nas chos rnams kyi// mtshan nyid 'di dag rtogs par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phag na rdo rjes ched
278a4(rgyud): du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de smras nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la lhas te snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dri the tshom bcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
278a5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad la zhus pa// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// kun mkhyen spyan dang bral ba po// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// 'dren pa khyod la zhu ba ni// dkyil 'khor
278a6(rgyud): ni sngon rol du// ci zhig bgyi ba 'dren pas gsungs// thub pa chen po slob dpon dang // slob ma'ang rnam pa du ru bshad// sa gzhi ci 'drar btsal bar bgyi// de yang ji ltar[ऽऽ]
278a7(rgyud): ltar de ni bstan pa logs// slob ma'i dgos pa gang gis bgyi// sbyang ba 'ang 'dren pos bkro' stsol cig/ dge po'i mtshan ma ci 'dra dang // gang gis de dag bsrung
278a8(rgyud): bar bgyi/ sa ni gang gis byin gyis brlabs// der ni dang po gang gis brtag/ sa'i cha las thig gdab pa'i// srad bu rnam pa ngur 'tshal bar bgyi// mchod pa rnam pa dur 'am
278b1(rgyud): bgyis me tog gdug spos ci 'dra dang // me tog dang ni gdug spos dag/ ji ltar dbul ba 'dren pas gsungs// / lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang // gdan gyi tshad kyang bshad du gsol// phyag
278b2(rgyud): rgya rnams ni gang nas bya// ci phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang bgyi// dbang bskur rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi// dam tshig rnam pa du zhig mchis// sngags spyad pa la brtson pa yi// spags pa byang chub sems
278b3(rgyud): dpa' dang / thams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar bden pa mthong bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi// grub pa'i dus kyang bka' stsol cig/ grub nas nam mkha' 'gro
278b4(rgyud): ba dang // ji ltar mi snang 'gyur pa gtso// / lha bshos sbyin sreg las rnams kyang // gang dag la ni ji ltar bgyi// lha rnams kyi ni gdan dag kyang // gang la gang gis bgyi ba gsungs// kha dog
278b5(rgyud): dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang // go rims bzhin du mgon pos gsungs// lus po 'di ni ma bor bar// ji ltar lha'i lus thob 'gyur// sprul pa rnams ni sna tshogs pa// de la gang nas
278b6(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur// nyi zla me dang phyogs rnams dang // rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma dang // yud tsam na ni thang gcig dang // rga dang 'chi dang rgud po dang / ltas ngan dag ni thams cad dang / de la
278b7(rgyud): ji ltar 'byung mi 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dang // sngags pa ji ltar 'bral mi 'gyur// sbyin bsreg las dang me tog dang // tshim par bgyi ba dur 'tshul bgyi// lha rnams
278b8(rgyud): kyang ni so so'ingo bo nyid ni 'dren pas gsungs// 'jig rten pa'i sngags rnams dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi// tshad dang 'bras bu gangs rnams dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par
279a1(rgyud): dang sa las kyi rnam pa gang du smin// ji ltar rnam par smin mi 'gyur// sngags pa rnams ni nam zhig la// las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur// de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs
279a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan bsnun dang bral ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam bkod pa// lha rnams kyi ni gnas
279a3(rgyud): nges pa/ theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gsang ba// dpa' bo cher 'byung khyod kyis gang // yongs su dris pa de legs so// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la/ 
279a4(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du// bya ba rnams ni nges par nyon// so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis// tshul shes pa ni ci rigs par// rang gi
279a5(rgyud): ting 'dzin la gnas par// rigs sngags rgyal po stobs po che// yan lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba// go rims bzhin du bzlas brjod bya// gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pI
279a6(rgyud): slob dpon rnam pa gnyis shes bya// zab dang mi zab bye brag las// de yi mtshan nyid shes par bya// zab mo rgya cher shes par bya// lus can rnams ni yid mi rton// sangs rgyas rnams
279a7(rgyud): kyi sras mchog ste// mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs// gnyis pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis// myos par gyur ba dmigs pa can// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog rnams kyis
279a8(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// de yis bri bar bya ba'i phyir// rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur// dus dang dus min bye brag las// slob mo rnam bzhir shes bya ste// gcig
279b1(rgyud): ni de'i mod la bsgrub// gnyis su bsgrub dang gnyi kar min// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'i// slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog/ sa ni dang por shes bya ba// sems kyis sar ni bshad
279b2(rgyud): pa yin/ spang ba'i sngar no bstan pa ste// de yis de ni yongs su spang // nam zhig nyes dang bral ba na// sems kyis ni mi 'jigs pa// de tshe de ni dag pa ste// nyes pa thams cad rnam
279b3(rgyud): par spangs// mngon par byang chub mthong bas na// de ltar de ni brten shes bya// de las gzhan du sa skyong ba// de ni dag par mi 'gyur ro// sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su// gang zhig las
279b4(rgyud): sbyong byed pa ni/ byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po de mi 'dag/ de bas rtog pa rnam spangs nas// sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya// nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni
279b5(rgyud): cho ga rgyas par gong bstan pa// de dag thog mar bstan no// slongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te// rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba// ji srid ma spangs par du ni// 'jig rten 'di na sangs
279b6(rgyud): rgyas minaHkun mkhyen zhes kyang mi bya'o// slob ma rnams la nan tan du// byang chub sems kyis sbyang bar bya// bsrung ba mi g.yo mgon po'am// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas pa// 
279b7(rgyud): slob ma nam zhig dmigs pa yis// nam yang g.yos par mi 'gyur ba// de tshe dri med nam mkha' bzhin// yang dag par ni dag par 'gyur// sa byin brlabs pa dang po ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas
279b8(rgyud): kyis bya bar bshad// gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te// 'dir ni gzhan du mi bya'o// srad bu rnam pa bzhir bshad de// dkar po ser po dmar po dang / nag po zhes ni bya bar brjod// 
280a1(rgyud): lnga pa nam mkha' lta bur bshad// bar snang la ni bzung nas su// der ni dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// srang bu dag ni gnyis pa yis// sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par
280a2(rgyud): byaHsangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // de sras blo can rnams kyi gdan// pad ma yid las pad ma'i mchog/ bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyis bsgrags// rang rgyal dang ni dag
280a3(rgyud): bcom pa/ phyogs cig shes par gang grags pa// de dag stan du shes bya ba// pad ma las byung 'dab ma'o// 'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang // tshangs la sogs pa 'jig rten grag sa/ 
280a4(rgyud): de dag stan ni pad ma dmar// rgyal po rnams kyis bsngags pa'o// phal pa rnams kyi ci rigs par// sa'i bye brag dag las bsam// mchod pa rnam bzhir shes bya ste// phyag 'tshal
280a5(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba dang // de bzhin byams dang snying rje dang // me tog gdug spos 'jig rten pa'i// sor mo las byung me tog rnams// skyob pa kun la dbul bar bya// yan lag kun 'byung
280a6(rgyud): phyag rgya ni/ bcings nas byang chub sems bsgoms te// so sor miglon+da po thams cad dang // de sras rnams la nan tAn bya'o// 'di ni skyon med me tog ste// rab tu bsrung zhing rnam
280a7(rgyud): bor mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyi ljon zhing rnams// rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir byung po// ting 'dzin dbang gis bsgyur ba yi// sngags kyis de dag byin brlabs ni// chos kyi dbyings las
280a8(rgyud): byung ba yi// sprin mang rgya che dam pa rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// de tshe rtag tu char bzhin 'bab// lha rnams phal pa gzhan la ni// me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste/ 
280b1(rgyud): rang gi sngags rgyud rgyas shes pas// ji ltar rigs par dbul bar bya// de bzhin me tog byug spos rnams// ji ltar rigs par rnam par bsam// mthe bo srin lag sbyar ba ni// bkra
280b2(rgyud): shis pa zhes bshad pa ste// de yis me tog de blangs nas// rang gi sI kha'i phyogs nas dbul// 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la// lte ba'i thad ka nas shes bya// gdug spos rdo rje khu tshur
280b3(rgyud): 'am/ yang na pad ma'i phreng ba yis// bar snang la ni bzung nas su// 'jig rten mgon skyo ba rnams la dbul// de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'i// lha rnams la ni go rims bzhin// 
280b4(rgyud): phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis// sbyin bsreg rnam pa gnyis shes bya// las dang tshwa las rnamo par grol// slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste// las 'dod pa yis sbyin bsreg bya// nang gi sbyin
280b5(rgyud): bsreg ces su bshad// pi rol gyi ni gsum ldan zhing // gnas gsum dang ni grasum la gnas// las gsum gyi ni lam grub pa// 'jig rten pa'i sman srog mchog/ sprin sreg
280b6(rgyud): ni ma shes pas// gang dag gzhan du bye pa ni// sngags kyi shes pa spangs pa ste// glen des 'bras bu mi thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs sngags dang // de bzhin rdzogs sang
280b7(rgyud): rgyas kyis gsungs/ dkar dang ser du shes par bya// phyag na rdo rje'i thams cad pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags ni// las kyi bye brag dag las dkar// kun du gru bzhi lham pa dang / 
280b8(rgyud): gi rims bzhin du zlum po dang // gru gsum dang ni zlo gam 'dra// dbyings ni legs par bshad pa yin// gzugs ni gnyis su shes bya ba// bud med dang ni skyes pa nyid// yang na kun tu thams
281a1(rgyud): cad kyi kha dog dbyibs rang gzugs rnams te// bsam yas ye shes las byung bas// de bas de rnams bsam yas to// yi shos mkhyen kyi ye gas ni// sems can don
281a2(rgyud): phyir tha dad gyurayid kyi rgya ni ji tsam pa// stan dang phyag rgya dag la ni// lha'i tshad kyang go rims bzhin// de tsam du ni shes par bya// sangs rgyas gang nas byung ba nas// phyag rgya rnam
281a3(rgyud): kyang de nas byangaHchos las byung ba'i slob ma rnams// chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya// de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings// mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par bshad// dbang bskur gsum du/ 
281a4(rgyud): shes pa ste de bas nan tra na mnyan par gyis// phyag rgyas gang zhig dbang bskur ba// las dang ba baM spangs pa ste// slob pa rnams kyi dbang bskur bya// de ni mchog ste dang po yin// 
281a5(rgyud): gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis// kun nas bslang bar yang dag bshad// gsum pa yid kyir shes pa ste// yul dang dus ni spangs pa'o// bla me legs par mgu byas nas// phan par
281a6(rgyud): pa gang smras pa'i/ dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na ni// dam chog can rnams lngar
281a7(rgyud): bo shad deHdkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las// dam tshig shes pa gcig ces pa// de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing // sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyi bye brag las// 
281a8(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su gzung // dkyil 'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di// dam tshig can gnyis par shes bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong // las dang bye bo la yang sbyar
281b1(rgyud): bla mas lung ni ma byin pa// de yang dam tshig shes par bshad// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams// de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan// gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba'i// dbang bskur med
281b2(rgyud): pa'i sngags pa'ang yin// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba// dam tshig shes pa lngar shes bya// dam tshig can zhes gzhan mi bya// brtul zhugs
281b3(rgyud): bzang po byang chub phyir// gang zhig sems ni bsgom pa ni// sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed nas su// sems
281b4(rgyud): don la sbyor ba na// dmigs su med pa'i spyod thob pa// rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya// thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos// ngo bo nyid ni med pa la// gang gi sems ni ri rab bzhin// gnas pa de ni
281b5(rgyud): bden pa mthong // 'di bden 'di ni yang dag pa// de bzhin du ni mi slu ba// ji ltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa// de bzhin sngon ni ngas mthong ba'i// byang chub sems thob gang yin de// dngos
281b6(rgyud): grub do las gzhan ci dgos// de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni// rnam pa dag ni sngar 'dod de// spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang // de bzhin sa ni gnon pa dang // 'jig rten mngon shes
281b7(rgyud): sngar 'dod dang // sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no// rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa'i// las ni ji srid ma nyams shing // rnam smin rnam par smin pa de// dngos grub dag gis dus su 'dod// mdo
281b8(rgyud): ni gang ni dus gcig tu// las dang skye ba 'phangs gyur pa// de ma'ang sdigs pas dngos grub ni// yid las yang dag byang ba 'thob// bam po drug pa// grung nas ma'i 'al 'gro ba ni/ 
282a1(rgyud): ji ltar sgyu ma 'jigs med bzhin// sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa// ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin// gang la lus dang ngag med pa// dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin te// de
282a2(rgyud): bzhin mi slang 'gyur shes pa// de ni de na gnas pa yin// ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na// sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas su phyin// lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la// de nyid kyis kyang de ma song // de
282a3(rgyud): bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis kyang // sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dag/ bsod nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis// mdza' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang 'thob// lus dang ngag yid las byung
282a4(rgyud): ba'i gsang stsogs yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// de las rnam par bsam pa'i don// ma brtags pa yang byung bar 'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams su// 'dus byas smod
282a5(rgyud): yul thams cad kyis// mi gos de bzhin spags pa yang // rtog pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so// 'di kun 'a shes tsam ni// nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing // rdum par bsgoms
282a6(rgyud): nas sngags pa do// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang ldan cig dga'// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo yis// sbyin bsreg gnyis su bshad pa ni// phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste// de yang tshim
282a7(rgyud): byed pa bcas// lha rnams kyang ni so so yi/ rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su// 'jig rten po'i sngags rnams te// tshad dag legs par gsungs pa ni// dbang phyug laso/ 
282a8(rgyud): mthu tshon rnams// kun gyi lha rnams gang yin pa// de dag gis ni gang bas pa// sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams// 'bras bu phal cher 'phral du ster// tshad ni bshad pa de yin
282b1(rgyud): no// 'on kyang skye dang 'jig pa yi// chos can de dag bstan pa med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags rnams ni// thog ma'i byed pa med pa'o// las dang skye ba kun bcad pa'i// nyes pa gsum
282b2(rgyud): bral rgyal ba dang / rang rgyal bse rwa lta bu dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // gsang sngags ched ni skyon bshad du// dus gsum las ni shin
282b3(rgyud): du 'das// rten cing 'brel pa las byang ba// mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu can// ngag yid lus las byung ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu'i tshad// bskal pa gcig tu bshad pa
282b4(rgyud): yin/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// gsang sngags 'bras bu bskal pa 'das// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang // rgyal sras rnams kyi ting 'dzin ni// mtshan me med cing
282b5(rgyud): dag pa'o// 'jig rten pa'i mtshan mar bcas// rnam par smin pa 'di nyid ni// las kyi 'bras bu smin 'gyur ba// nam zhig dngos grub thob pa na// de tshe las kyang ldog par 'gyur/ 
282b6(rgyud): sems ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam spangs shing // las dang tshe las rnam grol na// nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ba yin// gsang sngags pa pa'i bdag po gzhan yang
282b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod po rim par phye ba lha rnams gnas par byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin lnga rtogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sem
282b8(rgyud): da pa'i spyad pa spyod pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa spyod yul du gyur pa// sems can gyi khams ma lus par bsgral bar yid dam bcas pa rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sngon
283a1(rgyud): gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de yid la zung shig dang // ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo// zhes gsol nas/

283a3(rgyud): 'khor dgod pa rim par phye ba gang las 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor grangs med pa 'byung ba// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba snying rje chen po'i snying po

283a8(rgyud): nan zhan yon na du N+Da ga na/  / khyo pa / lta bu'i dbus na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum po// pad ma dkar po'i steng na gnas// klar kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab// rdo rje'i mtsha/ 
283b1(rgyud): mas mtshan pa ste/ dpyad mi dgos par kun nas ni// 'od zer dag ni gnyis bya ba// gsang sngags mgon las byung nas su// de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song // gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan
283b2(rgyud): yang / spyan ras gzigs dbang dkyil 'khor ni// de bas nan tan bskyed par gyis// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su dung 'dra gzhag par bya// de'i steng du pad ma ni// sa bon bcas byas

283b4(rgyud): can dang ni/ rigs sngags long spyod can ma dang // mthu chen thob pa'ang nan tan bya// dpal rnams kun dang phyag brnyan ma// dkyil 'khor 'di'i dbus su ni// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma dbang thob rnam
283b5(rgyud): khyad par dA ni bri bar bya// rta mgrin can gyi bya ba ni// gru gsum tshul du 'dug pa ste// dkyil 'khor mtshan mo bzang pos btab// nyi ma 'char ba'i kha dog 'dra// rigs sngags rgyal dang bcas
283b6(rgyud): par ni/ mkhas pas rnam par dgod par ba// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhon yang khyod nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bshad par bya'o// kun du gru bzhi lham pa la// rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis
283b7(rgyud): mtshan// thams cad ser po yid du 'ong // do bus na pad ma rab tu gnas// de'i dbus su bya ba ni// bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// 'di ni mtshan mo rnams kyis mtshan// klad kor gyis kyang rnam par
283b8(rgyud): brgyan/ de'i steng du'ang rlung chen ni// dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/ ba dan g.yo bor sngags pas bya// klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan// de'i steng du'ang gru gsum pa// rab tu 'jigs pa
284a1(rgyud): gzugs can te// 'jig par byed pa'i me 'dra ba// sum mdo yi ris mtshan gyis bdab// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa 'jigs 'jigs lta// nyi ma 'char ba'i gzugs 'dra ba'o//

284a3(rgyud): khyod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal ba'i gtso bo rnams kyis gsungs// mA ma kI dang la lu gu rgyud// de bzhin rdo rje rigs las byung // rdo rje lpags kyu rdo rje rtse// rigs sngags rgyal so mthu chen dag
284a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni// kun kyang khongs su chud par ba// las rnams shin du 'grab ba'i yir// phag rga kyil 'khor sa bon dang // kha dog khyad par go rims bzhin// 
284a5(rgyud): de dag ji ltar rigs par bya// de nas gzhan yang rdo rje'i 'dzin// chen po gtsor bshad 'di rnams te// nam mkha' di med rdo rje 'khor// rdo rje mche ba des pa dang // rnam par grags pa
284a6(rgyud): bskal chen dang rdo rje mgon po mchog 'dzin dang // rdo rje zhi ba rdo rje tshe// rdo rje 'thing ka de bzhin gan na// rdo rje pad ma yangs pa'i mig/ rdo rje bzang po rdo rje nyid// spros pa med par gnas pa dang //
