312b2(rgyud): bdag spos sngags la mkhas pas dbul// mar me snod ni gser gyi bzang // yang na kham pa'i ser po'ang rung // mkhas pas ror-iso ni ser po yis// mer mar snying po ser po dbul// spos kyi 'bra mar bzang po yis
312b3(rgyud): de yi snum ni dri zhim bya// yang na til gyi 'bru mar gyis// mar me gtsang ma dbul bar bya// 'bras chan ser po sran tshed tsam// mar dang bcas pa shin du bzang // tshod ma rnams kyang ser por bya// shing thog bag chos de
312b4(rgyud): bzhin no// spos tshwa me tog ser po dang // de bzhin 'bras dang dudUr ba'i rtswa// snod kyang ser por blugs pa dag/ rgyas pa la ni mchod yon shis// de ltar mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te// de nas rdo rje mchog sbyin
312b5(rgyud): du bdag byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol du byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas nye reg byas te nang du zhugs la sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ste/ me'i thab khung gi drung bsreg par bya ba la sogs pa sdug
312b6(rgyud): kyis gsangs pa rnams snga ma bzhin du gzhag lo/ sa la rtswa ku sha bting ba'i steng du pad mo'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur bsams te/ byug spos ser pos
312b7(rgyud): zhugs thob bskus te/ me tog ser po'i sil ma yang bkram la rtswa ku sha bting ste rgyal rigs kyi khyim mam/ rgyal po'i pheM brahA me blangs la gsang gtor bya ste shing bla ga sha dang / u dum bI ras me sba la de/ 
312b8(rgyud): nas me'i kha ba khung gi zhabs su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsams te/ der yang yi ge ya klang skor dang bcas par pad ma la gnas pa bsam mo// yoM yi ge ya las thab khung gi dang nas me byung bar bsam
313a1(rgyud): / thogs// byang chub sems kyi bye brag shes// zas su sran chung ji tse za// yang na zas su shing thog za// dga' zhing 'dzum tshul mi smra thub// sems dang sems ni rjes su sbyor// rtag tu bzlas dang
313a2(rgyud): sprin bsreg byed// lha yi gzugs ni sems dpa' yi// mi yi dbang du bya ba yis// dngos grub ma lus brtsam par bya// gang zhig cho ga 'di yis su// tshig shes pas las brtsams na// gzi brjid can nam de yi
313a3(rgyud): bro/ zla ba gcig gis dbang du 'gyur// sprin bsreg zla ba gnyis byas nas// lag brnyad pho mos gnod sbyin ma// de bzhin sa 'og bu mo dag/ sngags pas myur du khugs par 'gyur// 'di ni re shig mdor bsdus
313a4(rgyud): te/ dbang gi sbyin bsreg bsgrags pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par byang chub pa rnam par stsol pa'i byin gyis brlabs las dbang du bya ba'i sprin bsreg rim par phye ba'o// // da ni drag shul
313a5(rgyud): spyad pa yi// cho ga ma lus bshad par bya// gnod sbyin lto 'phye yi dgas gtum// lha mini dri za mi 'am ci// sems can rnams la gnod byed dang // de bzhin bogegs dang log 'dren dang // 'byung po ma mo srin po
313a6(rgyud): dong / mkha' 'gro dang ni lus sbrul dang // mi yang tshogs dregs mthu ldan zhing // drag po'i las byed sdung ba 'ang rung // de dag gdul phyiraro sngags shes pas// drag shul las ni brtsam par bya// nyes pa chung ngu dag
313a7(rgyud): la ni/ drag po'i cho ga mi brtsam mo// grong gi lho yi phyogs su ni// btul bas sa gzhi nag po la// dur khrod dben pa'am dgon pa'im// bskyed mos tshal rnying zhi gnas su// yar gyi ngo yi tshes brgyad dam// yang na
313a8(rgyud): ni bcu bzhi la// gza' ni spen pa mig mar dang // rgyu skar rlung las byung ba dang // me bzhi dang ni nag pa dang // tha skar dang ni de bzhin dpo// rnam so dang ni saM ri dang // rgyu skar de dag drag po ste// de dag gang yang ru
313b1(rgyud): ba la/ sngags pa 'khros pa gshin rje gzhin// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri ba ni// dgra yi srog ni gcod byed pa'i// sngags pa bdag nyid rang gis rgyas// rdo rje sems dpar byin brlabs te// sngags la 'jig
313b2(rgyud): pa med pa yis// sa gzhis ma bzhin du srung // de nas mi g.yo mtha chen gyis// yongs su bzang la sogs pas nas// rang gi yi ge phag rgya yis// de nas rnam snang mdzad du bya// bu mo gzhon nas bkal
313b3(rgyud): yis// srad bu sngon po der blangs nas// dkrol 'khor nan tan thig gdab pa// gru gsum phyi rol bzlum por bya// khru bzhi khru lnga khru brgyud dam// de bzhin bcu gnyis bcu drug khru// ji ltar las kyi rjes 'thun
313b4(rgyud): par/ mkhas pas tshad ni brtag par bya// de nas dur khrod thal ba'am// mkhas pas tshon ni nag po la// yi ge hi ni der bzhag la// me lci 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro// dus mtha'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs
313b5(rgyud): dbyar gyi char srin 'dra ba'i mdog/ kha ni mche ba gtsigs pa la// lag na rdo rje cod pan can// bdud kyi ste ni thams cad dang // sdang ba thams cad sdigs byed pa// tshon la mkhas pas tshon de la// de 'dra'i yi ge/ 
313b6(rgyud): gzhag nas ni// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// ba dan mang po'i mtshan mas mtshan// rta babs dang ni sgo khyud bcas// sgo yi cha ni legs par phye// lha yi gtso bo bzhag pa ni// snga ma bzhin du brtag par
313b7(rgyud): bya/ byang phyogs sgo ni phye nas su// lhag ma'i sgo rnams gcad par bya// de la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshod gsal shing gi phyag rgyar bri'o// mdzod bu'i gnas rnams
313b8(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje dang dgra sta'i phyag rgya bri// mthu chen thob dang 'phags me khro gnyer can dang / 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gnas rnams su don yod zhags pa dang / 
314a1(rgyud): ral pa gcig ma dang / rta mgrin rnams zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya rnams go rims bzhin du bzhag par bya'o// gnod mdzes kyi gnas su khro zla gtso bo rdo rje'i phyag
314a2(rgyud): rgyar bzhag go/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yang be con gyi phyag rgyar bzhag go// sgo drung du ni gdul dka' ba dang mngon du phyogs pa gnyis be con gyi phyag rgyar bzhag go// gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gnas
314a3(rgyud): su gshin rje'i 'chi bdag dang / dus mtshan mo dang / lhun gcig tu bzhag gro/ bden bral du yang ral gri'i phyag rgyar po zhag go/ 'khor sa'i dbusau su me'i thab khung sgo la phogs par bya'o// dkyil
314a4(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyi rol kho ra khor yug tu ba dan rnams bri'o// me'i thob khung ni dbang gi las kyis me'i thab khung bzhin du byas te/ bye brag tu ni phyi rol gyi mu ran zlum por byos la ba don mang pos mtshan
314a5(rgyud): par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du so so'i gzugs bsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas de nas bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs
314a6(rgyud): la pha rol du phyogs kyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin du sbyin no// de la byug spos la sogs pa'i khyad par ni tsan dan dmar po dang / du ru ka dang / sol ba dang bsregs pa'i byugs spos nag por dbul
314a7(rgyud): lo/ me tog ud dpal mthing kha dang / u pA dzi tsi ta mthing kha'am/ gzhan yang me tog sngon po rnams dbul lo// bdug spos nI pra rtsi dpog pu rum dang sbyar ba dbul lo// mar me ni yungs dkar
314a8(rgyud): ba snying po sngon po can mar me'i snod nag po'i nang du dbul lo// bshos ni gr-i sa ra dang / gzhan yang tsha ba dang / kha ba la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang / tshod ma kha dog nag po rnams dbul lo// sran chan
314b1(rgyud): dang kri sa ra dang / sha dang / nya btses pa dang / rjen pa rnams phyogs kyi gtor mar sbyin no// gtor ma'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas gdol pa'i khyim 'am/ dur khrod nas me blangs te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos
314b2(rgyud): gsang gtor bas la dur khrod kyi shing dam/ shing la ta ka'am/ ba ru ra'i shing gis me bus la/ rnam par snang mdzad chen por bdag byin gyis brlabs te me'i thab khung gi zhabs su rlung gi dkyil 'kho
314b3(rgyud): bsams la/ der yi ge hUM gzhag go/ yi ge hr-i de las me'i gzugs su gyur par bsams pa ni kha dog nag po shin du mi bzad pa/ mig gsum pa/ gdong bzhi pa/ mi g.yo ba dung kha'o// blta bka'
314b4(rgyud): kham pa thur tshugs dang kha can char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdangs can bsus po che gos sngon po gyon pa/ srad bu sngon po'i se ral khar thogs pa/ kha nas mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa/ khro ba dang bcas shing
314b5(rgyud): kha gdangs pa/ lag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / be con dang / kun de thogs pa/ snying kha nas sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ gdong khro gnyer ster ba/ hU~M dang bcas pa 'bar gnag
314b6(rgyud): cing rtsub pa dang / zangs lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba can 'jigs pa'i dus mngon du 'byung ba bzhin du 'dug pa/ de lta bu'i mi bsams nas gsang gtor bya ste/ byugs spos la sogs pa rang gi rig
314b7(rgyud): sngags kyis dbul lo// oM a~Mg+na ye dzA hi trad tra hUM phaT/ de nas yungs mar tsha ba dang / sbyar ba'i kri sa ri'i bsreg blugs gsum byin la dug dang / khrag dang / skye tshe'i bsreg blugs bdun sbyin no// yang
314b8(rgyud): shing ba la ta ka dang / ba ru ra'i shing gis yam shing bsreg shing rtse mo rnon por gzhogs pa yungs mar tsha ba dang / ske tshes byugs pa byin no// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa'i lha rnams
315a1(rgyud): pa ni/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i thar tshags can mig gsum pa/ gdong bzhi pa/ lag na bgrang phreng dang / gun de thogs shing mchog sbyin pa/ gos sen po bgos pa/ srad bu ser po ser ral kha
315a2(rgyud): thogs pa/ sor ris gsum gyis byugs pa/ sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ me lce 'brar ba kun du 'phro ba/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i 'od ze
315a3(rgyud): las byung ba/ de lta bu'i me bsams te/ de nas gsang gtor bya ba dang / kha bkru ba dang / mchod yon dbul ba byas la byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pa rang gi sngags kyis sbyin no// na maHse man ti bud d+hA nA/ ag/ 
315a4(rgyud): na ye swA hA/ de nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi dang mar la sogs par sbyar ba'am/ til nag po mar dang sbyar ba'i bsregs blugs gsum byin te/ de nas shing bil ba'i dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blug
315a5(rgyud): bdan sbyin no// de nas shing blag sha'am/ u dum bA ra'i dbus kyi che las byung ba'i yam bsreg shing sboms su chang pa ge dza la srid du khru gang ba mar la skyugs pa'i sbyin bsreg gsum byin la yang dgang blugs gsum sbyin
315a6(rgyud): de nas snga ma bzhin du lha'i gzugs rnams bsams te/ snying po de dang des bsreg blugs gsum dbul lo// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ci bsams te/ byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la bdag gi lha'i gzug
315a7(rgyud): su bsams te/ snga ma bzhin du bsregs blugs gsum phul nas bdag gi dngos grub sgrub pa las bshad pa'i rdzas las sbyin bsreg bya'o// thog mar oM zhes brjid la 'jug tu grags pa dang / dpal dang / 
315a8(rgyud): longs spyod dang / dge ba dang / nor la swA hA/ zhes bya bar sbyar ro// yang ni bdag gos ji lta ro byasums pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas lo swAH/ zhes bya zhing bsrog blugs dbul lo// de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin bsrog byas
315b1(rgyud): nas byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rim pa de nyid snga ma bzhin du bya'o// 'dir yang bsgrub pa pos cho ga spyad pa ni/ gos ni ser po bgo bar bya// gtsang byed ser po gtsang ma thogs// sems ni brtan zhing mthu yang che// 
315b2(rgyud): shin du mi smra ser sna med// byang chub sems la rtag tu dga'// dus gsum cho ga thog par byed// nas chan bcos pa'i 'o ma btung // rgyas pa'i las ni brtsam par bya// gang gis de ltar rgyas pa yi// las ni legs par
315b3(rgyud): brtsams pa ni// de yis yid la gang bsams pa'i// rgyas pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur// ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ldong ros mig bsku 'gri'u wang dang // yid bzhin nor bu bum pa gos// nor gyi char 'bab lham dag
315b4(rgyud): dang/ gdags dang shing rta zhon pa dang // de bzhin/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang // pad ma bum pa mdung rtse gsum// ba gang phreng bcon gun dI dang // pi wa~M mdung thung mda' yang rung // lhung zod dang na bsag shang dang // yang na d+ha sa
315b5(rgyud): ni gang 'dod pa// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsgrub par bya// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa las rgyas pa'i las kyi sbyin bsreg gi cho ga rim par bya/ 
315b6(rgyud): ba'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyin bsreg 'di// dbang gau las ni rab sgrub pa// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa yi sau// bairtse bar gyur pa'i thugs kyis gsungs// de ni ma lus bshad par byas// 'byor par 'dod pas nga la nyon// / 
315b7(rgyud): thog mar sa gzhi brtag pa ni// grong ngam yang na ljongs dag gi/ me yaM phyogs su gnas bcas te// 'gro ba med pa'i khang stong ngam// shing gcig rlung ngam dur khrod dam// yang na bde byed gnas su 'am// ma mo'i gnas sa
315b8(rgyud): phyugs kyang rung // sngags pas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// mar gyi ngo yi tshes dgu la// dbang gi las ni byartsam par ba// gza' nyi ma'am ni mig dmar la// rgyu skar rgyal dang smin drug dang // mchu dang sa ga dge la ni// 
316a1(rgyud): mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar ba// de la dang por sngags pas bdag phrag na rdo rdor byin gyis brlabs la sa'i kha dog dmar po las spang ba dang / yongs su bzung ba la sogs pas
316a2(rgyud): bas te/ de nas bdag rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs la/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bzlas pa'i srad bu leb rgan du bcos pa blangs te dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa ne gru gsum pa la sgo
316a3(rgyud): shor phyogs su gtod pa/ sgo khyud dang rta babs dang // mr-i ran gyi cha legs par phye ste// de nas mtshon rtsi blang ba ni// dmar po shin du bzang po la// yi ge 'bar ba gzhag pa ni// ra yi yi ge klad dang bcas// nyi ma
316a4(rgyud): 'char ba 'dra ba ste// shin du gdul dka' rgyal ba'i mchog/ de ltar mtshon rtsi ban brlabs la// sangs rgyas thams cad ngan pas ste// dkyil 'khor kun du bri ba ni// khru gang yang na khru lnga 'am// gsang sngags
316a5(rgyud): dngos grub rjes 'thun par// rnam pa gsum du dpe bar ba// lha rnams dgod pa snga ma bzhin// mkhas pas rigs kyi bdag pos pa// lhag ma rnams ni ci rigs par// mkhas pa yi ni dgod par bya// de la
316a6(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su sgra gcan dang nye sgo ga/ nyis be con dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyar gzhag go/ gnod mdzes kyi gnas su nr-i rdo rje lcags kyu ma de'i phyag rgyar gzhag go/ spyi bo skyes kyang muda'i phyag
316a7(rgyud): rgyur gzhag go/ phyi rol du ni phyag brnyan ma bzhi zhags pa'i phyag rgyar bri'o// de nas su ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad pa'o// phyag spos dang me tog la sogs pa yang dmar po dbul lo// me'i theb khung yang/ 
316a8(rgyud): snga ma'i gnas su bya ste/ srid bu sor nyi shu'i tshad lo// kha ron sor gnyis pa kha par lta bar bya'o// zabs su mtho chung ngu ga la dbus su rdo rje sor brgyad pa sa dmar po bskus pa bya'o// me'i thab khung
316b1(rgyud): de ni gru gsum la zur gsum du bya'o// de nas bdag phrag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la pha rol du gtor ma sbyin no// de nas gtso slag mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la snga ma bzhin du gsang gtor ba ste/ seng ldeng / 
316b2(rgyud): shing ngam/ a sho ka 'am/ shing ga ra bI ra'i me bas la de bzhin du bdag rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te/ me'i thab khung gi zhubs su me'i dkyil 'khor bsams la ya ger gzhag go/ yaM ge
316b3(rgyud): yang 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba las me'i gzugs su gyur par bsam pa ni/ nyi ma 'char ba 'dra ba gdul dka' ba/ mig gsum pa/ thor tshugs can dbu ska kham pa lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na be con dang / 
316b4(rgyud): zhags pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / gun di thogs pa/ gos dmar po gyon zhing / srad bu dmar po se ral khar thogs pa/ yi ge ras mtshan paM/ me lce 'bar ba dmar po'i 'od 'phro ba de lta bu'i me bsams te/ 
316b5(rgyud): gsang gtor byas la mchod yon phul te/ rang gi gsang sngags kyis phyag sgos dang / me tog la sogs pa byin la/ de nas shing ka ra bi ra'i yam shing bsregs shing yungs dmar dang tsan dan dmar po la stug
316b6(rgyud): pa'i sbyin bsreg bdun sbyin no// de nas dkyil 'khor du bkod pa'i lha rnams la bsreg blags bdun phul te/ snga ma bzhin du bdag gis lha'i gzugs bsams la gzhag ste/ de bzhin du bsreg blug/ 
316b7(rgyud): phul la cho ga las byung ba'i rjes rnams sbyin bsreg bya'o// 'jug tu'ang byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du bya'o// cho ga 'di la yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por ba
316b8(rgyud): me'i gnas kyang dus gsum du tsan dan dmar pos byug cing me tog dmar po'i sal ma dkram mo// dpal ldan gos ni dmar po bgos// phyag spos phreng ba dmar pos brgyan// srad bu dmar po'i se ral
317a1(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du bsams te/ rdzas de dag nyid las rang gi rig pas bsreg blugs dbul lo// de nas rang gi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du bsams te/ bzhag la rang gi rig pa las byung ba'i
317a2(rgyud): rdzas ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzub mo dang / mthe bos bzung ste/ khro bo dang bcas par gsang sngags bzlos shing phaT dang bcas par ji srid 'dod pa de srid du bsreg blugs dbul lo// de nas snga ma bzhin
317a3(rgyud): du byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa la sogs pas ngal gso bar bya'o// sngags pa gang zhig 'di lta bu'i rab tu drag po'i las byed pa/ de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyang rtswa mchog bzhin du bsreg
317a4(rgyud): 'dir yang cho ga 'di ltar bya'o// dpal ldan gos ni sngon po bgoso// byugs spos phreng ba sngon pos brgyan// srad bu sngon po'i se ral thogs// byang chub sems la rab tu gzhol// cha dang kha dang bska ba
317a5(rgyud): dang // kI sa ra'i kha zas bza'// lha rnams dgod pa'i don la mkhas// gtsang zhing mchog tu tshul khrims ldan// spro ba che zhing dpa' snying can// khros pa 'jig rten mthar byed bzhin// lho phyogs kha ltas
317a6(rgyud): mi smra zhing // 'dug pa'i thabs ni tseg pur 'dug/ sbyin bsreg bzlas la brtag tu 'byung// bsrung dang bskyab pa dag la mkhas// mtshan mo sbyin bsreg byed pa yis// dog shul spyad pa brtsam par bya/ 
317a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzo gos par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las drug shul spyad pa'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// // de nas
317a8(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i snying po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
317b1(rgyud): 'thob pa'i rgyu/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba gsal zhing dag pa/ yid kyi bsgrubs pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
317b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kau ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras
317b3(rgyud): pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub brtsol ba gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa ngo bo
317b4(rgyud): nyid med pa mtshan gyi gzhi dang / mtshan nyid las 'das pa theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ bdud rtsi sbyin pa de sngags kyi tshul la rnam par gnas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rnams kyis ji ltar thob
317b5(rgyud): 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal du bltas nas/ 
317b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyad la ba blta ba snying rje chen po bang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyag de bdag la
317b7(rgyud): zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba la phan par byed pa dang / theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ mtshan nyid med cing gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi tshul gyi dngos grub
317b8(rgyud): rtsol ba/ rten cing 'brel ti 'byung ba'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung bar byed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi spyod yul gyi chos
318a1(rgyud): bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gsum yong
318a2(rgyud): su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mdzad pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba/ sems can thams cad la dgongs pa/ gsang sngags thams cad
318a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub rtsol ba/ bgegs thams cad skrag par mdzad pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzugs med pa sgra med pa/ 
318a4(rgyud): dri med pa/ ro mod pa/ gnas med pa/ yid med pa/ rnam par shes pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spyod yul med pa/ brjod du med pa/ spros pa med pa/ ma 'dres pas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phrag na rdo rje la 'di
318a5(rgyud): skad ces bka' bstsal to// chos gang rgyu las byung ba rnams// de rgyu'ang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de rnams kyi ni 'gog pa'ang gsungs// de skad gsungs pa dge sbyong mchog/ gzhan dbang
318a6(rgyud): yod pa ma yin zhing // yongs su grub pa'ang gzhon yin no// gnyis po'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam shes brgyad po de nyid mtshan// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de rnams so so'i ye shes mngon par
318a7(rgyud): 'dus byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus byas ma pra b+ha drud pa dang / blo gros tha dad pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar rjes su 'thun par khong du chud nas byang chub sems dang bu de rnams
318a8(rgyud): gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol nas legs par phul lo// gsang sngags tshul la legs gnas pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sdigs pa yi// yang dag nyid ni sgom byed pa// 
318b1(rgyud): de dag sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bco
318b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i// ma 'das sems ni nyid kyis gang // bzlas pas dngos grub thob 'gyur na// chos kyi 'dus pas ci zhig smos// rta dang 'dra ba'i
318b3(rgyud): sems de ni// mnyam par gzhag pas btul nas su// byams dang snying rje brtan byas na// dngos grub brtan pa 'phral du thob// nam zhig chos rnams ma skyes pa// de yi sa bon a yi mchog/ rgyal ba dam
318b4(rgyud): pa rnams kyis gsungs// oM na stong pa nyid ces bya// yi gau pi mo phyi mo kun// de bzhin 'den pa gnyis dang ldan// mi 'gyur yi ge dang yang ldan// de bas bsam par bya ba yin// a dang a zhes pa dang ni// 
318b5(rgyud): ri dang ri dang aM du ldan// a dang ldan pa snang ba'i mchog/ 'di las thar pa 'thob ces gsungs// ka yi ris dang rtswa ya ris// ta yi ris kyang de bzhin gzhan// tau yi ris dang pa yi ris// ma dang ldan pa
318b6(rgyud): lnga'o// ya ra la wa sha la sogs// thams cad rgyal mchog yongs su rdzogs// de dag rgya chen don gyi mchog/ rnam pa ma mang po'i don rnams byed// A ni byang chub thob par byed// ni ni de bzhin 'gag par
318b7(rgyud): byed/ su ni gsod pa 'grub par byed// raM ni dbang gi las byed pa'o// oM ni srin po gsod par byed// bi ni 'chi ba yin par 'dod// oM ni k+Sha yi snying po yon// kun kyang gzhan na ldan na mchog/ yi ge mthu
318b8(rgyud): can thams cad ni// ra dang klad bskor bcas gyur cing // chos kyi dbyings dang rtag ldan par// bsam gtan bzlas bya dngos grub thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub
319a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// sa bcu rtogs par khong du chud// bde gshegs yang dag mi
319a2(rgyud): zad pa// de nyid thams cad khyod kyis bshad// lag na rdo rjes smras pa yis// rab tu gsang ba khyod kyis rtogs// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na
319a3(rgyud): rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chos dbyings rang bzhin ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal ba mchog/ 'jig rten dpa' bo'i phyag rgya dang // mi skye ba yi yi ge yis// de bzhin bdag nyid bsams
319a4(rgyud): nas su// byang chub sems kyis shin du bsdams// stong pa gnyis su med sbyor bas// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ sa bon yi ge dang ldan par// dad cing
319a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod mnyam gzhag pas// bsams na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// khrus dang bshags la sogs pa dang // rab tu dben la sogs pa dang // phyag rgya bgrang phreng sems dpa' yi// zlos pI
319a6(rgyud): dngos grub brtan pa thob// chos kyi dbyings dang ldan gyur par// sngags 'di rnams kyis bsgrubs na ni// 'gro dang mi 'gro'i khams gsum na// 'grub par mi 'gyur dngos de med// gsang ba pa'i
319a7(rgyud): bdag po rang gi dkyil 'khor oM gnas pa'i bzlas brjod byas la dbang bskur ba'i tshe ga 'di la 'khor lo bsgyur ba gzhag par bshad do// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon por rdzogs pa
319a8(rgyud): byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las sgom pa'i yi ge dgod pa dbang bskur ba rim par phye ba'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
319b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa sems kyi sa la 'das pa nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thabs sna tshogs kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji
319b2(rgyud): bzhin du bshad lags kyiso/ yang bshad du gsol/ de la thog mar cho ga 'dis sdig pa so sor bshags par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dus 'di nas bzung ste nam
319b3(rgyud): byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du bdag la dgengs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas skye ba thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i tshe bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bgyis pa dang / 
319b4(rgyud): bgyid du rtsal pa dang / rjes su yod rang pa de dag thams cad sangs rgas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sman sbyar so sor bshags so// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas
319b5(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar gsum la skabs su 'gro ba bzung bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes
319b6(rgyud): bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhi ba bla na med pa so so rang gis rig
319b7(rgyud): pa la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bzhi'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de ltar lan gnyis/ de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas bdag lus
319b8(rgyud): dbul ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du sangs
320a1(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag nyid dus thams cad du yongs ye 'bul gyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la thugs brtse
320a2(rgyud): slad du bdag bzhes su gsol/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o// de nas dam tshig gi phag rgya bcings la gsang sngags brjod pas bya'o// // na maHsa maR+sha ta bud d+ha daM/ a sa me tri sa me
320a3(rgyud): sa ma ye swA hA/ de nas chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlab po// ne maHsa man d+ha bud d+ha nAM/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa ad ma ko haM/ de nas rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlab po// na maHsa mAn ta bud d+ha nAM/ 
320a4(rgyud): ad ma ko sa/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ 
320a5(rgyud): nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po dang khams dang ste mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa'i/ 
320a6(rgyud): / phyiphyir rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes pa spong pa srid kyi ngo bo nyid du ji lA ji ltar sangs rgas bcom ldan 'dus rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kis bang chub tu sems bskyed pa de
320a7(rgyud): bzhin du bdag gis kyang sems bskyod do// de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor thams cad du spos dang
320a8(rgyud): lo sogs pa'i sprin bsams te/ ga sngags kyi rgya la mau 'di lan gsum du brjod pa bya'o// na maHsaM man ti bud d+hAnA/ a b+hi sma ye s+pha ra hi mAM gA gA na khAM/ d+harma d+hA tu A kAM sha sa
320b1(rgyud): taHsarba ta thu ga pa ri shrad+d+ha maN+Da le ma ma pra ni d+hi puN+Da dz+nyA na ba le na/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+ThA na ba le na d+harma d+hA tu a d+hiSh+Ti na ba le na tsa swA hA/ gang ba'i phyag rgya ni spyi bor pad ma kha bye ba 'dra bar bya ba ga
320b2(rgyud): yin pa de/ de ni gang ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid yin no// bzlas brjod kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos ki dbyings bsam gyis
320b3(rgyud): mi khyab pa rnam par rol pa bstan nas yang / yul gsum gyis mi khyab par bstan par bzhed pa dbu'i gtsug nas/ chos kyi mdzod ces pa pa/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sems
320b4(rgyud): thibs po snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byung ngo // de nas 'od zer chen po'i dra ba bkod pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs rgya chen po rnam par rol pas nam mkha'i dbyings rgya
320b5(rgyud): chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bskor ba byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang bar byas te/ sems
320b6(rgyud): can gi khams ma lus pa yongs su bslab pa la sbyar nas/ sems can dmal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas kyi 'gro bar skyes pa rnams kyang tshim par byas te/ lha dang mi'i gnas rnams
320b7(rgyud): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stug po bkod pa'i khongs su gtogs par byin gyis byirnabyas nas/ chos kyi dbyings pas mo gyis mi khyab pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams kyi
320b8(rgyud): stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgyu 'thun pas byin du brlabs so// chos kyi dbyings kyi dgongs po ma rdzogs pas/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i mdzod ces bya ba sas
321a1(rgyud): can gyi khams ma nges pa/ yongs su skyob pa'i snying po dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs
321a2(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa snyed la bka' bsngal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su skes pa'i snying po'i rgyal po// de bzhin
321a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa gang la brten nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob par 'gyur zhing chos kyi/ 
321a4(rgyud): dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa yang mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing yod do// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang
321a5(rgyud): mnyam pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs
321a6(rgyud): bshad pa/ de'i dus la bab cing bde bar gshegs pa dra'i tshod la bab ste legs so// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi dbang phyug/ chos kyi bdag po mthar byed pa dang bral ba/ 
321a7(rgyud): shes chen po la mnga' bo/ ston pa su bcu'i dbang phyug gcig pu don grub pa/ tshig grub bya/ sgyid po'i mtha' lus dgal pa da / de kho na nyid mkhyen pa/ sman pa'i rgya lo po chen po 'gag pa mo
321a8(rgyud): chad pa med pa/ mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha'i spros pa med pa/ rtogs par khong du chud pa/ skyong ba gonam gsum du gyur pa/ gling du gyur pa mya ngan la
321b1(rgyud): 'das pa zhi bar gyur pa/ grol ba/ rims nad med pa/ dag pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ rnyog pa dang bral ba dang / smra ba dang kun tu smra ba med pa dang / dngos po thams cad rnam par 'dzin par mdzad pa bshad du
321b2(rgyud): gsol// de ltar rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad rtag tu yid la rab tu dga' bar gyur pas mtshan legs par bsgrags pa byas nas rnam par 'dren pa la gsol ba gdab po// de dag gis gsol ba
321b3(rgyud): btab pa mkhyen nas/ dpa' bo chen po thams cad mkhyen nas rims nad dang bral bas snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yang bshad par bya'o// zhes bka' bskul to// de nas
321b4(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci lags/ 
321b5(rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje sa rgyas sa/  sa da zhin ces rnam da yin/ rkyen rnaM na tha di ga na kyi de nig dgra bcom pa
321b6(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par gnas so// zhes gsungs sam/ nam mkha' la ni skye ba'ang ma mchis/ 'gag pa'am ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
321b7(rgyud): de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang skye ba yang ma mchis// 'gag pa yang ma mchis na/ bcoM ma ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 'od ni sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas
321b8(rgyud): 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang gi tshe sbrel pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu drang
322a1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams/ dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par
322a2(rgyud): byed do// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// gang na sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti
322a3(rgyud): / mug dang / g.yo dang sku dang / thA nom ki bas pa pa t+yan mos ra/ pra dad pa rnams/ ki bsam ra/ tri lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs prar bgyid pa'i bar rmya pa sems dpa' sams dpa' ren po
322a4(rgyud): dag ni bcom ldan 'das shin du dka' ba bgyid par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bsngal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kau bu de dag ni sangs rgas gcig la bsnyen bkur bas pa ma yin
322a5(rgyud): gyi/ rigs kyi bu de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mang po la dag pa'i rtsa ba bstan par rig par bya'o// chos snang ba'i sgo'i tshul gsum las kyang 'byung ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lnga ste/ snying rje'i tshul gyi/ 
322a6(rgyud): sgo snang ba'i tshul dang / chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo snang ba'i tshul dzadza/ ji bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bkuMdzaM bsti byed pa'i tshol gyi spro 'di gsum dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de nas
322a7(rgyud): pa ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang / thugs rgya chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzigs nas/ gas
322a8(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje lo bka' bstsal pa/ lag na rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ de la re shig slob dpon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la
322b1(rgyud): spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa/ snying rje can dad pa che ba/ chos zab mo la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas shing nas
322b2(rgyud): pa/ gtsang zhing bag yod pa/ gsang sngags spyad pa dang / phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams bslab pa/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las bya ba la bla ma las lung thob pa/ sangs rgyas chos dang / 
322b3(rgyud): dge 'dun la// gang zhig yid gnyis med gyur zhing // sems can khams ni ma lus pa// yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir brtson pa// mkhas pa des ni sangs rgyas kyi// dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar rigs// 
322b4(rgyud): mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs bstan// shes rab rno la dpa' snying can// bdag gam slob mi rnams kau'ang rung // bgegs ni zhi bar byed par nas// yang dag bden pa'i don rtog la// gang gi
322b5(rgyud): mos pa rgya che zhing // bzod dang ldan la nga rgyal med// rlabs po che'i las byed cing // de ni rlabs po che la dang // byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis smon lam dag/ thos na phyi phyir/ 
322b6(rgyud): dga' ba dang // rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur pa dang // gsang sngags spyod la brtson pa dang // bzlas brjod byed la gang 'bad dang // gcam sgra thams cad mi sems la// 'jig rten chos la mi lta zhing // sdig/ 
322b7(rgyud): la gzhol ba'i sngags pa ni// yon tan de la spogs ldan na// slob dpon ston pas bkur ba yin// yang na chos rnams thams cad ni// rnam par dben la gang gnas pa// der yang spangs rgyas
322b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston par 'os// yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sngags pa'i dam tshig gsum shes pas/ nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// de la gnas pa'i sngags pa
323a1(rgyud): yon tan kun dang mi ldan yang // de la dkyil 'khor bri bar 'os// de ltar yon tan kun ldan na// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang // lus kyi cho ga mthong
323a2(rgyud): bas bya// de la slob dpon la gzhan gyis bskul na// slob ma don du gnyer ba shes shing // de la dad par shes nas// de ltan shes nas slob dpon des// sa gzhi legs par rtag par bya// mtsho dang kun dga'
323a3(rgyud): bskyed mos tshal// rdzing bu rnams kyis kun brgyan pa'ang // 'bras bu me tog drang ldan pa'i// ljon shing sdong bu de bzhin te// gel ba dam pa nyams dga' ba// 'bras bu me tog ldan pa dang // drang mi khyA
323a4(rgyud): khrung rma ba dang // sa ra ne tse sha ri rnams// gang gi yul na yod ma yi// yul de nan tan bskyed de bsnyen// me tog 'bras bu ldan ri dang // gnas shing yid 'ong chu yi gnas// 'bab chu'i chu ni zhim pa/ 
323a5(rgyud): dang / rma ging g.yas nas 'khor ba rgyan// der no stegs pa blo ldan gyis// dkil la bor longs spyod 'phel par bri// yul nau shin du snum pa dang // gtsug lag khadza dang khar pa dang // lU a
323a6(rgyud): / ngadang phyag lhas dang // shing gcig lam gyi bzhi mdor yang // zhi ba'i las la zhi ba yi// dkyil 'khor shes ra bcan gyis bri// khyad pa stong pa'am dud khrod dam// snum byed brtsub pa'i las tsam
323a7(rgyud): / d+hanr-i ts+tshang gr-i tu mA la 'jigs pa tsun// de bzhin thaMbs po 'jigs 'jigs wA/ de la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su// drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// dreg por drag po las rnams
323a8(rgyud): zhi bar zhi ba'i las bya'o// rgyas par rgyas pa nyid yin te// cho ga de ni rgyas pha la'o// yang na yid ni gang dag tu// nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// yul der dkyil 'khor bri ba yi// las ni le
323b1(rgyud): par bya bar 'os// gang gi sems ni rnam dag cing // the tsom la sogs rnam spangs pa// de la las rnams thams cad ni// grub par 'gyur ba dogs pa med// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yi// rnam par
323b2(rgyud): mi rtog byang chub yin// de yang rnam rtog spangs pa yi// thob par 'gyur gyis gzhan gyis min// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// blo ldan yid gnyis spangs nas su// 'jig rten kun la phan 'dor/ 
323b3(rgyud): pas/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// yul med dus kyang yod ma yin// bya ba med cing byed pa'ang med// chos rnams dag ni thams cad la// chos nyid 'ba' shig yod ma yin// byis pa mi/ 
323b4(rgyud): shes pas bsgribs pa// rgyu dang rkyen gyis rgyal bas na// stong pa'i chos ni ma rtogs pas// rtag tu bdad kyi dbang ngadu gyur// de ltar ye shes dbang gyur pa// ston pa smos pa med rtogs pas// rnam rte
323b5(rgyud): thams cad spangs pa yi// mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyun bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la so// 
323b6(rgyud): par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs pa dang / smin 'tshams nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ki rgyan ces pa ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // byang nas kyang kun du snang bar gyur to// sangs
323b7(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing 'di snang bar byas nas kyang gang gi rnam pa dang yon tan gyi mtha' bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang rtogs par mi nus pa lha'i sgo khyud kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs
323b8(rgyud): pa'i rnam par smin pa las gyur pa/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po bkod pa'i rgyan 'di thams cad log mthil bzhin du mnyam par gyur to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab
324a1(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'od zer de dag gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bo mi snang bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag gi snang bar gyur ma thab tu/ phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
324a2(rgyud): zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin kyis brlabs bshod du gsol// de skad ces ma
324a3(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' bsngal pa/ lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das
324a4(rgyud): ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/ phyag na rdo rje nyan de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// lag ni rdo rje de la 'di skad du bsgragaso pa'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi tshang khrag
324a5(rgyud): yan chad dpag tshad gcog man chad du bya'o// dpag tshad gcig pas lhag par ni mi bya'o// de las gzhi mnyam la 'jam// b+hag smos dag gis legs par bslus// mngon 'jim pa gtsang ma we/ 
324a6(rgyud): sngags pas nan tan bsku bar bya// de nas phur bu sor brgyad pa la/ las thams cad byed pa'i gsadza sngags kyi sku brgya rtsa brgyad du btab ste grwa bzhir mnyam par btab na/ dkyil 'khor
324a7(rgyud): r+ya byin gyi sgo brlabs par 'gyur ro// na maHsa man ta badz+ra NAM/ A kau Ta ya/ sa me mahA tsaHDA li hUM phaT/ de nas ste gon du gnas pa byas la phyi de nyin dkyil 'khor gyi yo byang
324a8(rgyud): bsogs la/ las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags sam/ 'phags pa mi g.yo byas bsrung po byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi bang phyogs su bzhag go/ yod na bdag gis byin gyis brlabs la
324b1(rgyud): go// de nas phyi de nyid slob ma dad pa che ba/ gtsang sbra che ba/ chos la 'bad pa/ cho rigs btsun pa/ mos pa rgya che ba/ gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ ji snyed 'dod pa rnams gzung ngo // las thos
324b2(rgyud): cad byed pa'am/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'am mi bzod pa'i gsang sngags kyis bu mos bkal ba'i bskrad pa'am/ skud pa gzhan la btab pa dang / yang na ru ku sha la mdad pa gsum bor ba yang
324b3(rgyud): rung ste/ de nas sngags kyis bsngags pa ni// brgya'am yang na lhag kyang rung // slob ma rnams kyis las 'gyeb phyir// dpung pa g.yon la bcing bar bya// u dum bA ra'i so shing ni// me tog dri la sogs pas
324b4(rgyud): bskus// shin du bzang pos bsrung ba byas// sor brgyad pa la rtse gcig gshibs// dge ba yid du 'ong ba dag/ de nas mkhas pas sbyin par bya// shar rom byang du kha bltas te// se shing dag ni bca' bar
324b5(rgyud): bte de nas blo ldan mi ltos shing // dpyod pa med par dor bar ba// gang du ltung bar gyur pa las// de bzhin der ni grub par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// mdo sde'i chos ni nyan du gzhug/ 
324b6(rgyud): slob ma skyob par bya ba'i phyir// chos kyi gtam ni bzang po bya// gal te rmi lam bzang po'am// ngan pa dag ni mthong gyur na// bdag gi skal ba brtag pa'i phyir// bla ma la ni de dag bsnyad// mchod rten
324b7(rgyud): kun dga' gtsug lag khang // glegs bam dang ni lha rnams dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin chen gos// yang na me tog 'bras bu rnyed// ral gri 'khor lo pi wang dang // grub pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs rnam
324b8(rgyud): gang gis rmi lam thob gyur na// de yis dngos grub yid bzhin gyur// nyi zla me dang ched dag gam// de bzhin rgya mtsho rgal ba dang // glang po che dang rta yang rung // de ni dngos grub thob mi dka'// de las
325a1(rgyud): pa'i rmi lam ni// bzang pos dngos grub dam pa brtag/ rmi lam ngan pa mi bzad pa// 'jigs pa mthong na mi 'grub po// bong du rnga mo khyi dang bya// stag dang byi la wa rnams dang
325a2(rgyud): mi ni 'bru mar lus bskus dang // gcer bu rtsub la mi sdug pa// de la sogs pa'i rmi ngan rnams// blo dang ldan pas spang bar bya// yang na dngos rnams rmi lam dang // dri za'i grong khyor bzhin shes nas// 
325a3(rgyud): blo dang ldan pas rmi lam rnams// snying po med par bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das par chu ba sems dpa'a'i gsung sngags
325a4(rgyud): sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la dang po nas blo brtan par 'gyur ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ 
325a5(rgyud): 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pas chos thams cad shin du mya ngan las 'das par mthong zhing so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang phyin ci log tu shes nas/ mtshan/ 
325a6(rgyud): nyid dang bral ba zhig tu shes te/ de bas na de dag chos thams cad la blo brtan zhing / dris par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen por byin
325a7(rgyud): gyis brlabs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' bskul pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis brlob pa nyon cig/ de la dang por slob dpon gyis/ 
325a8(rgyud): gtsang sbra byos te/ bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas lo// dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad la phyag byas te/ chos kyi dbyings rnam pa
325b1(rgyud): dag pa yang dran par bya ste mtha' yas pa/ rgya che ba rab 'byam bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs la blta'o// bltas nas kyang bdag rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la/ tshon sna lnga yi srad bu 'am// yang na
325b2(rgyud): mkhas pas blos kyang rung // lha yi gnas rnams nges pa ni// shes rab can gyis rnam par dbye// kun du grub bzhi lham pa la// sgo bzhi rta babs dang yang bcas// sgo khyud rab 'byam rgya chen ldan// rnam par
325b3(rgyud): dag pa sems kyis bris// rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am// yang na sa lu'i phye ma'ang rung // yang ni spos sam thal bas kyang // dkyil 'khor sngags pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// nub kyi sgo ni da
325b4(rgyud): bar bya// de nas rig sngags rgyal mo ni// mi bzod bsrung ba chen mo'amamo// yang na mi g.yo dran par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran byas nas// bden bral gyi ni phyogs su 'gro// de nas srad bu bres nas su// 
325b5(rgyud): bskor ba byas te slar log nas// de nas blo dang ldan pa ni// byang dang nub kyi phyogs su 'gro// der yang shar du kha bltas nas// shar gyi phyogs su spad bu bri// de ltar srad bu'i tshul shes pas/ 
325b6(rgyud): rtag par thog ma nyid du bya// de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// mgon po ngan song kun spong dang // mi mchog 'od dpag med pa dang // de bzhin sgrib pa kun sel dang // thub pa me tog kun rgyas dang // rgyal
325b7(rgyud): ba rnam par snang mdzad dang // thub chen bdud las rgyal ba dang // de bzhin mi 'khrugs zhes bya dang // sangs rgyas rnga yi sgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas// der yang dka' thub can
325b8(rgyud): gyis ni// nan tan bskyed de cha gsum brtag/ de ltar sa la mkhas pa yis// sa ni legs pa sa sa rgya yong sa thos dag pa nam kyi ma ma 'an mas nag na/  na lce ma se mas shes
326a1(rgyud): rgyas rnams la phyag byas nas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs sam// phyag rgya mkhas pas bri bar bya// yang na gzhan ni gang yang rung // de dag thams cad bri bar bya// de nas yang
326a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par stong mdzod kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdog po phyag na rdo rje la bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sbyor ba gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngag
326a3(rgyud): kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams tshegs chungs sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi
326a4(rgyud): khyab pa'i tshul bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yod do// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa'i tshig gang dang ldan
326a5(rgyud): na byang chub sems dpa' gsong sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad po spyod pa rnams cho ga thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes
326a6(rgyud): par bgyid pa'i sgrub pa'i tshig de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol po dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs sgrub pa'i
326a7(rgyud): rgya chen pos ban brlabs nas skor ba bzang po bdagang do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la 'khor los bsgyur ba ni da ki la 'khor gyi tshod dpagi tshad gcig tsamau bri bar bya ste/ gnas can
326a8(rgyud): bzang po sbrul gyi snying po dam pa las byas pa'i khang pa dril bu dang / rin po che'i bla re chen po bres pa/ lho'i a ga ru'i bdug spos kyis bdug pa/ dzam bu na dI'i gser gyi srad bus bsko
326b1(rgyud): g.yon pa tsho tshogs kyi dril blug mas pa'i da bas spyang bad+d+hAnA pA/ rngam+b+ha sman pa sna tshogs kyi sku drug pa phyogs bzhin du bas babyu pa m+bu ga gi rjo ba sa pa rlonas kyis
326b2(rgyud): bting ba bkod pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyis sbas pa/ rin po che'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyis kyang rnam par gsal bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa'i nang na 'dug bzhin du bdag chos
326b3(rgyud): kyi dbyings rnam par dag par byin gyis brlabs la de'i rnam par dmigs pa'am/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'am/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su song ba rdzas
326b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang / byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du gzhug go// de nas blo na med pa'i ye shes kyi migo rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig bstan par bya'o// 
326b5(rgyud): de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// shor phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gru gsum pa pad ma'i steng na 'dug par bri'o// de'i gsang sngags ni 'odi'o// 
326b6(rgyud): na maHsarba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ a sarba tra NA ko swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su sangs rgas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan
326b7(rgyud): bri'o// de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man ta bud d+he bo d+hi satwA naM/ sa man ta a mr-i te dz+wa la swAhA// de'i 'og tu kunau du bzang po'i phyag rgya ral gI dang gnas kyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu bri'o// gas
326b8(rgyud): sngags ni/ na maHserba bud d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ badz+ra rA dza mA la swA hUM/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yen logs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phag rgya bri'o// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das
327a1(rgyud): shAkya thub pa'i phyag rgya lhung bzed dang chos gos bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su nam mkha'i sbyar gyi phyag rgya spyan gtsug tor 'dra ba pad ma'i steng ma 'dug par bri'o// 
327a2(rgyud): ldan 'das ma'i 'og logs su rdo rje mchog sprin gyi phyag rgya ud pa lnga'i steng du rdo rje bzhag pa bri'o// 'phags pa kun du bzang pa'i byang phyogs su byams pa'i phyag rgya gun di pA'o// bcom ldan
327a3(rgyud): 'das kyi nub logs su spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya pad ma bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi byang phyogs su mtha' yas par 'phro ba rgya chen po mi g.yo ba rgyal po'i phyag rgya bri'o// 
327a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lho phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi phag rga bri'o// de nas pi rol gyi dkol 'khor cha gsum du byas pa la 'khor sa'i snam bu bor te/ shar phyogs su/ 
327a5(rgyud): pheM nyi'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgyo bri'o// de dag gi shar lho'i 'tshams su pho nya mo thams cod kyi phyag rgya bri ste/ pho nya mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lcags kyu'o// tshogs rnams kyi phyag rgya ni
327a6(rgyud): nags pa'o// lho dang byang gi dzas gnyis su bran po dang / bran mo rnams gi pheg rgya bri ste/ de la bran po rnams gyi phag rgya ni ral gri'o// br-in mau rnams kyi phyag rga ni khang ga dzi dadzo rdo rje dza~M kha
327a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bklag gi/ klags nas langs la dkyil 'khor bskor ba byas ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag byas la
327a8(rgyud): slob ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gtsang sna con ya ma la brtan pa sdom po bzung po/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa can snying rje che be/ gdong ras kyis ga/ migs
327b1(rgyud): ldog pa mo stong pa de la sems rtse gcig tu dmigs pa rnams dkyil 'khor bskor ba bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khar 'greng la gang ba'i phyag rgya'am/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'am/ dam tshig
327b2(rgyud): gi phyag rgya brdzings to// dam tshig brjod la dkrol 'khor du bzung to// de nas me tog mo dor du gzhug go// me tog gar babs pa de de'i lha yin no// de ltar dam tshig brten par bya ste/ slob dpon la
327b3(rgyud): ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sems kyi brgyad rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma bltas nas gsang sngags spyad pa la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyi chog sbyin no// de ltar byas na dkyil 'khor
327b4(rgyud): chen po bkod pa 'diro dam tshig mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jog rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs kyang rung ma zhugs kyang rung ste/ dam tshig tu zhugs pa 'gyur
327b5(rgyud): so/ de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs shing / sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su
327b6(rgyud): sgrub pa'i yod la byed pa des gsang sngags spyad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rjes su dran par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dubyings kyi gnas na 'khor
327b7(rgyud): po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis gzigs nas zhal cung zod 'dzum zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i so
327b8(rgyud): so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa'i tshal gyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin du rnam par dag pa bstan par bzhed pas gtsug gtor chen po'i dkyil nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams can
328a1(rgyud): las bskal ba yi dam bcas zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa chen po mdzad do// thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul 'byung ba nas bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // 'od
328a2(rgyud): de byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rub 'byam nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mthas bkrus pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'kho ron 'khod pa
328a3(rgyud): bang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni snang bar byas/ chos kau dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i yul ni bstan/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la ni ltas
328a4(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa mtha' yas pa ni dmigs par byas/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rnam par bstan pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam par rol
328a5(rgyud): pa'i sgos rnam par rol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa las mngon pas
328a6(rgyud): grub pa/ mos pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnam pa bcus rab tu brgyan nas nam mkha'i ngos la/ bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs ba
328a7(rgyud): pa bya ste/ gnas par gyur to// 'od zer chen po de dag de ltar gnas par gyur ma thag tu/ gsong ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i sems la sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to// 
328a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa las byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par bkod pa snang ba ston ma byung ba 'di dag bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nam mkha'o ngos ni khebs par byas/ de bzhin gnyi
328b1(rgyud): pa'i rnam par chom pa chen po rnams ni bstan nas/ ngo btsun gshegs pa'i zhal du mi snang byur gyur pa ngo mtsha che'o// de bas na nges par dang bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pu chen po man
328b2(rgyud): par sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas/ mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed do// de'i phyi
328b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bdag zhu'o// snyam mo// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom
328b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ bdag brtag tu zhabs 'bring
328b5(rgyud): mchis mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar bshad pa chen po sngar mdzad nas/ dbu'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil nas/ 'od zer chen po ngo mtshar du gyur pa bdag gis sngon ma mthong ba sangs rgyas
328b6(rgyud): kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed byung nas/ 'od zer de rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyis mthas bkrus pa/ snang bar bgyis pa/ ngo mtshar che'o// de la bdag nyid 'ang
328b7(rgyud): snyam du gyur te/ deng bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug pa'i tshul sgrub pa/ rnam par dag pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
328b8(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad par bzhed pa ni bdag cag gi rnyed pa legs par brnyed do// snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag cag la thugs brtse ba
329a1(rgyud): slad du so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug pa'i tshul sgrub pa'i rnam par dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa
329a2(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs bshad na/ dus slad ma'i 'gro ba rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur te/ legs kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i
329a3(rgyud): bdag po phyag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po legs so legs so// khyod don 'di 'dri ba de yang legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir rab tu legs
329a4(rgyud): par nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas/ mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam
329a5(rgyud): par dag pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o// zhes nas/ gsang ba po'i bdag
329a6(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bga' bstsal to// @# na/ 9 da na nas /  sa par byang chub
329a7(rgyud): pa'i gzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhi ni mngon par rdzogs par byang chub po'i gzhi'o// de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi 'od dag byang chub sems dpas sgom pa
329a8(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa la sgrub pa'i tshul rnam por dag pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i gzhi chos kyi
329b1(rgyud): grangs yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rab 'bam mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs nas/ nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i rgyal po rnam par smin pa
329b2(rgyud): nam mkha' ltar rgya che zhing mthe' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul bsam
329b3(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa rab 'byam ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer chen po dbu'i gtsug nas byung ngo // byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rjes su 'thun par bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
329b4(rgyud): snang mdzad la bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma bas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam po bcus snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas te/ steng gi nam mkha' la gnas nas/ dam tshig chen po gsum/ 
329b5(rgyud): gyi snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams nas mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas bkrus pa snang bar byas nas/ sems can gyi khams rnams la dam tshig chen po gsum gyi myu gu skye bar byin gyis brlabs te/ 
329b6(rgyud): 'od zer de dag nam mkha' la lhags nas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ngo // 'od zer de dag phag na rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la/ gsang ba pa'i bdog po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin
329b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin chen pa thob par 'gyur te/ de thob pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnyis su med par gnas par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag
329b8(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dga' bas snying tshim par gyur nas/ mig gnyis mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yud tsam zhig bltas te/ gzhin cung zad
330a1(rgyud): 'dzum zhing bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis zhus pa/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lags// ji ltar rgyal ba dam pa lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lags// ji ltar sangs rgyas
330a2(rgyud): zhes kyang bgyi// mgon pos bdag gi the tsom 'di// thub pa chen pos bsal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams// the tsom yid gnyis spangs nas su// spyad pa'i rgyal po thog
330a3(rgyud): chen lo// rgyal ba'i sras ni spyod par 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang bya pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// gsung ba pa'i bdag po khyor
330a4(rgyud): don 'di lta bu 'dri ba legs so// legs so gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi tshul sgrub pa gzhi 'ang lta bu 'di thos nas/ skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun du skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni dkon
330a5(rgyud): tegasang ba pa'i bdag po rigs kyi bu de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bskor byas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma la dge bya'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin par rig par bya'o// gas
330a6(rgyud): dag po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pas thog mi nyid du theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
330a7(rgyud): ga po theg pa tshon po rdzogs par khong du chud pa'i bya'o chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung drus gosang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa bsgrib par 'gyur ro// khyod ldar gus
330a8(rgyud): sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba yin no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la
330b1(rgyud): bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo/ 
330b2(rgyud): rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid te// gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid ci// gnas ni rnam pa bcus rtog
330b3(rgyud): pa// de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya// 'du shes tsam yang spangs gyur cing // rang bzhin nyid kyang bstan du med// ye shes kyis ni rang rig pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes gsungs// byang chub nam mkha
330b4(rgyud): mtshan nyid te// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gang zhig de ni rtogs 'dod pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin// sa bcu yongs su rdzogs byas nas// dbang rnams rtog par khong du chud// chos rnaMm
330b5(rgyud): stong pa sgyu ma bzhin// gang gis 'dir ni kun rtogs shing // 'jig rten kun gyis rgyud shes so// sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya// gsong ba pa'i bdag po de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis gnas
330b6(rgyud): skabs rnam par bzhag pa ni de dag yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam gang so des kang 'di ldan par chub sems dpa' rnams kis rang gi sems rnam par gzhag pa sgrub pa ni med par rig pa
330b7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byung
330b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs par bshad pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa ngom
331a1(rgyud): lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor pa na 'khor ba'i tshe ngan 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am/ bdang kyi las ki 'jigs pa'am/ mi khom par skye
331a2(rgyud): 'jigs pa ma mchis par bdag smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa la gnas pa ni 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang 'jig rten
331a3(rgyud): las 'das pa'i lam mi rtong zhing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang ston to// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las yongs su nyams
331a4(rgyud): par yang mi 'gyur ro// de nus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po snying po'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// de ni skye
331a5(rgyud): mang po la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bkra' bskul to// gsang bya pa'i bdag
331a6(rgyud): de'i phyir legs thas rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / sangs khyod la gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor thu gad ma rtsu ba'o// de yang kye shig slob dpon dam tshig gsum rnam par dbye ba la mkhas
331a7(rgyud): bdag kyang dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dam tshig gsum po de gang zhe ni/ chos kyi khyad partsa gsum ste/ chos kyi khyod par gang la dus gsum du rga
331a8(rgyud): pa'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa de ni dam tshig gsum zhes pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi khad par de yang gang zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems ni chos kyi khyad par/ 
331b1(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad med pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// 'di la chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rang rig pa'i
331b2(rgyud): rnam pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// gang lus dang ngag dang yid 'jug pa de ni rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ni dam tshig gsum yin/ 
331b3(rgyud): te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgas thams cad kyis kyang ma rtogs na mu stegs can gzhan dag gis lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// byis pa mi
331b4(rgyud): shes pas bsgribs pa// tshul 'du shes par ma gyur rnams// sangs rgas gzhan du tshol bar byed// 'di na gnas par yong ma rtogs// 'jig rten khams gzhon gang nas kyang // sangs rgas rnyed par yod/ 
331b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma bstan no// de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu yid gnyis spangs nas ni// sems kyi khyad par rnam gsum brtag/ de
331b6(rgyud): nus dam tshig gsum shes 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungaso nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
331b7(rgyud): de nas slob dpon dam tshig gsum shes par bya ba la/ mkhas pas bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings su mos par byas la de la dmigs pa'i spyod pas sa gzhi rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// de ltar des snga gzhi
331b8(rgyud): rnams sbyangs nas nam mkha'i dbyings lta bu la yang dag par gzhol bas bdag ni chos kyi dbyings sgrib po med pa'i ye shes kyi yul yin no// snyam du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis
332a1(rgyud): brlab po// de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bdag gi lus la dkyil 'khor yin pa'am/ dkyil 'khor
332a2(rgyud): bdag gi lus yin par byin gyis brlab ste/ rang gi sems kyi byas pa'i tshig sna lnga'i phye ma dang gzhan yang rung ste/ cho ga sdo mas rnam par dbye bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ni sems
332a3(rgyud): can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gsang ba'i snying po'i dam tshig la 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang
332a4(rgyud): gis byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang tshe 'di nyid gcig pus thob par 'gyur pa de lta/ 
332a5(rgyud): bu'i chos kyis byin gyi brlabs pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byamos pa chen po de dang / thugs rje chen pos spyan gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams la gzigs nas/ gsang/ 
332a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' bskul pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa'i guzhi gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes skyob
332a7(rgyud): par dka' ba yo bsod nams mo byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi phu rol-i gyi rgyud la yang dag par rab tu 'jog par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi gzhi nyon cig/ bcom
332a8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco mo ljon 'ongs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i
332b1(rgyud): stobs dang ldan pa mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi ye shes la mnga' ba ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin
332b2(rgyud): can su zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di 'dra ba'i don du nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas bklas pa'i bskal par yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa yang bzod par
332b3(rgyud): mi bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na rigs kyi bu mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'tshol bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na legs lags
332b4(rgyud): kis/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhi de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po
332b5(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// gsong po pa'i bdog po nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med
332b6(rgyud): po'i phyir chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mtshan nyid do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag ngos sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na nam byang chub snying po la 'dug
332b7(rgyud): gi bar du bsgoms shing lan mang du byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi gzhi yin te/ gsang ba pa'o bdog po de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang
332b8(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni de yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa na yang 'di dag sems sems dpa' las rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba shes
333a1(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sgo thob par gyur to// sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / bdud bzhi pham par byed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags
333a2(rgyud): rgyal mo gnas med pa/ nam mkha'i spyod yul mtshan nyid med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ byed pa po dang / tshor ba po med pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// gas
333a3(rgyud): bo pa'i bdag po de la rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo mtha' yas shing / rab 'byam rgya che ba bstan pa'i bya ba de gang zhe na/ na mastau ya d+hi ka nAM/ bu d+hi ga te pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yo a pra ti ha ta shA swa ne b+hUHma hA
333a4(rgyud): kr-i brI b+hU thA ga na A ma lan+ta pU d+har+yaH/ ta thA ga tAr+yA pyA b+hA be nA ban+d+har+yA pa d+hA r+ye mA~Mn+Dak+She paM bri ma le/ mdzag te bai sho d+hA nI/ de la ni rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med bya yin no// a ma hA bam+b+hi yi s+t+wa~M / 
333a5(rgyud): na rdo rje 'di ni nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i reg sngags kyi rgyal mo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ byin gyis brlabs kyis byin du rlob pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
333a6(rgyud): / dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no// rigs kyi buM de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di mi 'chad cing mi brjod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ngas ma mthong ngo // gsang ba pa/ 
333a7(rgyud): dag po rnam gangs des kyang 'di ltar gsango bo'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam chog 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sos
333a8(rgyud): dpa'i spad pa spyod pas gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa rgyal po 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o// de la gsong ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di
333b1(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ji ltar ston/ chos thams cad la thob
333b2(rgyud): pa'i bar du ji ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdug po phyag no rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub
333b3(rgyud): sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas slob dpon la dbang nod par bya'o// 'di snyam du slongs 'di ni bdag gis ston pa ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
333b4(rgyud): byang chub la bskul ba'o// de nas thal mo sbar te nye bar song la gsol ba gdab po// slob dpon gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar shes nas/ snying rje chen po sngon du song ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smra bar
333b5(rgyud): pa'o/ rigs kau ku longs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sran bla na med pa de khyong la bstan pa rtsa ba'o// de nasa? sa gzhi yid du 'ong ba brtags la cho ga sa mas sa gzhi spangs te/ dkyil 'khor gri bzhi
333b6(rgyud): pa~M sgo gcig pa lha rnam par dbye ba'i gnas legs pa brtags pa mchod pa'i gnas rnam po sna tshogs bkod pa// bsgrubs pa spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhag pa bris
333b7(rgyud): la slob ma pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa rang gi lha'i gzugs bdag yin par dmigs pa la gnas pa/ yid byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa/ 'gro ba mtha' dag yongs su bslab pa'i bsam pa can de
333b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag bum pa des spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// 'di skad du rigs ki ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
334a1(rgyud): spyan phye'o zhes kyang smra bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa rnams kyi lha'i gzugs ni de bzhin
334a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku ji snyed pa'am sems mtha' yos pa thams cad kyi cha lugs kyi bye brag kyang rung ste/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis da rlabs la 'gyur bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag
334a3(rgyud): po gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa yang phyi lta bu yin zhes na/ gsong ba pa'i bdog po de la dbang bskur ba'i tshe/ slob dpon gyis pad ma'i phyag rgyas gdon bkra zhing brtan po bsam
334a4(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pa rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa yongs su brtag pa ni gser ram/ zangs sam 'jim pa las byas pa 'am/ ri mor bris pa bzhag ste bya'o// de'i steng du 'dug pa la chos thams cad la dbang thob
334a5(rgyud): bye ba'i phyir spos cha dri zhim pos bkang pa'i bum pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// slob dpon bdag nyid gang ji ltar rjes su 'thun par mos par bya ba'am/ de'i phag rgyas rjes su 'thun pa'i
334a6(rgyud): pa ba bya'o// chos ki dung gi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi rgakhor mo'i dkil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlab par bya'o// ral gri'i phyog rgya dang / gsernga sngogs
334a7(rgyud): kyos ni 'jig tshogs lo lta ba mtho' dag gzhom par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi la
334a8(rgyud): lo byin gyis brlabs par bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rga dang gsang sngags kyis nI po shes pa'i grong khyer gzhig par byin gyis brlab por bya'o// gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis ni gtsug
334b1(rgyud): tor ltar mi mthong ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o// mdzod bu'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis ni mdzod bu dang ldan par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// yan lag thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang / gsang
334b2(rgyud): sngags kyis ni yan lag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la pad ma'i phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/ khrig ma nas bskyed te/ sor mo thams cad
334b3(rgyud): go mnyam par brkyang ngo // phyag rgya 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gdan yin te/ dam pa mthu bo che'o// gsang sngags ni ngo mtshar che ba thams cad kyi sgo ste/ na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM
334b4(rgyud): ga ga nA mA la pra b+hA badz+ra b+hU t+ya nA ma hA kr-i pad ma ka de la 'di dag ni rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa'o// a be bAsmA ya mahA kr-i pad ma dzA hUM/ lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab skur la sor mo rnams phan tshun
334b5(rgyud): / blas pa'i tshul du bsnol te/ g.yon pa'i mthe bo rgyab tu bzlog la g.yas pa'i mthe bos sen mo la slar ro// rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste// chos ki 'khor lo zhes su sgrags// 'jig rten mgon po slob rnams kau/ 
334b6(rgyud): 'khor lo/ dam pa 'di bskor ro// na rmaHsa man ta bung+ga naM/ da thA ga ta sa mr-i te bi dza ya 'dra rA sarba dza ya ga pra d+ha ra/ kA ri ma/ hA kr-i be hU~M haM tra di ma hA da byA ta hU~M/ gsang pa'i phag rga las mthe bo gnyis las
334b7(rgyud): mthil du bcug la 'dzub mo gnyis kyis rtsa ba dkris te lhag me rnams so na gzhag la bsgreng ngo // 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis// phyag rgya sems can thams cad kyi// don rnams rtag tu myur byed
334b8(rgyud): chos ki dung zhes rnam par grags// no maHsa man ta bud d+ha ne/ t+yad tra b+ha ga gti pra tiSh+Thi te naM/ A nan ta nu sa ra bi nir g+ho Shi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bAka pra sa ra bis+sa ya ka d+ha ra ma hA d+ha ra ma ShA/ ka sarbo sat+pa yan
335a1(rgyud): sha nA rA ma hA ma hA hUM/ gang pa'i phyag rgya de nyid las// 'dzum mo gnyis bkug te// mthe bo'i sen mo'i steng du ral gri'i tshul du bzung ngo // phyag rgya rab tu mthu chen 'di// ral gri phyag rgya rnam pa
335a2(rgyud): grags// sems can kun gyi 'jig tshogs lha// lan cig skyes pa'ang gnod pa yin// na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nAM/ a mrah+ma khAR+Sha gA pradz+nyA dwe NI ta smAd k+Shak+Sha/ Da dr-iSh+yA ts+tshi nA da na kA ra/ ta thA ga ta a d+hi mug ti nir
335a3(rgyud): dza ta/ bi d+hA ta saM ka le ba mahA mahA hA dzaHphya ga hra de nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis pha rol du btang ste/ gang mo gnyis ki tshigs gsum par nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par bzung la rdo rje lta bur bas
335a4(rgyud): mthe bong dang sprin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams nang du gzhug go/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po yi// phag rgya rab tu bsgrags pa 'di// mi shes grong khyer 'jigs pa yi// rdo rje'i phyag rgar rnam par
335a5(rgyud): grags/ de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nAM/ ma hA b+hIsmA ya te zod b+hA ba mahA tsaN Da du ra dAn tA tro b+hany+tso hA/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi ngos su gtsug tor
335a6(rgyud): // 'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgya ste// 'jig rten mgon pa skyob pa yi// gang gis phyag rgya 'di bcings pa// de la 'di ni gtsug tor 'gyur// de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsau man ta bud d+hA nA/ 
335a7(rgyud): b+ha dra au pra ti ha ta b+hA bi ti/ d+har+m+ma tA bi lA nI/ sarba ta thA ga tA no du d+har+yA b+hA sha ya/ ma hA bud d+hau sarba ta thAnaHd+hiSh+Thi te/ s+phu ra ma hA ma hoSh+Ti She swAh+ma/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ smin 'tsham su brdung
335a8(rgyud): / ga rnams kyi// mdzod spu rtag tu rnam par bsgragaso// nga'i gsang sngags ni/ na maHsa man te bud d+ha nA a/ sha khon du ba ma pra b+ha sarba satwa/ kle sha san tA ba pra sha ma na ga ra ma hA
335b1(rgyud): tI d+ha ra sarba ta thA ga ta a laM ka Da ma hA pu ru ShA rU pa d+ha ra ra ka ko ti ga ta swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams sangs rgyas
335b2(rgyud): kyi bya ba la nye bar gnas pa de gang yin pa de dag ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dang / 
335b3(rgyud): gsong sngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu gzugs sna tshogs dang 'dra ba'i lus rnams kyis sems can gyi khams rnams sems can gdul ba'i dang/ 
335b4(rgyud): gis ji lhor rjes su 'thun pa'i lus rnams ston to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par steng mdzad gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag ni rdo rje la bka' bstsal pa/ gsang ba pa' bdag po gsang nga/ 
335b5(rgyud): snying po'i dkyil 'khor lo sdom pa gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lus dang ngag dang yid bsdams shing spyod par 'gyur ba'i
335b6(rgyud): sdom pa dang / byang chub kyi sems yod do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sdom pa gang zhe na/ bsdam pa ni sdom pa ste/ lus dang ngag dang / yid rnams bsdus shing yongs su bsdus pa'i phyi dang nang gi sdug
335b7(rgyud): bsngal sel bar 'gyur ba de ni sdom pa yin no// de skad ces bka' bsngal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngag
335b8(rgyud): kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa sdom pa ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bsrel
336a1(rgyud): to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la slob dpon gyis lha spyan drang ba byas la/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa bklags te/ dkyil 'khor la phyogs der 'dug la slob
336a2(rgyud): ma rnams la bos te/ 'di skad du bu dus gsum du sgrib pa med par gnas pas/ dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom po nos shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// des kang thal mo sbyar pus mo gtsigs te/ 
336a3(rgyud): 'di skad du slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag meng 'di zhes bgyi ba bdag gis dus 'di nas gzung ste bang chub ki snying po la mchis kwi bar du slob dpon gyis bdag la dam tshig chen po la
336a4(rgyud): 'jug pa'i snyom pa bdag la bstsal du gsol/ ston pa'i bka' spyi bos nod par 'tshal lo zhes smra bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dgongs shig/ bla na med pa yang dag
336a5(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po lo 'dug gi bar du lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag gi lus sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul bar bya'o// gsang
336a6(rgyud): pa'i bdag po 'di ni dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sdom pa yin te/ sdom pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpo'i spyad pa spyod pa
336a7(rgyud): rnams ni/ tshul khrims bla na med pa la rab tu gnas pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lto bas nA gsang stsogs kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i sgo 'di la slob par 'dod
336a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems gong dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye
